story:
Here's the story

Haw is the gripping story of a father’s struggle to save his son from a corrupt society in a pitiless, bleak, futuristic America. Sean Jackson’s debut novel Haw has been praised by author Mitch Cullin (Tideland, A Slight Trick of the Mind) as a potentially seminal work in contemporary American fiction. Cullin celebrated Haw as “a sort of Brave New World for modern times, updated with Jackson’s expansive, unique vision of a world bordering on collapse, but not yet devoid of hope. The unique imagery and characters summoned in Haw is equal parts moving, funny, irreverent, timely, and verging on sheer brilliance. I relished every moment of it.”

Sean is a multiple NC Press Association award winner who worked as a journalist in Eastern NC for over a decade. His years covering government and communities in NC has given him an inside perspective on the effects of corruption, neglect, poverty and class divisions that impact our state and country. He's had numerous short stories published in literary journals, from the U.S. to Canada and Australia and was a 2011 Million Writers Award nominee for his short story "Not Even Jail" by Forge journal. 

Mired in a corrupt, dangerous city that is on the verge of collapse, a father and son flee to a rural village, hoping to find refuge from their violent lives. What they find is not the haunted hippie environs of local legend, but a gritty farm community that thrives despite the threat of criminal invasions and the ominous presence of a nearby nuclear reactor. A bioengineer, Lucas lends his expertise to the efforts of sustainability, while his son—a rising young photojournalist—falls in love with one of the sons of a folksy family whose charm lies in its ability to keep the community together, through music and love—until disaster shakes their fragile world.


Here's how we expand Haw's reach

Haw is being published and released June 19 by Harvard Square Editions, a small press based in Hollywood, California. Being a small press, their marketing budget is limited. A plus to a small press is their dedication to innovative, new voices in the publishing world and Harvard Square in particular focuses on environmental and climate change fiction which plays a large part in Haw's story.

Local, regional and East Coast events are in the planning stages. The launch party is set for July 18 in Carrboro, NC. An author event is scheduled in Elizabeth City, NC for August and guest author appearances in Louisville, Kentucky and Orlando, Florida for September. Attending events, signings, conventions, readings, etc. adds up. Getting the word out about Haw and it's powerful cautionary messages about climate change, government corruption, acceptance of LGBT people and class division based on poverty and race, are important to Sean, especially with the turn NC's state government has taken since 2012. Haw explores what could happen if climate change is left unchecked and the government stops caring about its most vulnerable citizens.

All funds raised will go toward publicity and travel costs. (Those costs will likely exceed this Indigogo campaign amount.)


Other Ways You Can Help

Moral support, positive energy and well wishes matter! If you can't contribute to the fundraiser but would still like to help out, please consider sharing the link to this campaign. Spreading the word means so much.

Follow Sean and share the campaign:

Facebook

Twitter

Website

Tumblr

Finally, come to a book event, recommend the book to friends, family, book clubs, etc. And ask your local indie bookstore to sell it! 

Thank you for your support! Sean hopes Haw makes a difference in our national conversation on important issues that affect us all.

story:
¿Qué?

Dícido ofrece un retrato del período que vivió España en la segunda mitad del siglo XIX; tras el éxito de la Revolución de 1868, La Gloriosa, la reina Isabel II se exilia y se intenta crear un régimen liberal más democrático, pero cuya inestabilidad hace que pase en pocos años por diferentes etapas: gobierno provisional, Regencia, Monarquía de Amadeo I y República, unitaria y federal.

En el año 1868 un levantamiento secesionista en la isla, propiciado por Céspedes, obligó al gobierno español a trasladar numerosas fuerzas armadas para controlar aquel alzamiento. De esta manera se inició la Guerra Cubana de los Diez Años, la conocida como Guerra Grande.

En 1870 Amadeo de Saboya, al amparo del general Prim, fue elegido para ocupar el trono que abandonó Isabel II. En el año 1872 Carlos VII se erige como alternativa a la corona, bajo el lema de “Abajo el extranjero”, dando lugar a la última Guerra Carlista. Pero ahí no se acabaron los males de nuestro país, la instauración de la 1ª República en el año 1873 va a favorecer los levantamientos cantonales en la Península.

Es así como en ese momento España tenía tres frentes abiertos: la Guerra Grande o de los 10 años de Cuba, en el Norte de España contra Carlos VII y en los levantamientos cantonales.

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de publicar obras poco convencionales pero de indudable calidad, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para promocionar cada título cuando esta todavía se encuentra en proceso de edición.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Hoy se nos presenta Jaime Gutiérrez.

Soy licenciado en Periodismo y doctor en Ciencias de la Información por la UPV. Mi carrera profesional la desarrollé en la CTNE (Telefónica) donde trabajé en diferentes departamentos, la mayor parte del tiempo en el de Ingeniería, al amparo de mi otra profesión: Ingeniero Técnico Industrial. Publiqué una novela en Amazon titulada El relicario que versa sobre la I Guerra Carlista y la telegrafía óptica utilizada en aquel momento como método de comunicación. También he realizado, junto al profesor Gilles Multigner de la Universidad Autónoma de Madrid, sendas investigaciones para la Fundación Jesús Gangoiti sobre las líneas I y II de Telegrafía Óptica ideadas por el guipuzcoano José María Mathé, y que funcionaron a mediados del siglo XIX.  

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«El día siguiente una columna mambisa se dirigió hacia La Tomatera y se emboscaron cerca del camino que deberían seguir los soldados españoles. Antes de mediodía una columna encabezada por cuatro jinetes se dirigía hacia ellos y por el ala derecha, dentro de un bosque poco poblado de vegetación, avanzaban las fuerzas flanqueantes con otros cuatro jinetes abriendo camino. De repente sonaron los disparos de los rebeldes y en dos minutos cesó la descarga. Cuando la columna española quiso reorganizarse pudieron contar ocho muertos y más de veinte heridos. Los caballos de los rebeldes facilitaron su huida sin ninguna baja en su haber.
          Tres días más tarde llegaba al campamento el capitán guantanamero a quién Henry vio en el campamento español. Cuando descendió del caballo estaba el coronel Holguín en el centro de la plaza del acuartelamiento.
          —¿Qué tal te fue en casa, con tu familia? —preguntó en un tono que no disimulaba una carga de ironía, conocedor de dónde había estado en realidad.
          —Todo bien mi coronel, sin novedades que comentar.
          —¿Qué es lo que hacía en el campamento español el pasado jueves? ¿Acaso es usted el espía que va delatando los lugares donde se van a producir los desembarcos de las armas? Creo que le hemos pillado y difícilmente encontrará una excusa para esto.
          El capitán se vio sorprendido de que tuviese esa información y comenzó a temblar. El mal olor se dejaba sentir alrededor de ese hombre cuando los pantalones se ensuciaron con sus heces y su orina. Se postró de rodillas y suplicó.
          —No por favor, perdóneme tengo una familia que atender, necesitaba dinero…
          Un tiro entre ceja y ceja fue suficiente. El coronel enfundó su pistola y recorrió con su mirada las caras de los allí presentes advirtiendo de lo que sucedería a los traidores. Dos hombres arrastraron el cuerpo de aquel hombre hacia un manglar próximo para que sirviera de comida a los cocodrilos. Un silencio sepulcral se adueñó de la plaza del campamento. El silencio era más por la brutalidad de la ejecución que porque pensaran que no lo mereciese».

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 980€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Aviso para navegantes: La opción BACK IT es únicamente para realizar donaciones a la edición, por lo que no habrá comunicaciones posteriores en busca de datos de envío... cualquiera de las opciones válidas de reserva exige cumplimentar formulario para poder servir el pedido.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona al autor, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Jaime Gutiérrez vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.

Política de Privacidad

story:
Short Summary

I'm so excited about the upcoming release of my new YA paranormal fantasy novel, Aqua, that I'm itching to share the news with the world!  This global domination scheme would be dramatically more successful if I had some modest funds to draw from.  The book is a finished work, packaged and ready for launch on April 16th.  My desperate plea for your help is to defray the costs of marketing. 


What I Need & What You Get

I need help funding a marketing campaign for Aqua.  This campaign actually began before the dawn of time, and will end when I depart this Earth (preferably on a cool spaceship).

Marketing efforts will include blog touring and advertising, production of "swag" (such as bookmarks, stickers, magnets), raffle giveaways of said swag, other cool marketing ideas I have yet to dream up, and possibly one meal to sustain me during the marathon that is a new book launch.  (Nachos...Just one plate.  A girl deserves a plate of nachos for her hard work.)

You might be thinking, Gee...These "swag" things sound pretty cool.  How do I get my hands on some of those?  The answer: Sign on to help fund this project!  Here are some of the perks I'll be offering...

  • Aqua bookmarks, featuring cool graphics, a witty quote (the level of wit may be subject to interpretation), and an autograph.
  • Autographed Aqua stickers, which can be placed inside the book cover, on a folder or binder, on your furniture (provided it's inexpensive and/or you're a master of refinishing furniture), or on your person (not recommended anywhere that involves hair).
  • Aqua magnets (I'm going to assume that you guys know the concept...Find something metal to stick it to.)
  • E-book copies of Aqua.  Ah, now we're getting to the point of all this.  The BOOK!  I will gladly "Authorgraph" it for you (an electronic autograph e-mailed right to you, which you request through the Authorgraph.com website).
  • Paperback copies of Aqua.  (Is the name "Aqua" ingrained on your brain yet?)  These are autographed, of course.  I will offer a paperback copy as one of the higher-dollar perks, as I have learned from experience that shipping paperbacks gets pricey (They have to ship to me for signature, then again to you.  Hence the need for a funding campaign.  And my apologies for the requirement to add additional charges for international shipping.  If I had the funds, I wouldn't be begging for your help in this very moment.)
  • E-book copies of my previous trilogy, The Proximity Series.  Haven't read it?  You should check it out.  Or, contribute to this campaign, and I'll give it to you!  Awesome, right?
  • An honorable mention on my author website, www.booksbygeorge.net, if you like that sort of notoriety.  I may also tweet your praises with reckless abandon (I promise I won't be obnoxious about it.)  This one's completely optional, if you don't care to have your name mentioned with my gushing effusions of gratitude.

    The Impact

    Writing books is my passion.  I would write books from now until the end of time, whether I have the funds to market them or not.  But let's face it, actually selling copies of books is way cooler than watching them languish on the shelves.  I wish these puppies sold themselves, but I live in the real world (most of the time).  I've learned from marketing my Proximity series that the little expenses here and there add up to a chunk of change I don't just happen to have lying around.  If you do have a giant wad of money lying around, feel free to share your secrets on how you acquired it.  (Or you can lop off a little chunk and share, I won't mind).

    I just want to send this story out into the world, and have the capacity to put it in front of more readers who can absorb themselves in the world of Aqua the way I have.  That's all I'm asking.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    I completely get it if you don't have the funds to offer.  Since this is all about helping me market my book, your help in spreading the word would be a huge contribution in itself.  Tweet, post to Facebook, talk about it on your blog or to your friends, download a very reasonably-priced e-book copy of Aqua when it releases, and even better...Write a review about it!  (Preferably one that doesn't eviscerate it for sucking beyond belief.  How could it possibly suck?  It's awesome.  I have zero bias whatsoever, by the way.) 

    You can also sign up to join my "street team", dedicated to helping me spread the word about my books.  Just visit my website: www.booksbygeorge.net, and look for the giant glaring red button.  You can't miss it.  If you want to help, but you're not sure how, send me a message on the Contact page of my website.  I'll respond to your e-mail ASAP.  If you just want to say "Hi", use the message form for that too.  I love to be greeted just for fun's sake, it's awesome.  You'll find that I'm a real, live person.  I don't bite (unless I'm famished from hours of writing, and you look like a plate of nachos). 

    If you made it this far, THANK YOU.  If you make it to the point of signing on to contribute, HUGE THANKS.  Anything you can do to help me spread the word is truly appreciated. 

    And as a parting treat, here is the "blurb" about Aqua:

    Meet Layla McKelland: Novelist (unpublished, but cut her some slack…seventeen is a bit early to despair),
    Slightly neurotic introvert (Alright, let’s be honest…there’s no “slightly” about it),
    International Woman of Mystery, and…
    Okay, just scratch the bio.

    The only real “mystery” in Layla’s life is why her father has never been on the scene.  Or why her mother drags Layla to a new coastal home every year.

    Nothing about the latest hometown seems too newsworthy…until a routine day at the beach leaves Layla questioning whether she’s read one too many paranormal fantasy novels.  The plot thickens when a random guy claims to know things about her father—a bizarre claim he backs up with an equally impossible stunt.  And Layla soon finds herself on the wrong side of a mysterious attempted drowning…on her own kitchen floor.

    When all is done, Layla will attest that fact is far stranger than fiction.  And nothing in real life is ever as transparent as it seems…Not even water.

    Especially not water.

    ***

    Want to check it out on Goodreads?  Click HERE.

    Are you a book blogger interested in participating in the Aqua blog tour?  Sign up HERE (and give the awesome ladies at Girls *Heart* Books Tours a virtual hug for me!)

    Thanks, everyone!

My name is Mike Ruttan, and I'm a man who is burning with passion to help the citizens of Port Alberni. I plan to do this through responsible leadership. I believe the people's needs come first! My experiences taught me how to be a leader and a public servant--so I dream of a Port Alberni where the voice of the people is heard, respected and responded to. I dream of a place of inclusive development, a place where people will take pride in belonging to a wonderful city. I will lead the people of Port Alberni to that dream. 

In order to make this dream a reality, our team needs to meet its fundraising goal of $3,500CAD. Your contributions will be put to work locally to produce campaign materials, event expenses and information dissemination. 

Port Alberni deserves trustworthy leadership and I will provide that leadership! I will run the Mayor's office with integrity, and will listen to all citizen concerns--all while doing what I say I am going to. I will work hard on your behalf. Donate today to bring trustworthy leadership to Port Alberni. Mike Ruttan for Mayor!

story:
My name is Georganne Duron and I have had a dream for many years of publishing my own children's book series, based on stories being told by my 35-yr old Yellow-Nape Amazon parrot, Bobby.  
I have already written three of the books and am in the process of writing two more. I have been a huge animal lover my whole life and have always had a house full of rescue pets, including dogs, cats and of course, my talking parrot Bobby.  

My goal with these books is to use my own rescue pets, which include not only Bobbie but also a senior dachshund who is paralyzed so he has to use a wheelchair and a now deceased 3-legged dachshund who lost his leg to cancer, to educate children about both animals and people with disabilities and who might be different from themselves.   

I want them to see a lighthearted presentation in these stories of rescue animals who have faced the same challenges and thrived and delighted both themselves and others.    I want to teach them about acceptance and perserverance, about caring for the less fortunate, about how most of us are more alike than different - and of course, about the personal rewards of saving senior and disabled pets.   And I want them to help give hope to children who might be bullied because they are different.   My own parents were both legally blind, so this mission is important to me on both a human and an animal level.  

I have loved to write my whole life and have always been told I am quite good at it and have a unique style.   For many years, friends have encouraged me to put my pet stories into book formats for children.  However, I have no art talent and cannot illustrate the books myself. I have had several potential volunteer illustrators fall through over the years, so I was pretty discouraged that I would never be able to afford to get them done.  I need funds to pay for hiring an illustrator and getting the books published.   This is expensive, considering there are several books and each page of every book will need to be illustrated.  

Once I have the series published (which I expect will be 5-6 books in total), I will sell them in an online store I am starting on a new animal rescue website I recently started ( www.dogscatsparrots.com ) - or www.facebook.com/dogscatsparrots) and give 5% of the proceeds back to the approved animal rescue group I am featuring each month.    I also plan to sell them at animal rescue adoption events, with 10% of the proceeds being donated back to rescue.   You can read more about me under "About" on the www.dogscatsparrots.com   website.  

Any funds raised and not needed to get all the books illustrated and published will be used to build the online store on the website to sell some great pet products, with again 5% of all sales from the website on any item also being donated to animal rescue.  

Please donate and share my story to help me make my children's book series dream a reality finally.   And let's help raise a next generation of children who are kind to both people and animals with special needs and who will stand up for and protect those who might look or act different from their own families.

Because, as Bobby the Parrot Says in his first book - "I'm Just Like YOU!"

My name is Georganne Duron and I have had a dream for many years of publishing my own children's book series, based on stories being told by my 35-yr old Yellow-Nape Amazon parrot, Bobby.  
I have already written three of the books and am in the process of writing two more. I have been a huge animal lover my whole life and have always had a house full of rescue pets, including dogs, cats and of course, my talking parrot Bobby.  My goal with these books is to use my own rescue pets, which include not only Bobbie but also a senior dachshund who is paralyzed so he has to use a wheelchair and a now deceased 3-legged dachshund who lost his leg to cancer, to educate children about both animals and people with disabilities and who might be different from themselves.   I want them to see a lighthearted presentation in these stories of rescue animals who have faced the same challenges and thrived and delighted both themselves and others.    I want to teach them about acceptance and perserverance, about caring for the less fortunate, about how most of us are more alike than different - and of course, about the personal rewards of saving senior and disabled pets.   And I want them to help give hope to children who might be bullied because they are different.   My own parents were both legally blind, so this mission is important to me on both a human and an animal level.  I have loved to write my whole life and have always been told I am quite good at it and have a unique style.   For many years, friends have encouraged me to put my pet stories into book formats for children.  However, I have no art talent and cannot illustrate the books myself. story:
The Vision that Drives us

Tablets are the way of the future. They offer wonderful educational opportunities to introduce art into a child's lifestyle. Imagine an innovative tablet book that uses interactive features to connect children with art history. We and many parents believe in reaching today’s children through the electronic devices that capture their attention. This reinvention of the reading experience will help children become more rounded individuals and connect better to the real world.


About the project we want your help funding

Mousieur Auguste Rodent, The Artist of Abundant Talent, is the creation of highly regarded painter Niina Chebry. Niina created over 40 original canvases to illustrate the wonderful story she wrote. Her story was patiently crafted in rhymes and always puts a smile on the face of readers, young and old.


Auguste Rodent (modeled after Auguste Rodin the famous French sculptor) is a talented sculptor who uses imported cheese as a medium, in a country very proud of its 400 fromages. Monsieur Brie, an opportunistic art critic, causes a patriotic scandal when he denounces Auguste’s un-French medium. Fortunately, Auguste’s reputation is saved by a young writer named Bernice Elaine Louise Lorraine Eiffel. The two meet, et voilà, you have a charming storybook ending.



The story is one of hope, tenacity and love. It runs on multiple levels appealing to both children and adults. The illustrations introduce a soft style and a touch of the "Belle Époque" (sense of time and place) that provides opportunities for great interactive features, and plays beautifully on a tablet's HD backlit screen.


Thanks to the dedication of award winning designers focused on the needs of parents and children, Auguste Rodent achieves twin objectives of entertaining children while educating them on major works of art. Innovative features allow the story to be read as a traditional book with realistic page turning.


Or, as another option, Auguste RoDent becomes an interactive experience when the story is narrated by the author Niina Chebry. As Niina reads, literacy learning happens as the words of the story are highlighted. (There is a significant sub-market for the book with adult literacy and English as a second language.)


The Impact

Auguste RoDent: The Artist of Abundant Talent is the first tablet interactive book created by Sharing-Books.com. Sharing-Books.com is a web property of Shared Books Limited, a private company registered in British Columbia, Canada. Over 20 private and corporate shareholders pooled their resources to create an online children books publisher with a social mission.


Sharing-Books.com was created when a friend of the founders asked for help. Andrea Azevedo had written a children's book, The Little Suitcase, to honour the short life of  young boy who died of a rare disease at age 10. Andrea was not interested in profiting from her book; she wanted all of the proceeds to go to charity.


Intrigued, the founders researched the children's book publishing industry and found it begging for a transformation towards e-books, and in need of a more collaborative and social business model. Thus the model of Sharing-Books was created with the sharing of revenue equally between the authors, the company and a charity dedicated to literacy: Room to Read.


The model is to acquire new books by giving authors a platform for quick publishing of their works. The authors get the visibility to launch or enhance their writing career. The children visiting the site get DRM free PDFs of the books. And Sharing-Books get the rights to add value to the books and sell them. This is the process with Auguste Rodent. A great story was published and Sharing-Books is now developing the book 
and taking it to a new level as a tablet interactive book.


What We Need & What You Get

Interactive Tablet Books are a new medium.  We aim to discover new possibilities in edutainment for children by inventing unique new features that push the limits of tablets.  This book addresses the needs of tech savvy parents who want to make sure their children develop an interest in Art.  


In addition to the usual “read it yourself” and “read it to me” option that highlights words as they are read this book will include factoids that teach children about the masterpieces represented in the book.  Children will complete games or activities that teach them about Art History.  Upon completion of the activities, children acquire a reward in the form of a digital object representing the specific art piece.  


These objects are added to an art gallery that can be viewed by the child and compared online with other young collectors.  The online network will offer more games and factoids that will be available to add to the child’s art gallery.  These games have a scarcity engine built in with different levels of difficulty.  Just like hockey cards, baseball cards or more recently Pokémon™ cards, these will be tradable between participants.


We have already made a sizeable personal commitment with three years of work on Sharing Books to acquire and publish original books like Auguste Rodent.  Our development budget is $148,000.  This project has received a contribution of $50,000 from British Columbia Film and the Arts Council of British Columbia.  The shareholders of Shared Books Limited have contributed $68,000 to the intellectual property portion of the project.  We need $30,000 to complete the more advanced features of the book that will make this a truly exceptional Art History and Literacy experience for children.



Other Ways You Can Help
First we thank you for your interest in our project.  We appreciate your contribution and we ask that you pass our information on to your networks.

Here is the link to the Auguste Rodent web site: www.augusterodent.com

Here is Auguste's facebook page.  Friend him and read about his adventures as he roams the world looking for art from his contemporaries. http://www.facebook.com/people/Auguste-RoDent/100002742198407

Here is the link to Sharing-Books, the publisher of Auguste's story:  www.sharing-books.com

story:
Be one of the first to have a copy of Dark Futures Annual 1, in physical or electronic format and help Dark Futures improve in our second year!

For those who prefer a physical book, there are two options. The first option is the standard paperback edition, the same as the ones that will continue to be available. All paperback copies preordered through this campaign will come from the first printing.  The second option is an extremely limited hardcover version of the anthology. These will not be available outside of this campaign and each copy will be hand numbered.

Electronic copies will come in the form of a DRM free PDF. These will be delivered via e-mail shortly after the conclusion of this campaign.

This is a flexible funding campaign and you will receive any items you order, even if the funding goal is not reached. 


All support is appreciated!

Any amount you're able to contribute is greatly appreciated, even if it's less than the price of a copy of the anthology. Anyone who contributes even a single dollar will be thanked in a post on our site, as well as in the limited hardcover copies of the anthology.

If you'd like a tangible reward for less than the price of the anthology, we have an option where we will send you a postcard featuring this year's cover art.


Your support will help us continue to improve!

Any amount collected through this campaign that doesn't go directly toward fulfilling the contributor perks will be used to produce extra copies of the anthology for sale at cons, as well as helping us continue to improve Dark Futures. Stretch goals will be announced as we get closer to our funding goal.


About Us

Dark Futures (www.DarkFuturesFiction.net) is an online literary zine which launched in March 2013. In that time, we have improved our offering and continue to do so. We publish short stories or poems three or more times a month. 

A goal from the start was to treat authors we work with well. We are a paying market and author pay rates were increased once during our first year of operation. We hope continue to offer a positive experience to writers, regardless of their past publication history, and to eventually be a qualifying pro market with both the SFWA and the HWA.

*Must be a legal adult. You are responsible for ensuring you are available during the convention. Details will be worked out on an individual basis.

story:
Short Summary

Have you ever experienced an event in your life when, in one split second, you knew that everything had changed, and no matter what you did nothing would ever be the same?

If you haven't, I'm sure you know someone who has.

Tragedy seems to be all around us, and it takes on different forms. It may be the loss of a loved one, the downsizing of a job, a national event, the repossession of your home, the inability to help a child who is suffering, the unexpected end of a marriage you put so much of yourself into...

I'm Tara Alemany.

The event that changed my life forever started in July 2011 when new love suddenly entered into my life. I'd been alone for 12 years, raising my kids as a single parent, when along came Frank. Four months later, he was gone. He died unexpectedly and my world came crashing down...

The months that followed were hard ones for me and my family. There were moments when the best I could do was remind myself to breathe.

Yet over the course of the next year, God taught me a series of lessons. Through them, I learned how to change my perspective of what had happened so that it was no longer an anchor that held me back. Instead, it became the beautiful gift it was always meant to be.

I've written my latest book, The Best is Yet to Come, so that, through the narration of my story and the lessons that I learned, others can see how they too can not only recover from, but thrive after, the devastating event in their own lives.

In helping me raise the funds that I need to publish and market this book, you'll be bringing hope and healing to the lives of many.

What We Need & What You Get

Here's what I need to raise.

  • Cover and publishing costs - $3,250
  • Publicity, marketing and fees - $1,750

If we raise additional funds, it'd be awesome! My big dream for this topic is to share it on the Women of Faith stage. And I specifically chose working with the publisher I have because of the established relationship they already have with WOF. So, additional funds would allow me to strategically attempt to get on their radar.

There are a variety of contribution levels, so hopefully there's something there that meets your budget. Every little bit counts!

The Impact

If you join me in publishing and marketing this book, you'll be helping people who are privately suffering with their own grief come to terms with it.

No matter what you've been through, as long as there is breath in your body, the best is yet to come.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you just can’t contribute, don't worry. I get it! I've been there myself. Here are a few other ways you can help:

  • Please help me to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. The more buzz we create, the greater visitbility we get within IndieGogo.
  • IndieGogo makes it easy to share. :-) Just click on the buttons provided.
  • Keep this campaign and project in prayer, as well as those whose lives will be impacted by reading it or hearing my story. It's my sincere hope that The Best is Yet to Come will bring hope and healing to all who read it.

Thanks so much for all of your support!

What Others Have Had to Say

The Best is Yet to Come is an inspiring masterpiece. Its message will give you a whole new perspective on God's plan for your life. Tara is a remarkable writer and a gripping storyteller who will keep you enthralled to the very last page.

Arvee Robinson, The Master Speaker Trainer, International Speaker and Author

 

Inspiring! Tara uncovers how one can trust God and self in the face a real testing. Through her story, she illustrates how we each can overcome the difficulties in our lives and come out stronger in the end.

David Horsager, best-selling author of The Trust Edge

 

Tara R. Alemany systematically communicates spiritual strength and mental discipline as she fueled and guided me from heart to head and back again.  I am forever grateful to her for sharing her open-hearted journey embracing the magic and mystery of Self-Love, Love of another and God’s Love. 

Carol Metz Murray, transformational change agent, speaker and business consultant

 

When the doctors place paddles on your heart they do it to shock you back to life. Sometimes that is exactly what we need spiritually - a shock back to reality.

Grieving is healthy, wallowing in remorse and regret is hurtful - to yourself. This book will lovingly and gently shock you back towards wholeness with one simple and seldom used technique...

HONESTY. Tara gracefully walks you through her pain and shows you how to find the BLESS in any mess so you can graciously let go of the hurt and gratefully move toward healing. 

Barry Spilchuk, author of THE cANCER DANCE

story:
Let's get out there and bring to the Internet all those indigenous voices, rhythms and sounds we are missing from Mexico, let's reconnect with those communities that have been left out of mainstream media.

Hit the road!

In ancient times, people that lived in the Pacific side of what today is California and Mexico, were connected to a deer culture, which is why we call this sonic road project La Ruta del Venado (The Deer's Trail).

  • Mexican-American journalist, Ricardo Ibarra, started to broadcast Radio Indígena in the Radio Universidad de Guadalajara network in 2004. Now, 10 years from then, he wants to take a professional team on a tour through living indigenous communities established in the Pacific side of Mexico.
  • Since these communities don't have connection to Internet and are forgotten by mainstream media, nobody knows what is happening with them. We want to provide technology and human resources for them to manage their own local radio stations, to preserve language and culture, but first, we need to meet them and know them.
  • With your support, we will be able to visit them and upload in realtime audioclips, videos and photogalleries with their messages to you through a new Radio Indígena website, RadioIndigena.com/RutadelVenado or RutadelVenado.com.
  • Not just online, their messages will travel with us and shared in the next community we visit, from city to city, plaza to plaza, everyone will know that native language and culture is still alive and in need of ways for preservation.
  • In addition, we will create a sound library with more robust living indigenous languages ​​of Mexico's contemporary history.

My name is Ricardo Ibarra. I'm a Mexican-American journalist who started RadioIndigena.org in 2004 after visiting the desert of Wirikuta in Mexico with the huichol family of don Pablo Taizán and after making a long trip through indigenous communities in the Pacific side of Mexico, from Sonora to Chiapas. In that journey, I noticed there was a huge need of reporting issues that happened in these villages that no one was covering. 

10 years from then, there is still a need of knowing how are these indigenous tribes doing in these new times: How's their language, culture, health, and day to day battles. I believe that the only way to preserve human diversity is, first, knowing and communicating their situation.

In that sense, the Ruta del Venado Project, is also intended to locate communities willing to hold a community radio station for their own organization and the preservation of their language and culture. That is what you and my team are going to build in this communication venture.


Connecting on the field

Of course, we would have prefered to make this road project on a UFO or at least on a green or hybrid vehicle, but our space in time and the needs of sleeping inside makes that quite impossible. So we need to get a van —a cheap one— for maybe $10,000. I know, so much for gas! In Mexico the gallon of diesel is around $3.65. Yeah, most of the collected budget will have to fill this bag. An almost straight line from Tijuana to Mexico City is around 3,000 kilometers, which means, for a van, near $1,000 the whole trip. And that's if we were in a —almost— straight line, which is pretty hard in this rocky road we will be taking.

Then there's the food department, where we will have to prepare our own food to fill our bellies —we haven't evolved to just consume oxygen– so, let's add that. Plus a mobile WiFi adapter.

We will not get a salary as such, nor for driving the big truck, or for producing audioclips, videos and photo galleries in real time for you. Our income will come from sunsets and the smile of the people we meet.

Be sure any contribution you make to La Ruta del Venado Project will be used wisely, because we will be out there anyhow. Your support will make this much better, because, in the end, you will enjoy every production made on the road and uploaded to our website RutadelVenado.com, where your name will appear as a donator, fan and, why not, part of the team.


Reconnecting humanity

There is something happening with people in the world. There seems to be too much violence, too much hate, too much war. We believe that in this battle, there are also peace and love warriors. We are counting with you on this side of the road, on the "Deer's Trail" (la Ruta del Venado).

It is time to reconnect with communities that despite having a long history of disposession and exploitaition, still remain rich in traditions connected to our Mother Earth, through music, dance, healing, eating, harvesting.

The road is a beast

We want to keep it real. Mexico is a land that is crossing through a difficult social fase. It is not an easy or safe trip. That's why we need your support and contribution. But also with the support of local organizations we will acomplish our journey until the end.

    Show your love

    If you can't help to grow our numbers on this campaign, you can sure share it in your social media accounts. Maybe you don't have the money, but you know some people. Send an e-mail. Make a phone call. Tweet. Post this on your Facebook wall. Share it on your blog. Write about it. Talk about the Ruta del Venado. Take the word out there. Join us!

    En tiempos precortesianos, las personas que vivían en el lado del Pacífico de lo que hoy es California y México, se conectaron a una cultura asociada con los ciervos, por eso llamamos a este proyecto de campos sonoros la Ruta del Venado.

    Mi nombre es Ricardo Ibarra. Soy periodista mexicoamericano que comenzó RadioIndigena.org en 2004 después de visitar el desierto de Wirikuta en México con la familia wixárika de don Pablo Taizan, y después de hacer un largo viaje a través de las comunidades indígenas en el occidente, norte y sur de México, desde Baja California hasta Chiapas. En ese viaje, me di cuenta de que había una gran necesidad de reportar situaciones que sucedían en estos pueblos, y que nadie estaba contando.

Considero que la única manera de preservar la diversidad humana es, en primer lugar, conocer y comunicar su situación.

    En ese sentido, el proyecto de la Ruta del Venado también tiene la intención de localizar comunidades que quisieran mantener una radio comunitaria, para cuestiones propias de su organización, junto con la preservación de sus lenguas y culturas. Eso es lo que usted, como colaborador, junto con nuestro equipo vamos a construir en esta aventura de comunicación social.

    Conexión en el campo


    Por supuesto, habríamos preferido emprender este proyecto vial sobrevolando la tierra desde un OVNI o por lo menos en uno de esos vehículos ecológicos o híbridos, pero nuestro momento en el tiempo y las necesidades de tener un espacio amplio lo hacen casi imposible. Así que tenemos que conseguir una camioneta: una barata, de unos $10,000 dólares. Lo sé, ¡tanto gasto para la gasolina! En México, el galón de diesel está alrededor de $3.65 dls. Sí, la mayor parte del presupuesto recolectado en esta campaña tendrá que llenar esta bolsa. Una línea casi recta desde Tijuana a la Ciudad de México cubre unos 3,000 kilómetros, lo que significa que en una camioneta grande gastaríamos $1,000 por hacer ese recorrido. Y eso es en la suposición de hacer una trayectoria lineal, lo cual es bastante difícil, si consideramos el tipo proyecto de inmersión que vamos a realizar.

    Luego está el departamento de comida, donde tendremos que preparar nuestros propios alimentos para llenar nuestros estómagos. Además de un adaptador WiFi móvil que nos permitirá enlazar con la "Constelación del Huarache", es decir, el ciberespacio.

    No vamos a obtener un salario como tal, ni por conducir la camioneta ni por producir para ti los audioclips, videos y galerías de fotos en tiempo real. Nuestros ingresos vendrán de las puestas de sol y la sonrisa de la gente que conoceremos en el camino.

    Tenga la seguridad de que toda contribución suya al proyecto de la Ruta del Venado será utilizada sabiamente. Su apoyo hará que este viaje de reconexión con los pueblos originarios sea mucho mejor, porque, al final, podrá disfrutar de todas las producciones hechas en la carretera y montadas en el sitio web RutadelVenado.com, donde su nombre aparecerá como uno de nuestros colaboradores y, por qué no, parte del equipo.

    Volver a conectar la humanidad


    Hay algo que está sucediendo con la gente en el mundo. Parece que hay demasiada violencia, demasiado odio, demasiada guerra. Creemos que en esta batalla, también hay guerreros de paz y de amor. Contamos con ustedes en este lado de la carretera, en la Ruta del Venado.

    Es hora de volver a conectar con las comunidades, que a pesar de tener una larga historia de desposesión y explotación, mantienen ricas tradiciones conectadas a nuestra Madre Tierra, a través de la música, la danza, la curación, la agricultura.

    Este proyecto, para nosotros, es como redescubrir lo que somos como humanidad en estos tiempos feroces. Si usted ha leído hasta este punto, sabe que estamos contando con usted.

    El camino es una bestia


    Queremos mantenerlo real. México es un país que atraviesa una situación social difícil con un Estado fallido. No es un viaje fácil o seguro. Es por eso que necesitamos su apoyo y contribución. Pero también con el apoyo de organizaciones locales lograremos atravesar nuestro viaje el final, que es la Ciudad de México, donde presentaremos una primera edición del material recolectado.

    Muestre su amor


    Si usted no puede hacer crecer nuestros números en esta campaña, puede compartir este enlace en sus cuentas de redes sociales (aquí mismo tiene todo lo necesario). Tal vez usted no tiene el dinero, pero sabe de personas que podrían apoyarnos. Envíe un e-mail. Haga una llamada telefónica. Use Twitter. Publique esto en su muro de Facebook. Comparta en su blog. Escriba al respecto. Hable acerca de la Ruta del Venado. Lleve la palabra allá afuera. ¡Únase a nosotros!

    Sabemos que no estamos solos en este compromiso de preservar las lenguas nativas de México en estos días difíciles, y sobre todo, exponerlas al mundo.

    Como suele decir el doctor Miguel León Portilla, catedrático de la UNAM: "Hay una filosofía en cada lengua. Cuando muere una lengua, la humanidad se empobrece".

    Hay todavía 62 lenguas originarias en México, hagamos algo juntos para que no dejen de pronunciarse en esta brutal y maravillosa Madre Tierra.

Hit the road! In ancient times, people that lived in the Pacific side of what today is California and Mexico, were connected to a deer culture, which is why we call this sonic road project La Ruta del Venado (The Deer's Trail). 


Mexican-American journalist, Ricardo Ibarra, started to broadcast Radio Indígena in the Radio Universidad de Guadalajara network in 2004. Now, 10 years from then, he wants to take a professional team on a tour through living indigenous communities established in the Pacific side of Mexico.
Since these communities don't have connection to Internet and are forgotten by mainstream media, nobody knows what is happening with them. We want to provide technology and human resources for them to manage their own local radio stations, to preserve language and culture, but first, we need to meet them and know them.
With your support, we will be able to visit them and upload in realtime audioclips, videos and photogalleries with their messages to you through a new Radio Indígena website, RadioIndigena.com/RutadelVenado or RutadelVenado.com.
Not just online, their messages will travel with us and shared in the next community we visit, from city to city, plaza to plaza, everyone will know that native language and culture is still alive and in need of ways for preservation.

story:
Introduction

Have you ever experience true gratitude?  That is what started this amazing campaign - a hug from a child to say "thank you for reading to me"

I am an author with a truly special book that has been so far funded on a shoestring and has now become passion.  Space Ranger Fred and the Shoelace Adventure has seen some outstanding reviews on Amazon and Goodreads and those who have read it want more and those who have heard of the book or have been in a school that I have read at want to head out and get their copy.  Radio interviews on World Book Day proved I had something special and a competition to win signed copies of the book had me in tears when the winners shared their photos and hugged me to say thank you.

6 Year Fred Sanders AKA Space Ranger Fred has become my alter-ego and now lives alongside me. I have seen hundreds of young kids laugh as I read the book, I have had many come up and hug me after a reading. Space Ranger Fred is truly special and as an author I feel proud to be part of this adventure and truly making a difference in the lives of children today. My dream is to get children reading,  see them learn, get them to ask questions and let the adults around them realise that deep inside they too are still kids.  

So, can I read you a story? 

 

Once Upon a Time

I am Matt Newnham and Space Ranger Fred and the shoelace adventure started out by accident. A life changing event saw me quit my job and begin to write to earn an income and it was a freelance writing gig that got a little out of control that saw Space Ranger Fred come to life. Friends and Family saw what I had written and told me I had a massive talent. I took my basic manuscript and found some test readers on Facebook who made some suggestions but said overall it was a modern day fairy tale that was much needed today and that it had massive potential.

The Mission Began

Over a period of 12 months I refined Space Ranger Fred, created some extra characters, added the magical teaching element - the bit lots of authors struggle to master and in this case tying shoelaces - and produced a final manuscript.  I thought it was pretty good and proceeded to send it to agents and publishers worldwide and after 3 months nothing came of it.  I decided to follow the self-publishing route and soon found another successful children's author who pointed me towards an amazing team who gave some great advice and these guys also said that Space Ranger Fred had massive potential - I had no idea how right they were!

For the book to become a reality I needed a  few of things and this was not going to come cheap.  The first was illustrations and by chance I found Richie Williams who took my unedited manuscript and created some amazing illustrations that have potential for animation. I needed a professional editor and I soon found one who has really shaped the book and made the story the gem that is now is.  Finally I needed someone to create the book, put it together and get into a format that could be sold and I was introduced to the team that could do that.

In a short space of about 6 weeks the book was complete and on 18th December 2015 the book hit the shelves of Amazon.

Initial success

Within a few weeks my book had sold a few copies to family and friends and then the sales grew a little more. I needed reviews and the book was submitted to some professional book reviewers and the response was outstanding.  Five Star and Four Star reviews proved I had a winner, the words written convinced me that I could do this and personal notes from the reviewers all said that I needed to get this book out there along with those I had in my head out there too.

The Challenge

Writing a book and getting it on Amazon is easy, but getting a book to sell, getting it seen by those who matter is not so easy and for self-published authors this is even more of a challenge because it all costs money. I am now in the place and have been for a few months and wanting Fred to blast off.

When reading to schools or groups of children I can see the looks on their faces as they follow the story, pick up the lesson and giggle with laughter at the humour in the story. But when the book is finished they want more and that breaks my heart as I simply do not have the funds to print the books in large quantities or the power to get them into the bookstores where parents and kids buy books - although I have printed some in small quantities.

Every day I am asked where the books can be purchased and  radio stations and other media outlets are waiting to do interviews with me but only when the book is available in bookshops and easily purchased beyond Amazon -  this underlines the need and purpose this campaign as kids want to read and reading is something that will impact their lives forever. 

More Books

I have 8 more books in the Space Ranger Fred series ready to go, with themes that include:

  • Doing the right thing
  • Telling the time
  • Bullying
  • The environment
  • What happens when a loved one dies
  • Asking for directions
  • Christmas Adventure
  • Counting
  • Sharing

All tricky topics for kids to grasp. I need funding to make this happen and impact the lives of kids around the world and this crowdfunding campaign gets that started.

I have a young adult fantasy novel nearing completion and a more Girly adventure series similar to Fred about submarines and the environment,  On top of this I am co-writing a leadership book in the USA. 

Current Position

Recently I have found a book distributor who wants to help make my dream come true, the second book is only weeks away from being ready and placed on Amazon and the shoestring budget is just pulling it through, but again it will have limited reach.  The book distributor wants to make the book even more appealing for the right audience and make it so that parents will pick it up off the shelf in any bookstore anywhere in the world.  The distributor and agent has an excellent pedigree and works as much as possible with self-published authors with a view to growing them and getting their books not just sold but read, My agent is over the moon with Space Ranger Fred. And now the following needs to happen:

  • I need to market the book and the series well and make some noise.
  • I need the book to be printed in volumes so that kids can get it in their hands.
  • I need to get  Space Ranger Fred and the Shoelace Adventure in some stores
  • I need more illustrations drawn for the future books.
  • I need proper copyrights and trademarks.
  • I need to see kids laughing and learning.

Estimated funding for 8 books in 6 x 9 softback and a larger yet to be finalised hardback copy is $15,000 at this stage.  The books can also be turned into audio books for the blind and a professional voice-over artist has already agreed to assist with this making initial copies for blind charities worldwide at no cost. I have also been introduced to a company in Sweden that can turn the books into an interactive playbook that is more than just an APP. 

Next steps

The next step is to get the second book, Space Ranger Fred and the Umbrella Rescue, at least out there. The first book needs some tweaking and some volume printing and both books need to be marketed.  Ideally all this by November 2016.

The Dream

Space Ranger Fred has all the ingredients to become a TV show and an EMMY award winning TV Producer in the US has shown some interest in this. The books have potential to become a live action movie and that is the dream of any author. The book has massive potential and a parallel series about a young girl with a submarine is in the pipeline. Merchandising of Space Ranger Fred is planned with colouring books, toys and more. $15,000 kicks off the project.

With the right support not just financially but from the right people this project can change lives. 

Timeline

All of the above can happen quite fast with the required funding. Each book takes 4 to 6 weeks to complete with a further week to tweak.  Book launches can happen as soon as each book is released and within 12 months between 9 and 10 Space Ranger Fred books can be on the market helping young kids learn a few things and begin to love the joy of reading. Within 18 months the books can begin to be translated and from there who knows where Fred will end up. With early funding books can be made ready for some superb Christmas stocking fillers. 

Thank you

I thank you in advance for supporting this campaign, your support will impact and change many lives.  As the success grows many books will be donated to good causes (as many already have) and into areas or schools that are less advantaged than others - there is a massive element of giving back in this campaign and that has been my plan since day one.
story_txt:
IntroductionHave you ever experience true gratitude?  That is what started this amazing campaign - a hug from a child to say "thank you for reading to me"I am an author with a truly special book that has been so far funded on a shoestring and has now become passion.  Space Ranger Fred and the Shoelace Adventure has seen some outstanding reviews on Amazon and Goodreads and those who have read it want more and those who have heard of the book or have been in a school that I have read at want to head out and get their copy.  Radio interviews on World Book Day proved I had something special and a competition to win signed copies of the book had me in tears when the winners shared their photos and hugged me to say thank you.6 Year Fred Sanders AKA Space Ranger Fred has become my alter-ego and now lives alongside me. I have seen hundreds of young kids laugh as I read the book, I have had many come up and hug me after a reading. Space Ranger Fred is truly special and as an author I feel proud to be part of this adventure and truly making a difference in the lives of children today. My dream is to get children reading,  see them learn, get them to ask questions and let the adults around them realise that deep inside they too are still kids.  So, can I read you a story?  Once Upon a TimeI am Matt Newnham and Space Ranger Fred and the shoelace adventure started out by accident. A life changing event saw me quit my job and begin to write to earn an income and it was a freelance writing gig that got a little out of control that saw Space Ranger Fred come to life. Friends and Family saw what I had written and told me I had a massive talent. I took my basic manuscript and found some test readers on Facebook who made some suggestions but said overall it was a modern day fairy tale that was much needed today and that it had massive potential.The Mission BeganOver a period of 12 months I refined Space Ranger Fred, created some extra characters, added the magical teaching element - the bit lots of authors struggle to master and in this case tying shoelaces - and produced a final manuscript.  I thought it was pretty good and proceeded to send it to agents and publishers worldwide and after 3 months nothing came of it.  I decided to follow the self-publishing route and soon found another successful children's author who pointed me towards an amazing team who gave some great advice and these guys also said that Space Ranger Fred had massive potential - I had no idea how right they were!For the book to become a reality I needed a  few of things and this was not going to come cheap.  The first was illustrations and by chance I found Richie Williams who took my unedited manuscript and created some amazing illustrations that have potential for animation. I needed a professional editor and I soon found one who has really shaped the book and made the story the gem that is now is.  Finally I needed someone to create the book, put it together and get into a format that could be sold and I was introduced to the team that could do that.In a short space of about 6 weeks the book was complete and on 18th December 2015 the book hit the shelves of Amazon.Initial successWithin a few weeks my book had sold a few copies to family and friends and then the sales grew a little more. I needed reviews and the book was submitted to some professional book reviewers and the response was outstanding.  Five Star and Four Star reviews proved I had a winner, the words written convinced me that I could do this and personal notes from the reviewers all said that I needed to get this book out there along with those I had in my head out there too.The ChallengeWriting a book and getting it on Amazon is easy, but getting a book to sell, getting it seen by those who matter is not so easy and for self-published authors this is even more of a challenge because it all costs money. I am now in the place and have been for a few months and wanting Fred to blast off.When reading to schools or groups of children I can see the looks on their faces as they follow the story, pick up the lesson and giggle with laughter at the humour in the story. But when the book is finished they want more and that breaks my heart as I simply do not have the funds to print the books in large quantities or the power to get them into the bookstores where parents and kids buy books - although I have printed some in small quantities.Every day I am asked where the books can be purchased and  radio stations and other media outlets are waiting to do interviews with me but only when the book is available in bookshops and easily purchased beyond Amazon -  this underlines the need and purpose this campaign as kids want to read and reading is something that will impact their lives forever. More BooksI have 8 more books in the Space Ranger Fred series ready to go, with themes that include:
Doing the right thing
Telling the time
Bullying
The environment
What happens when a loved one dies
Asking for directions
Christmas Adventure
Counting
Sharing
All tricky topics for kids to grasp. I need funding to make this happen and impact the lives of kids around the world and this crowdfunding campaign gets that started.I have a young adult fantasy novel nearing completion and a more Girly adventure series similar to Fred about submarines and the environment,  On top of this I am co-writing a leadership book in the USA. Current PositionRecently I have found a book distributor who wants to help make my dream come true, the second book is only weeks away from being ready and placed on Amazon and the shoestring budget is just pulling it through, but again it will have limited reach.  The book distributor wants to make the book even more appealing for the right audience and make it so that parents will pick it up off the shelf in any bookstore anywhere in the world.  The distributor and agent has an excellent pedigree and works as much as possible with self-published authors with a view to growing them and getting their books not just sold but read, My agent is over the moon with Space Ranger Fred. And now the following needs to happen:
I need to market the book and the series well and make some noise.
I need the book to be printed in volumes so that kids can get it in their hands.
I need to get  Space Ranger Fred and the Shoelace Adventure in some stores
I need more illustrations drawn for the future books.
I need proper copyrights and trademarks.
I need to see kids laughing and learning.

I have also been introduced to a company in Sweden that can turn the books into an interactive playbook that is more than just an APP. Next stepsThe next step is to get the second book, Space Ranger Fred and the Umbrella Rescue, at least out there. The first book needs some tweaking and some volume printing and both books need to be marketed.  Ideally all this by November 2016.The DreamSpace Ranger Fred has all the ingredients to become a TV show and an EMMY award winning TV Producer in the US has shown some interest in this. story:
Story of My Book

Pre-Sale Fundraising Campaign with New Degree Press

When I was 20 years old and studying Healthcare Management and Policy at Georgetown University, my family was thrown at the mercy of the U.S. healthcare system. My mom’s chronic myeloid leukemia (CML), which was under control for eight years, suddenly spiraled out of control sending my mom, and my family at her side, in and out of the hospital for the next six months. The very system that I was studying to improve was now responsible for keeping my mom alive.

This immersive, challenging, heart-wrenching and deeply revealing experience, along with my formal education & experience, has given me a unique view of the American healthcare system, and how it cares for our nation’s sickest patients. This book explores the ways in which innovators and healthcare professionals are already striving to change the system in order to promote population wellness in the face of a national cost and quality crisis. Healthcare is ripe for disruption at the hands of those who dare to think differently. 

Exploring innovation at the intersection of health policy, medicine, and digital health technology, the book bridges the gap between fields that currently fail to work together in the support of our nation's patients. Through the lens of innovative digital health start-ups, big tech companies, entrepreneurs, highly respected policy researchers, actual patients, and my family's tragic story, this book shows how we can and will innovate to improve the system. The book highlights how innovators must focus on building solutions that solve problems at the patient's level to improve health and support wellbeing through a fundamental shift from reactive to proactive healthcare services.

This book discusses the hottest topics in healthcare reform and innovation, illustrating it all through the perspective of caring for an acutely ill patient. Throughout the book, the pressures and motivations driving modern healthcare in the U.S. are explored as new business models and solutions are introduced from an insider perspective. 

My name is Robert Longyear and I am the author of Innovating for Wellness. 

I wrote this book because it is time to change the ways in which we approach reforming the deeply flawed and broken healthcare system. We are all patients. And, at the crucial moment when we need its support the most, the healthcare system too often fails to provide it. It’s time to make important changes and to think differently about how we pay for and deliver care to our nation's sickest patients. 


My hope is that in reading this book you will catch a glimpse of the behind the scenes efforts being made to fundamentally alter and disrupt the way healthcare services are provided to patients, as well as to gain insights into how healthcare will look & feel in 20 years based on the innovations happening right now. 

In this book, I will illustrate the ways in which successful innovations and research can drive real improvements for patients and their struggle to navigate a system that was built not to keep people well, but to repair them once they are already sick. 

In this book, you will find several stories like these:

  • A new tech start-up that is changing the face of healthcare services and driving real positive change using a simple system
  • How big tech companies are already changing the way healthcare works
  • A mom, suddenly thrown at the mercy of the U.S. healthcare system, and the ways in which things could go differently in the future 
  • The man who has dedicated his life to changing the ways we pay for healthcare to incentivize health rather than revenue; the father of the Accountable Care Organization
  • A story of suffering, pain, and sickness turned into powerful lessons for the future of healthcare
  • The healthcare discussion from the streets of Washington D.C. 

 

If you work in healthcare, have ever been a patient, cared for a sick loved one, or are interested in the future of the industry; this book is for you. 

Innovating for Wellness is a non-fiction book that speaks to healthcare professionals, students, patients, caregivers, and those interested in the weird & complex world of healthcare. 

The Book - Innovating for Wellness

The book is written in five parts and is deeply anchored in engaging stories: 

Part 1: Introduction to the Problem, System, and Attempts to Solve Them

What is the problem? Why does healthcare cost so much? Why is it so complicated? What is happening behind the scenes right now?

Part 2: The Story: The Sickest Patient

"That's the day I will never forget. I was in the heart of one of the most advanced cancer research centers in the world, and, I knew, I was powerless to do anything. She's now sick, in the hospital, 700 miles away, and at the mercy of the U.S. healthcare system." 

Part 3: Payment Innovations

How does the healthcare business machine incentivize sickness? How can we incentivize doctors and hospitals to provide better care? How can we improve the ways in which we deliver care to patients by making small changes? How can we bring the cost of healthcare down? What is being done for the patient? 

Part 4: Digital Health Technology

With billions of dollars in Venture Capital funding, digital health is exploding. How can digital health change healthcare services? How can we use it to keep patients healthy? How can digital health solutions fundamentally change healthcare services and medicine? What are big tech companies doing?

Part 5: The Future of Healthcare

What will healthcare look like in 20 years? Why we should have hope for a better future?

What I Need & What You'll Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book.  

Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor--helping to create a riveting book
  • The cover design of my book (the mockups you see currently are a placeholder)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book--helping readers to navigate
  • The copy editing for my book--polishing the grammar and spelling 
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish it.

When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook to make it more accessible. 

When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

*Any Funds Raised in Excess will be donated to the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society to support patients like my mom. 

Exclusive Pre-Sale Offers

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • Your name will appear in a Special, Acknowledgements Section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the introduction of my book and parts of my manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback; be a part of the process and share your stories with me
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • A 30-minute call with the author, Robert
  • A Special Seminar to discuss the book 
  • More

About the Author

Robert Longyear is from Marietta, GA. Currently living in Washington D.C., he studied Healthcare Management and Policy at Georgetown University where he wrote his thesis on innovative health policy models used to improve healthcare services for America's sickest and poorest patients. He has worked as Director of Product Management at an innovative digital health technology start-up working to revolutionize the management of medication. He is currently a healthcare consultant developing innovative strategies for the health system. 

During his time at Georgetown, he flew back and forth between Atlanta and school after his mom's Chronic Myeloid Leukemia spiraled out of control and sent her into "Blast Crisis." Six months of navigating the health system, while studying it, proved to be an excellent teacher. The experiences taught him the importance of the people who dedicate their lives to providing care to our nation's sickest patients. This experience informs his work every single day. 

Robert has worked in health policy for a national managed care trade association, a leading Medicaid Research Institute, a top cancer research center, and an innovative digital health start-up. He has contributed to two clinical studies and has spoken at several conferences and events to promote and discuss innovation and research in healthcare. 

But, most importantly, he has been a caregiver for his best friend and mom as she fought for her life against a terrible disease. 


For more information, you can connect with Robert at robert.longyear26@gmail.com and https://www.linkedin.com/in/robert-l-longyear-i...

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up to date as my book hits each key milestone and reaches the publishing date.

You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

Other Ways You Can Help

Believe in the mission & message? Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help.

Here are a few ways you can support my publishing without a financial contribution:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, with your friends, family and your network. Please use #InnovatingforWellness and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts. You can easily share my pre-sale campaign page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book with a couple of friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it
  • Send me a note and let me know you are interested in what I have to say

Thank you for interest and support! 

Respectfully, 
Robert Longyear

story:
Short Summary

Living Free

Using holistic and natural approaches, I hope my reader can learn my best tips and tricks on how to ease their mind, control their anxiety or stress and take back their lives.

My name is Lauren Ogurek and I am the author of Living Free. I wrote this book because I know many people struggle with anxiety and other mental illnesses and are not sure how to cope with or overcome it. As a person who has struggled with anxiety on a daily basis, I figured out different ways to ease my mind and live a life of balance, well-being, and happiness.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover that you are in control of your destiny, this is your life and you write your story. Do not let your anxiety hold you back. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for living a life of balance and well-being in you. And then ultimately, I want you to see this book as a tool to help you take back your life and control your destiny. You are the author of your life and you have the power to write your story!

In this book, you'll learn about:

  • Mindfulness- How to control your thoughts, live mindfully in each moment of every day, and how to benefit from meditation and yoga practices.
  • The Law of Attraction - Learn about the Law of Attraction and the Power of Manifestation and how to use it in your life every day.
  • Diet - In this book I discuss how your gut health is directly linked to your mental health (the mind-gut connection), foods for the mind and body, important vitamins and minerals, and how much water you need each day.

 

You will love this book if you struggle with anxiety, or the related, and want to learn new ways to actively manage your mental health and live a life of balance, health, and happiness.

Living Free is a non-fiction book that speaks to people who are struggling with their mental health or those who are interested in living a life of health and wellness.

The book is written in 3 Parts....

Part One contains the Introduction + Chapter 1. In the intro, you will learn a little about my story and why I felt called to write this book. You will also learn a bit about the science of the brain and more on mental health statistics. Additionally, you will learn how to look at your life objectively and figure out what triggers you.

Part Two contains Chapters 2-14. Throughout these chapters, you will learn many different tips and tricks that have helped myself and many others actively manage their mental health which leads to happier and healthier lives. In these chapters, I discuss mindfulness, living an active life, diet, aromatherapy, spirituality, how to structure your life, how to control obsessive thoughts, the importance of reflection, how to use the Law of Attraction, and more. My hope is that you will learn new things that you can implement into your daily life.

Part Three contains Chapter 15 and a Guided Workbook. In the last chapter, I give some of my final thoughts, words of wisdom, and my hope for you. In the guided workbook, I share lists of foods, vitamins, essential oils, stretching routines, workouts, recipes, positive affirmations, and some other recommendations.
 

About the Process:

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor and I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2020.
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this Winter (2020).
  • When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition and an audiobook.

For those who want to be a Beta Reader: 

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish with a special note from me
  • Your name will appear in a Special Acknowledgements section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”)
  • Early access to the Introduction of my Book and my entire manuscript, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback and be involved in selecting my cover
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share experience the experiences of writing my book
  • And more...

 

About the Author:


Lauren Ogurek graduated in May 2020 with a degree in Business Management and Human Resources with a concentration in Psychology. She is passionate about health and wellness and is working on starting her own health and wellness company.

Lauren wrote this book because mental health is something that she is passionate about. After studying business and psychology, she realized how many people struggle with their mental health on a daily basis, especially in the professional world.

Throughout her college experience, she struggled with her mental health and anxiety in particular. Over the years, she tried to find different ways to manage her anxiety and live a life of balance, health, and wellness. Lauren is seeking to share her experiences and findings with others to help them enrich their lives wherever possible.
