For fandom writers, AO3 is an indispensable resource for sharing work. For fic readers, it’s a godsend; extremely easy to navigate and chock-full of everything you could possibly want to read. AO3 is a non-profit organization that relies on donations to run, and with everything it's done for our fandom and more, it definitely deserves to get a little something back from us. 
IMAlive is an online crisis network where 100% of the volunteers are trained in crisis intervention. It offers an online alternative to crisis hotlines, where talking over the phone might be too much for an individual to handle. Largely supported by the SPN Family, they’re also present at Creation’s Supernatural conventions and offer support to people who need it. Donations support volunteers and the network itself. 

Risks & Challenges
Right now, the project is in its final stages of being put together. All of the content has been gathered, and now it's just a matter of putting it into the book so everything can be properly formatted. The biggest challenge will be wait time in terms of getting everything printed and shipped out, and I'll be doing everything in my power to make sure it all runs smoothly once the campaign is over.

Other Ways You Can Help
The biggest way to help out is to spread the word! We want to get as many people interested in this project as possible, so spreading interest on any social media you have is a huge help. 
Our Participants
And now, a list of all our contributing writers.

story:
Short Summary

If you're reading this you probably already know who I am and what I do but if you're new to me and the unadulterated fiasco that is my life, here's the low-down...

My name is Cate Bolt, people like to call me Aunty Cate or CaBo. I'm just an average middle-aged mum of nine who started an orphanage in Indonesia. My orphanage is primarily funded by me sewing 'cunt' on soft furnishings... and selling pictures of my tits. I live in a Walking Dead themed converted school bus and I drive a hot pink Kombi...it matches my hair. I have a few tattoos and I tend to swear quite a fucking lot. 

Maybe I'm not what you'd call your 'average' humanitarian but I have saved lives. I've been to some of the darkest and most fucked up places - both physically and metaphorically. I'm best known, however, as the creator of the 'cunt cushion' that went viral... and the customer service smackdown queen.

For years now people have been asking me to compile all my best "Messages From People Who Don't Really Like Us Very Much" and other replies to mouth-breathers in a handy-dandy, take-anywhere compendium - and here it is.

What's This Book About?

As you may or may not know, I'm currently in the process of writing a "real book". This book is basically just foreplay... a pre-book book. This book will contain filthy fucking language, fairly frequent references to masturbation, possibly nudity and topics that are best avoided at family gatherings. It's the perfect gift for your kids this Christmas!

Dead Guys Don't Play Trumpet will feature a whole bunch of stuff I've posted on social media over the years, organised into sections on topics like customer service, parenting, depression, being 40+ and single... why I will die alone etc etc. Even though some of the subject matter is "heavy" it will overall be a lighthearted and (hopefully) funny read, interspersed with those classic CaBo 'smack in the feels' moments. It will also feature lots of pretty pictures, not only of my tits, and not be a normal paperback style publication... because fuck normal.

I'm still in the concept stage but at this point, I'm aiming for the book to be a bit larger than a standard paperback, and at least 124 pages of partial colour print. If you're familiar with my work at all, you'll know to expect something a little 'different'. I like to make pretty things :D

The book is available in three formats - paperback cover, hardcover with dust jacket and hardcover with imagewrap (no dust jacket).

Risks & Challenges

Because I'm self publishing this book I'm just looking to raise enough to print a small run of 100 copies. If I sell more than 100 copies on pre-order then, I'll print more. If I don't sell 100 copies on pre-order, then I won't be printing it at all! If you don't get in on the presale though, don't stress. Assuming we DO go to print, after the initial run you will be able to purchase an unsigned copy direct from the printers.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to order a copy of the book and you'd still like to help out, please feel free to share the campaign on social media and amongst your family, friends, work colleagues or parole officers. 

You can also make a contribution without buying the book, if you have some fundamental objection to publishing ... or books in general. I'm not judging you but that's kinda weird. OK, I am judging you. Please buy my book. It will be pretty. 

The profits from this book will be split between me and my humanitarian projects. Sometimes I like to eat, and food costs money, unless you steal it and I don't condone illegal activities. 

To back the project without buying the book just click the "back it" button and enter your donation amount.

Cheers fkn heaps, guys!

story:
Dottie’s Magic Pockets started a decade ago, with the mission to represent queer families in children’s media so our children – and their friends – had images they could relate to. 

First, we at Dottie’s Magic Pockets released a two-episode DVD, which went on to play in film festivals around the world and be embraced by thousands of kids. According to the Sacramento Examiner, “the only drawback in this groundbreaking video is that it’s not five hours long.” A few years later, we created a singalong adventure CD, The Super Secret Seashell Cave, with two dozen original songs that Cool Mom Pick called “cool kid entertainment … music and silliness for all kinds of kids, from all kinds of families.”

Though some progress has been made in children’s media since then, we are nowhere near where we should be! The number of gay families continues to rise, and since we are still overlooked by much of the mainstream media, we decided to create this singalong book: Who’s in Your Family?.

By bringing Who’s in Your Family?  into the world, we are not only adding a book to sit alongside our DVD and our CD, we are showing the powers-that-be that there is an audience for inclusive kids’ media – and maybe, just maybe someday Dottie will be the TV show we always dreamed it would be

I'm in! How can I help?

 You can pre-order a copy of the book and more now! All the money raised will help us cover the costs of production and delivery of the book along with other perks we've created for you.

Any amount of money helps us further this project—and the more people who contribute, the stronger we appear in the world of TV production! So please consider giving even five dollars. And after you do, please spread the love by sharing our IndieGoGo link below. 

Dottie Perks

 DOTTIE STICKER PACK - one sticker each of Dottie, Motilda, Randal, James and of course, Uncanny!

WHO'S IN YOUR FAMILY BOOK (PDF) - a bright and colorful PDF version of the book

WHO'S IN YOUR FAMILY BOOK - our brand new fun and engaging book

THE SUPER SECRET SEASHELL CAVE CD - a download of our fantastic sing-along CD with 16 original songs and an amazing journey to a seashell cave!

A SIGNED WHO'S IN YOUR FAMILY BOOK - Dottie will sign a personalized note to you or your little one!

DOTTIE'S MAGIC POCKETS POSTER - a colorful 11 x 17 poster of the whole gang! 

 

THREE ART PRINTS FROM THE BOOK - pick three images and will send you beautiful prints! Perfect decorations for a child's bedroom! Pick from the pages aboce.

A "DOTTIE" FAMILY PORTRAIT - our two talented illustrators will Dottify your family! Send us a family photo and they will make you part of the Dottie gang! (this will not ship in DEC 2017)

Spread the Magic

Because we are dedicated to making inclusive children's media available to all kids, we will be donating one book for every ten ordered. Our goal is to get 100 books into libraries all across the country! With your purchase we can make that happen!

If you are a parent, maybe you have a parent group you could post to—or your child’s school has a parent Facebook page or other group who would be interested in continuing to increase the empathy and compassion of children in a fun, engaging way! If you are a teacher or a librarian, maybe your library would like to carry a copy of Who’s in Your Family? If you are a grandparent, what better way to quietly support your child’s family than sending this book to your grandkids this holiday season? 

We created Dottie’s Magic Pockets for our kids and your kids. It’s a labor of love that is truly all about love. Thank you for spreading the love and being a part of it!

story:
Summary

 It's all about the music!  At least for me it is.  Like most Canadians, I am a music lover. Although I've never been an active participant such as a songwriter or musician, I always felt that I have missed out on something in my life by not being an active member of that special community.  Just like a song can trigger certain memories, I found that album covers could do the same.  When I was younger I would could hardly contain my excitement when , after purchasing a new album, I could now admire the artwork, review the liner notes and check out the credits of the band.  Now, in this digital age, it appears that the album cover has become a lost art.  I hope in some small way that I can renew your interest.  I started this project about five years ago as my personal commitment to help support Canadian musicians, and though there have been many times that I thought I would never finish a few kind words from friends and family, and a big shout out and thank you to Alan Cross, who without his support and advice, I likely would never have finished.

          Canadian Alternative & Indie is the first in a series from Rock My World Canada!  I do not profess to be a writer, so let's be clear about that!  The series is designed as a compilation of the history of each musician or band as shown by the studio album releases and a short biography.  This issue contains over 900 musical acts and over 3000 album covers from Canada's famous and not so famous musicians.  It's like going to the record store without going to the record store!  The goal is for you to discover something new as you view the pages, a musical act you might have never heard of, but for some reason that album cover has peaked your interest, and before you know it, you're on the internet checking it out. Alan Cross (The Ongoing History Of New Music, A Journal Of Musical Things) described the book like this: "If you’re at all into collecting/cataloguing/researching Canadian music, this pictorial discography—and the “pictorial” part of that description is very important in the digital era--will be immensely valuable. It’s fun to flip through, too, because it offers a new perspective on a whole universe of our music."

     

Support Canadian Music!
 

  • I am looking to raise $7500 to cover the cost of printing and editing.  Since I am self-publishing this book there are costs associated that a regular working guy like me just cannot afford. I have located a printer in Canada but need to raise the funds to get this first book done.
  • Contributors who donate $55 or more get a free copy of this issue - hopefully there will be ten more issues in the series.
  • All funds will go directly to this project.
  • So far I have been rejected by five publishing companies and even two self-publishing companies.  How does that work?  Well, their logic is that the content is free and available on the internet.  That's true and all of my research came from the internet.  I don't profess to be a writer but here's my argument - if you never heard of a band or musician, how would you know to look for them?  This project, including upcoming issues, is dedicated to promoting Canadian music.  Hopefully you find this a great tool for researching or referencing Canadian bands and artists, and find it an interesting collector's guide for rare and collectible releases.

 

Let's be honest - I don't expect this book, or subsequent issues to be bestsellers - it's a reference guide not just for collectors, but for all of us that want to know more about the music we love.  Canadian music from the likes of The Tragically Hip, Anne Murray, April Wine, The Guess Who, Bachman-Turner Overdrive - bands you know and love and hundreds more you have never heard of, across all genres - rock, jazz, country, metal, punk, blues, rap & hip hop  You're invited to a history lesson on Canadian music!  The total collection thus far includes over five thousand Canadian artists and over ten thousand album covers.  I hope you enjoy it as much as I did making it!

 

I know that not all who read this can contribute financially and that's ok.  Reach out to your Facebook and Twitter friends and help spread the word.  Make Some noise and support Canadian music!

story:
The King Bey Bible features poetry and essays from 25 women who have been touched in some way by Beyoncé. These works explore themes of motherhood, music, feminism, sexuality, and everything else under the sun.

We need this.

The world needs this.

You need this.

Each writer will be paid for her work. We need to cover honorariums, cover art commission, and publishing/distribution costs. As this will be independently published, we need your support to make it happen!

 

Editors are Feminista Jones (mental health social worker, sex-positive feminist writer, public speaker, and community activist) and Olivia Cole (author, blogger, and poet).

story:
Short Summary

In this book by celebrity psychic and angel channeler, Laura Powers, shares messages from 33 Archangels and other beings of light. The book provides info on each particular angel, their characteristics, how to know they are around, and how to ask for their help. There is also a section of the book that lists angels and light beings to call on for particular issues. For example, which beings specialize in health, manifesting, or abundance. The book also shares a channeled message from each being and real stories about them. The book is meant to help you get to know your higher level spirit guides so you can reach out to them with greater ease. These beings are so powerful, and asking for their help can help you shift your life quickly and easily. Getting to know these spirit guides is like having all the best friends in high places!

Here is what some of the beta readers have said about the book:

“Love love love this book. It will be my gift for everyone this year.”

“Thank you so much for writing this amazing book!”

“After I finished the book, I was taken to one of the references (Ask Angels) and decided to try and call on and look for my angels using the new information you shared. In just moments, multiple beings of light began to appear and I could finally see what I have been hearing for so long, and then it was coupled with intense feelings and instant knowledge.  It was a glorious experience and I was completely awestruck, intimidated, loved, scared, and mesmerized by the heavenly, magnificent beauty of the whole encounter.”

Who is Laura Powers?

Laura is a Celebrity Psychic who has been featured by Buzzfeed, NBC, ABC, CBS, FOX, Motherboard by Vice Magazine, The Jet Set TV show and many others. Laura is currently in production for a television show about her work and travels. She is the author of six books on the psychic realm with a 7th book, Archangels and Ascended Masters, to be published this year. She also hosts and produces a popular podcast, Healing Powers Podcast, on health and spirituality. Laura Powers is a clairvoyant, psychic medium, writer, actress, producer, writer, and speaker who helps other receive guidance and communicate with loved ones.  She travels nationally and internationally for clients, events, television appearances, and speaking engagements. Ever since she was a child, Laura has seen and sensed ghosts and spirits and she has learned how to manage those experiences, using this ability to connect with the angelic and other realms.  She now uses her experience communicating with angels, spirits, and other energy beings to help her clients better understand and change their lives.

To see Laura doing her work, you can watch this Buzzfeed video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2eq5Zw_wmzg. Here is a short video reel of several of Laura’s TV appearances: https://vimeo.com/37481605. For more information on Laura Powers psychic work, go to www.healingpowers.net.

What We Need & What You Get

Professional editing of the manuscript, cover photo and design by Penny O photography, printing by Create Space, and formatting of the book in ebook formats for the kindle and other ereaders (mobi and epub format).  This budget covers getting the book print-ready, printing, and epublishing only.  Every dollar we raise above the budget will be used to produce the audiobook and additional funds will be used to promote the book!

*Proposed budget of what your money will be used for:

·  Library of Congress Registration $50

·  Cover Design and layout $150

·  Printing and shipping $200

·  Formatting in electronic formats $100

·  Professional editing $300

Total print book estimates $800

·  Optional Audio Book Production $600 or more

Total budget $1400

Note: These are all estimated expenses

What You Get

In addition to the ebook and hard copy, various perk levels include Laura’s meditation program, free one-one-one psychic training sessions, and a free surprise angel gift!

The Impact

This will help me get this book out faster and with specific funds for marketing.  My other books have been successfully self- published and are selling well on amazon. This book is designed to be an introduction to very powerful angels and spirit guides who can help you shift your life in incredible ways!! You can find my other books on amazon here: https://www.amazon.com/Laura-Powers/e/B009HW4YRW

Risks & Challenges

Initial costs for publishing a book are expensive but this campaign will help me raise the money faster and get the book into the world more quickly! I am excited to get this book out in and this campaign will really help me do that. Since I have released many other books, the logistics of the release should come together smoothly.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help me get the word out, share on facebook etc!  Ask the angels to help me (really it works!).

Thanks in advance to everyone for their support!

The book also shares a channeled message from each being and real stories about them. The book is meant to help you get to know your higher level spirit guides so you can reach out to them with greater ease. These beings are so powerful, and asking for their help can help you shift your life quickly and easily. Getting to know these spirit guides is like having all the best friends in high places!
Here is what some of the beta readers have said about the book:
“Love love love this book. It will be my gift for everyone this year.”
“Thank you so much for writing this amazing book!”
“After I finished the book, I was taken to one of the references (Ask Angels) and decided to try and call on and look for my angels using the new information you shared. In just moments, multiple beings of light began to appear and I could finally see what I have been hearing for so long, and then it was coupled with intense feelings and instant knowledge.  It was a glorious experience and I was completely awestruck, intimidated, loved, scared, and mesmerized by the heavenly, magnificent beauty of the whole encounter.”
Who is Laura Powers?
Laura is a Celebrity Psychic who has been featured by Buzzfeed, NBC, ABC, CBS, FOX, Motherboard by Vice Magazine, The Jet Set TV show and many others. Laura is currently in production for a television show about her work and travels. She is the author of six books on the psychic realm with a 7th book, Archangels and Ascended Masters, to be published this year. She also hosts and produces a popular podcast, Healing Powers Podcast, on health and spirituality. Laura Powers is a clairvoyant, psychic medium, writer, actress, producer, writer, and speaker who helps other receive guidance and communicate with loved ones.  She travels nationally and internationally for clients, events, television appearances, and speaking engagements. Ever since she was a child, Laura has seen and sensed ghosts and spirits and she has learned how to manage those experiences, using this ability to connect with the angelic and other realms.  She now uses her experience communicating with angels, spirits, and other energy beings to help her clients better understand and change their lives.
To see Laura doing her work, you can watch this Buzzfeed video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2eq5Zw_wmzg. Here is a short video reel of several of Laura’s TV appearances: https://vimeo.com/37481605. For more information on Laura Powers psychic work, go to www.healingpowers.net.

Professional editing of the manuscript, cover photo and design by Penny O photography, printing by Create Space, and formatting of the book in ebook formats for the kindle and other ereaders (mobi and epub format).  This budget covers getting the book print-ready, printing, and epublishing only.  Every dollar we raise above the budget will be used to produce the audiobook and additional funds will be used to promote the book!

·  Printing and shipping $200
·  Formatting in electronic formats $100
·  Professional editing $300
Total print book estimates $800
·  Optional Audio Book Production $600 or more
Total budget $1400

What You Get
In addition to the ebook and hard copy, various perk levels include Laura’s meditation program, free one-one-one psychic training sessions, and a free surprise angel gift!

The Impact
This will help me get this book out faster and with specific funds for marketing.  My other books have been successfully self- published and are selling well on amazon. This book is designed to be an introduction to very powerful angels and spirit guides who can help you shift your life in incredible ways!! You can find my other books on amazon here: https://www.amazon.com/Laura-Powers/e/B009HW4YRW

Risks & Challenges
Initial costs for publishing a book are expensive but this campaign will help me raise the money faster and get the book into the world more quickly! I am excited to get this book out in and this campaign will really help me do that. Since I have released many other books, the logistics of the release should come together smoothly.

Help me get the word out, share on facebook etc!  Ask the angels to help me (really it works!).
Thanks in advance to everyone for their support!

story:
Set to be released in the summer of 2017, this collection of essays covers the wide range of Rollin’s career from 1968’s LE VIOL DU VAMPIRE through his 2010 swansong, LE MASQUE DE LA MÉDUSE, touching upon his horror, fantasy, crime and sex films—including many lesser seen titles. The book closely examines Rollin’s core themes: his focus on overwhelmingly female protagonists, his use of horror genre and exploitation tropes, his reinterpretations of the fairy tale and fantastique, the influence of crime serials, Gothic literature and the occult, as well as much more.

"Rising out of the smoky Parisian Mai 68 shrapnel and claiming his stake as the first French vampire movie director, the inimitable father of European Horrortica, Jean Rollin (1938-2010) has smudged the painted face of surrealist cinema for over five decades. Dragging his roots from beneath the Letterist/Situationist movements, avant-garde theatre, Belgian fine art groups and entwining them around the minds of sexual revolutionaries, the European comic book cognoscenti, the Parisian free jazz and rock scene, Rollin stopped at nothing to bring his macabre phantasies of zygotic vampirism and back-ward blood cults to Gallic cinemateques and beyond." - Andy Votel, Finders Keepers Records

LOST GIRLS is the third book in Spectacular Optical’s ongoing series of limited run film and pop culture books, which includes KID POWER! (2014) and SATANIC PANIC: POP CULTURAL PARANOIA IN THE 1980s (2015) and will precede the previously announced YULETIDE TERROR: CHRISTMAS HORROR IN FILM AND TELEVISION, which will be released in fall of 2017.

Curated and edited by Samm Deighan (DIABOLIQUE), contributors to LOST GIRLS include some of the most important critical voices to emerge over the last decade of genre journalism: Alexandra Heller-Nicholas (SENSES OF CINEMA), Kat Ellinger (DIABOLIQUE), Virginie Selavy (ELECTRIC SHEEP), Alison Nastasi (SATANIC PANIC: POP-CULTURAL PARANOIA IN THE 1980s), Marcelline Block (ART DECADES), Rebecca Booth (DIABOLIQUE), Michelle Alexander (CINEMADROME), Lisa Cunningham (THE LAUGHING DEAD: THE HORROR-COMEDY FILM FROM BRIDE OF FRANKENSTEIN TO ZOMBIELAND), Heather Drain (DANGEROUS MINDS), Erin Miskell (THAT’S NOT CURRENT), Gianna D’Emilio (DIABOLIQUE) and Kier-La Janisse (HOUSE OF PSYCHOTIC WOMEN), as well as veteran horror journalist Marcelle Perks (SHIVERS, EYEBALL).

Our cover art and chapter headings are being created by illustrator Jessica Seamans, known for her work with Landland and posters for MONDO. Below is the final artwork for the book's cover, featuring the Castel Twins among a combination of imagery from Rollin's films Fascination and La Rose de Fer:

Page Samples (chapter headings not final):

FULL LIST OF CONTENTS:

Le viol du vampire and the Last Surrealist Riot
By Gianna D’Emilio

Cults of Decadence, Cults of Rebellion: La vampire nue and Fascination
By Kat Ellinger

Les paumées du petit matin: A View of Female Violence
By Lisa Cunningham

Blood Sisters: Female Intimacy in Jean Rollin’s Conte de fée
By Samm Deighan

Poète maudit and cinéaste paria: Tristan Corbière as Inspiration for Jean Rollin’s films Les Amours jaunes and La Rose de fer
By Marcelline Block

Disgracing the Family Name: Vampirism as Societal Rebellion in Le frisson des vampires
By Heather Drain

‘Castles of Subversion’ Continued: From the roman noir and surrealism to Jean Rollin
By Virginie Selavy

Les démoniaques: Politics, Poetry, and the Supernatural Rape-Revenge Film
By Alexandra Heller-Nicholas

Manifestations In The Physical Plane: Rollin, Rape, and the Effects of Sexual Assault
By Erin Miskell

Phantasmes: Jean Rollin’s Hardcore Reveries and Work for Hire
By Samm Deighan

“Final Girl” Strategies in Les raisins de la mort, La nuit des traquées, and Les paumées du petit matin
By Marcelle Perks

The Zombie-Gore-Disaster Film…Jean Rollin Style
By Michelle Alexander

Love Among the Iron Roses: The Cemetery as a Romantic Nexus in the Films of Jean Rollin
By Alison Nastasi

Les trottoirs de Bangkok and Killing Car: Serials in Soulless Cities
By Gianna D'Emilio

Ostension, Orality, and the Ogress: The (Material) Feminist Fairy Tales of La fiancée de Dracula, La nuit des horloges, and Le masque de la Méduse
By Rebecca Booth

Afterword
By Kier-La Janisse

The funds raised here will go specifically toward printing costs and artist fees – not only designer fees, but all contributors to the book receive royalties on every copy sold. Part of our goal with Spectacular Optical is to create a small but sustainable business that is able to pay artist fees to the many awesome (and often underpaid) writers and graphic artists working in our field, and to give them books they are proud of. Any writers who contributed to our last books, KID POWER! and SATANIC PANIC: POP-CULTURAL PARANOIA IN THE 1980s can vouch for us on this count.

If we don't reach our goal, the book will still be printed and perks will still be delivered - the book is completely written and copy-edited, contracts have been signed, photographs have been sourced and the book is being laid out. We’re well on our way! But pre-sales through Indiegogo ensure the necessary cash flow to keep everything in the allotted timeline so that we can take advantage of promotional opportunities through the busy upcoming festival season. Our goal is to debut the book at the Fantasia International Film Festival in July 2017.

LOST GIRLS will be a beautiful 6X9", perfect-bound book, roughly 400 pages and heavily illustrated throughout with stills, posters, ads and other visual ephemera related to Rollin's films. If we meet our goal, the book will be printed in full colour. If we don't meet our goal, it will be in B+W with an extensive full-colour section. So if you want your book to be in full colour, please help us spread the word about the campaign so we can get the number of pre-orders we need to make that happen.

Perks are unique added incentives to support the book now; they are free gifts you get with contributions of anything over the basic cost of the book - and some of them are pretty spectacular!

Jessica Seamans who has done our cover art will also be creating the artwork for one of our most unique perks - available in a limited edition of only 50 copies - a full-sized Rollin-themed mystery boardgame! A familiar 'whodunit' game will be given the Rollin treatment, complete with kooky cousins, sinister twins, crypts, coffins, candelabras, a secret passageway behind the grandfather clock and more! All lovingly rendered in Jessica's inimitable illustrative style and professionally manufactured for long-term enjoyment. We've also just confirmed the individual weapons pieces for the game are going to be sculpted by British FX artist Dan Martin, who does the effects for Ben Wheatley’s films, was the effects supervisor on Human Centipede 2, and created the custom cameras used to film Harmony Korine’s Trash Humpers.

Below are some initial rough sketches, and the first complete character card (Isolde from Le frisson des vampires) and room (the master bedroom, also from Le frisson des vampires)!

Here's a short video of FX artist Dan Martin sculpting one of the weapons pieces!

Other perks include Spectacular Optical T-Shirts, Rollin blu-ray box sets from Kino Lorber, Rollin soundtrack CDs from Finders Keepers, books from fellow publishers Headpress, festival passes and tickets to Monster Fest (Melbourne), Fantastic Fest (Austin) and Fantasia (Montreal), season passes to The Miskatonic Institute of Horror Studies - London and subscriptions from horror streaming platform Shudder (now available in three countries - US, UK and Canada - and counting!).

And most exciting of all for those who want the true interactive Rollin experience:

Tour de sang: The Rollin Locations Tour
A three-day tour held approximately September 11-13 2017, through eight French locations from Rollin’s films, including chateaux, cemeteries and more from Levres de Sang (Lips of Blood), Les Frissons des Vampires (Shiver of the Vampires), La Rose de Fer (The Iron Rose), La Vampire nue (The Nude Vampire), Requiem for a Vampire and Rollin’s beloved Dieppe beach, which appeared in many of his films. The tour will begin and end in Paris, and will NOT include airfare, but will include ground transportation to the locations, any entry fees to the locations and two overnight hotel stays as well as admission to L'Etrange Festival in Paris  (currently scheduled for Sept 6-17, 2017). This is a once in a lifetime opportunity, so meet us in Paris and come join us on the tour!

 

LOST GIRLS will be an integral contribution to the legacy of Jean Rollin - it will be the most comprehensive book to date on his unique film world, and the first written from an entirely feminist perspective. This is important because Rollin's films have traditionally been viewed as objectifying women; instead, LOST GIRLS posits that through his female protagonists and monsters, Rollin's films explore themes of female friendship, expressions of sexuality, and the elusive search for freedom in a restricted world. 

In just a few short years, Spectacular Optical has garnered a reputation for making quality books that showcase underappreciated or under-examined aspects of pop culture - and we hope to make many more. This is the third book being published under my own imprint (we also have a fourth, YULETIDE TERROR, coming later this year) but I have managed many projects at this scale - from running film festivals to operating my own microcinema. And aside from whatever skills, experience and connections we bring to the table (you can read our full bios below), we’ve also been mentored all along the way by the British cult film publisher FAB Press - so we have some good people on our side making sure we don’t fall.

About Spectacular Optical:

Owned and operated by film writer and programmer Kier-La Janisse (HOUSE OF PSYCHOTIC WOMEN) with managing editor Paul Corupe (Canuxploitation.com), Spectacular Optical is a Canadian indie press that specializes in film and pop culture books, in addition to featuring articles, essays and interviews on the Spectacular Optical website on a year-round basis.

Samm Deighan is the Associate Editor of Diabolique Magazine and co-host of their Daughters of Darkness podcast. She's contributed to Blu-ray releases from companies like Arrow Video, Mondo Macabro, and Indicator. Her book on Fritz Lang's M is forthcoming in 2018 from Auteur Publishing.

 

Kier-La Janisse is a film writer and programmer, Editor-in-Chief of Spectacular Optical Publications, founder of The Miskatonic Institute of Horror Studies and the Festival Director of Monster Fest in Melbourne, Australia. She has been a programmer for the Alamo Drafthouse Cinema and Fantastic Fest in Austin, Texas, co-founded Montreal microcinema Blue Sunshine and founded the CineMuerte Horror Film Festival (1999-2005) in Vancouver. She is the author of A Violent Professional: The Films of Luciano Rossi (FAB Press, 2007) and House of Psychotic Women: An Autobiographical Topography of Female Neurosis in Horror and Exploitation Films (FAB Press, 2012), and has contributed to the books Destroy All Movies!! The Complete Guide to Punks on Film (Fantagraphics, 2011), Recovering 1940s Horror: Traces of a Lost Decade (Lexington, 2014) The Canadian Horror Film: Terror of the Soul (University of Toronto Press, 2015) and We Are the Martians: The Legacy of Nigel Kneale (Spectral Press, 2015). In addition to her work on forthcoming Spectacular Optical books LOST GIRLS and YULETIDE TERROR, she is currently writing A Song from the Heart Beats the Devil Every Time about children's programming and the 60s counterculture, as well as a monograph about Monte Hellman's Cockfighter.

 

The creator of Canuxploitation.com, Toronto-based writer and editor Paul Corupe has been exploring and documenting the secret history of Canadian genre movies for more than 15 years. A regular contributor to Rue Morgue magazine, he is has also written about film for The Toronto Star, Take One Film and Television in Canada and Cinema Sewer, among others.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just because you can’t contribute financially doesn’t mean you can’t help! It would be a great help just to post a link to our campaign on Facebook, Twitter and/or other social media using the Indiegogo share tools - and encourage others to share the link too!

story:
MY STORIES ARE MY PASSION

It is my dream to publish my spiritually based fiction. I write feature articles about how the world is undergoing a powerful change in which light and darkness are both growing stronger. I am astounded at how many people are intensely interested in this, and in the personal growth required to cope with this change. I admire the readers who have connected with me and want so much to provide them with fiction, parables and stories, that are well-written and enjoyable, while helping them on this journey.

Do you believe that books can fix the world?

Writing fiction is my passion. It’s a spiritual channeling that tells the stories of our humanity and our collective subconscious. And I believe that stories can fix the world.

My stories are about personal transformation, understanding the miracle of life we are here to discover and be a part of. It’s the product of the unique journey I have been blessed to travel: as suburban New Jersey boy, Manhattan biker-chef of five-star French restaurants, dairyman, IDF reservist, student of Torah, husband, father, and published author and journalist. You can read one of the stories that thousands have already enjoyed on my regular column at Breaking Israel News.

WHO IS IT FOR?

These stories are for spiritual people from all faiths who believe in fixing the world.
They believe in the magic of the Self. The more they listen to that inner voice, the more it gives them the power to dream, create, and live their lives from a place of simplicity. This is what changes the world.  

WHY SUPPORT SPIRITUALLY-BASED FICTION?

My readers are not moved by stories about power, wealth, or physical gratification. They are looking for a higher aspect of their humanity. They have a demand for spiritually-based fiction that is not being met by mainstream publishing. My writing comes from that place and speaks to them on a deep level.

We are living in very special times. And my readers have a powerful inner voice that they hear calling out to them. It’s the voice of the human spirit. People who believe in that inner voice can now support a kind of writing that expresses this powerful voice.

YOUR OPPORTUNITY

So if you connect to this, then I want to make my powerful stories available to you. This is an opportunity to help create my upcoming short-story collection, Dolphins on the Moon. By joining my campaign, you will become part of a special community. As you already know, a good book creates a new consciousness shared by all its readers, wherever they are.

$5000 will bring Dolphins on the Moon into the hands of the dreamers who wish to fix the world. This represents our budget for copy editing, proof reading, book design, cover design, a first print edition for pre-orders, e-publishing, and setting up print-on-demand for ongoing sales.

And this is only the beginning, because other collections and novels will be forthcoming in future campaigns.  

ACT NOW

I invite you to pre-order Dolphins on the Moon at a special discounted price of $10 during this campaign.

MY STORIES ARE MY PASSION
It is my dream to publish my spiritually based fiction. I write feature articles about how the world is undergoing a powerful change in which light and darkness are both growing stronger. I am astounded at how many people are intensely interested in this, and in the personal growth required to cope with this change. I admire the readers who have connected with me and want so much to provide them with fiction, parables and stories, that are well-written and enjoyable, while helping them on this journey.
Do you believe that books can fix the world?
Writing fiction is my passion. It’s a spiritual channeling that tells the stories of our humanity and our collective subconscious. And I believe that stories can fix the world.
My stories are about personal transformation, understanding the miracle of life we are here to discover and be a part of. It’s the product of the unique journey I have been blessed to travel: as suburban New Jersey boy, Manhattan biker-chef of five-star French restaurants, dairyman, IDF reservist, student of Torah, husband, father, and published author and journalist. You can read one of the stories that thousands have already enjoyed on my regular column at Breaking Israel News.
WHO IS IT FOR?
These stories are for spiritual people from all faiths who believe in fixing the world.They believe in the magic of the Self. The more they listen to that inner voice, the more it gives them the power to dream, create, and live their lives from a place of simplicity. This is what changes the world.  

WHY SUPPORT SPIRITUALLY-BASED FICTION?
My readers are not moved by stories about power, wealth, or physical gratification. They are looking for a higher aspect of their humanity. They have a demand for spiritually-based fiction that is not being met by mainstream publishing. My writing comes from that place and speaks to them on a deep level.
We are living in very special times. And my readers have a powerful inner voice that they hear calling out to them. It’s the voice of the human spirit. People who believe in that inner voice can now support a kind of writing that expresses this powerful voice.
YOUR OPPORTUNITY
So if you connect to this, then I want to make my powerful stories available to you. This is an opportunity to help create my upcoming short-story collection, Dolphins on the Moon. By joining my campaign, you will become part of a special community. As you already know, a good book creates a new consciousness shared by all its readers, wherever they are.
$5000 will bring Dolphins on the Moon into the hands of the dreamers who wish to fix the world. This represents our budget for copy editing, proof reading, book design, cover design, a first print edition for pre-orders, e-publishing, and setting up print-on-demand for ongoing sales.

story:
*NOW WITH A FOREWORD BY BLACK FRANCIS*



I Formed a Band.

10 years ago, with my friends, I formed a band called Art Brut. We have a new album out later this year. It has been quite a while since our last record. So, to get yourself reacquainted with us, I suggest you buy this book, my memoir.

I've spent the last three years writing 'I Formed a Band'. The story begins with me playing the vacuum cleaner on stage in Poole, and ends up with Art Brut recording Art Brut VS Satan with Black Francis in Salem, Oregon

In between you will discover the answers to these questions.

  • Just how hard did I kick Paul McCartney when I met him?
  • What colour did Russell Senior from Pulp try and make me sing in?
  • Which of Art Brut's songs is Liam Gallagher's favourite, and did Oasis really sing a Half Man Half Biscuit song at me? Or was it a psychotic episode?
  • What is it like to get into a fight with The Magic Numbers, Kele from Bloc Party and various members of The Bravery? (luckily not all at the same time).
  • What question did Conan O'Brien ask Jasper Future that he didn't know the answer to?
  • Why does Al Jourgensen from Ministry think I am a famous singer called Franz Ferdinand with a hit single about my penis?
  • What valuable lesson did I learn from Anton Newcombe at the Red Rocks Amphitheatre Colorado?
Plus much, much, more...

The Book.

I recently wrote for Litro magazine about how my aim is to be the grown up William Brown from the Just William series of books. 
You can read that article HERE

As you can see from the cover, this book brings me a step closer to that goal and like a Just William book, 'I Formed a Band'  also contains internal illustrations of some of the trouble I get into.

Indie Supergroup of Illustrators and Editor.

Because 'I Formed a Band ' is a book that is very passionate about the joys of being in a band, I wanted everybody working with me on it to have experienced that joy themselves. So I built a supergroup.

The  BRILLIANT cover of the book is drawn by the WONDERFUL Steve Horry from the INCREDIBLE 586, the IMMENSE internal illustrations are by the MARVELLOUS Katie Pope from the AMAZING Just Joans and the book is SUPERBLY edited by the AWESOME Simon Indelicate from the FANTASTIC Indelicates

A team of people so great I nearly ran out of hyperbole to describe them.


What You Get For Contributing.

Book Perk. £20

A signed, stamped, numbered first edition of 'I Formed a Band' plus a randomly selected printed postcard of a scene from Eddie's life drawn by Katie Pope from the Just Joans.

Only books sold through the indiegogo campaign will be signed, stamped and numbered. Postcard is also exclusive to the campaign.

POSTAGE  TO ANYWHERE  IN THE WORLD IS INCLUDED IN THE PRICE.


Book and Painting Perk. £40
I love ISBN numbers, I once made one for myself and painted it over a forest scene.



If you buy the book and painting perk you recieve a painting of the ISBN number of the book you have funded as a forest scene in acrylic on canvas 12.7cm x 17.7cm

 A signed, stamped, numbered, dedicated first edition of 'I Formed a Band' plus a randomly selected printed postcard of a scene from Eddie's life drawn by Katie Pope from the Just Joans.

Only books sold through the indiegogo campaign will be signed, stamped and numbered. Postcard is also exclusive to the campaign.

POSTAGE  TO ANYWHERE  IN THE WORLD IS INCLUDED IN THE PRICE.


The Outlaw Perk. £100

If you buy the Outlaw perk you have your name in the back of the book (and all future editions) as one of Eddie Argos gang of Outlaws and a Patron of The Motherfucking Arts.

You also receive a Membership card to prove you are one of Eddie's Outlaws*

A Larger acrylic painting on canvas (30cm x 40cm) of the ISBN number of the book you have just funded as a forest scene.

Plus the signed, stamped, dedicated, numbered, first edition book and the postcard.

Only books sold through the indiegogo campaign will be signed, stamped and numbered. Postcard is also exclusive to the campaign.

POSTAGE  TO ANYWHERE  IN THE WORLD IS INCLUDED IN THE PRICE.

*Membership card has no benefits - except to make you the envy of your peers!

Follow the Campaign.

For updates, deleted scenes from the book and more.
Thank you very much. Eddie Argos.

story:
Short Summary

alt.theatre: cultural diversity and the stage is a not-for-profit professional theatre journal published by Teesri Duniya Theatre in Montreal — an intercultural theatre company with a mandate to produce socially engaged theatre that reflects Canada’s social and cultural diversity.  We are the definitive sources for information on new and alternative directions in theatre and dramaturgy; profiles of artists and companies; critical reviews of books, plays and productions; and comparative analyses of national and international approaches to cultural diversity and the arts.  Our articles reflect the diversity of interests of contributors which includes established and emerging artists, academics and students of theatre, social activists, and members of the general public interested in the ways in which cultural plurality is shaping the performing arts. alt.theatre is committed to publishing the voices, analysis, and experience of both established and emerging artists and thinkers.  Our coverage extends from the “mainstream” to the “margins.”  We have become essential reading for anyone claiming conversance with Canadian theatre.

In this campaign, we are raising funds to allow us to explore under-researched areas of cultural plurality and the arts through the creation of special theme issues. We have done this before with issues such as our two-part issue Oral History and Performance in 2011 and our upcoming Gender and Theatre at the Margins. This next issue takes us on a journey across gender, races and sexualities.

We Need

The support from this campaign will help to pay fees for the contributors and photographers from across Canada and around the globe who will research and develop pieces for our special issues. These key topic issues exceed the length of our normal issues and thus we require a larger than normal budget to accommodate the higher design and printing costs.
 
We are asking for $2,000 in order to ensure the future of special alt.theatre issues.. 

You Get

$ 250 – receive signed copy of Bhopal and your name in the fall issue of the magazine; 

$100 – receive one-of-a-kind designed silk scarf and your name in the fall issue of the magazine; 

$ 50 – one year sub ($30 tax receipt) and your name in the fall issue of the magazine;

$25 – your name in the fall issue of the magazine and a ‘signed’ copy of the special issue.
 
$10 - your name in the fall issue of the magazine

The Impact

Your contribution to this campaign will allow us to make new strides toward the convergence of art, activism and research. Our special issues are a venue through which we can put a spotlight on traditionally underserved and marginalized areas of performance and thought, and where we can give voice to innovative individuals and communities. The work produced by alt.theatre and our diverse contributors has the potential to make an enormous impact: articles from alt.theatre are used in course packs across Canada and internationally, and have become a key reference for researchers, librarians, and artists

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help with a donation, please consider subscribing to the magazine if you do not already. The more paid subscribers we have the more solid our financial picture.  Your support provides the foundation we need to sustain the magazine – the more people who read the magazine the more the funders and financial supporters will help us as well. You can also help by sharing the campaign. 

The more people we reach, the greater our chance of success!

Thank you for your support!

story:
Who am I? 

 

   My name is William Wright. I am the author of Woo Her The Wright Way - Be the Man Every Woman Wants (c) 2013.

   I wrote this book to share effective concepts that “Any Man” can easily follow to create a positive, passionate, loving and long lasting relationship with the woman he desires.   

   I started writing the book while I was going through a rough time period in my own personal relationship.   The realization that I came to was it is partially my own fault and I had to take responsibility and fix it.   I discovered there are many ways for a man to win the heart of the woman he desires, forever.  

   I have enthusiastically experimented with these ideas and the rewards have been tremendous.  These concepts are simple to learn and easy to use.

 

Who is this book is for?

 

   This book is for All men.  If you are looking to meet a woman or you have been married for fifty years, the easy to follow ideas in this book can create or renew your relationship with the woman you love.  With all the technology and the fast paced lives we lead in the twenty-first century, the later generations of men have not been taught the basics. 

   Become the kind of man women want to date and marry.

  

 Who can benefit from the book?  

 

   Both men and women will benefit.

   All men can benefit from learning the helpful techniques to have the love of the woman they desire.  You will gain more pleasure from an exciting, loving and long lasting relationship then you thought possible. 

   Women will reap the rewards by having a passionate as well as heightened emotional and physical connection with your man.

   When was the last time you got a text from your girlfriend/wife randomly in a day saying “Just thinking of you makes me smile?”  Would you like to?

 

Basis of the book  

 

1)  Having a woman fall in love with you is a combination of emotional, physical and psychological factors.  Gain knowledge of the proper cues and techniques to earn her trust, love and passion. 

   Set yourself apart from previous men she has dated.  Learn how to set emotional and physical “feel good” buttons for her.  Grow individually and as couple. Every chapter is packed with practical information that will make her love you more.  

2)  You will also learn what it takes to build the exciting, loving, positive and long lasting relationship you want.

   

   The book is set around a group of 5 buddies having a Guy's Night Out.  They are talking about how much or how little they know about women.  My goal was to write the book similar to the way we would talk and express our points of view within an average group of guys. 

   It covers the psychological, emotional and physical aspects of growing a strong positive relationship from your first meeting to your fiftieth wedding anniversary.

   It is written in simple and easy to read language.  The book’s appeal is the sharing of amusing stories, stirring life experiences and simple yet extremely successful concepts that are easy to apply.

 

What is the reaction of the test readers?    

 

   I have studied, attended seminars, consulted with psychologists, relationship therapists, average men and women to confirm that the theories in this book are accurate.  I felt it was crucial the test readers included both men and women. 

   All the test readers’ reviews were not only positive but every single one felt these were valuable and practical ideas that could be implemented easily and successfully.

   I have very exciting reviews from relationship professionals that will appear on the back of the book.  They confirm the accuracy of the information and ease of use in the manner it is presented. 

 

Professional reviews to appear on back cover – (Full names will appear on book)

“William Wright has combined a Guys Night Out with keen insight into the nature of relationships.  The result is this book:  An accurate guide book for men on how to create the successful relationship you want.”

- PhD, Psychologist - Male

 

“I have been counseling couples for decades.  William Wright wrote the perfect book for men who desire a successful relationship but need some great and practical advice on how to build one.”

- LCSW, Marriage Counseling Specialist - Female

 

“William Wright shares the psychological aspects of relationships with accuracy and amusement.  This book breaks down the ideas in easy to understand language and even easier to implement concepts.”

- PhD, Psychologist – Male

 

Additional test reader reviews

 

 “Instead of taking a sneak peak into relationships, William Wright has pulled the curtain wide open for all men see.  I don’t know any woman who would not want their man to learn from this book.  Woo Her The Wright Way is a Winner.”

- Actress – Female

 

“William Wright has brought new meaning to The Study of Man.  This book addresses topics most men won’t admit they want to talk about and never do.  The lessons in this book are priceless. From the chronically shy to the most confident alpha male, there is something for everyone in this book.”

- Teacher - Male

 

What is the status of the project?  

 

The book is basically finished.  I am working on some final revisions.  I am hoping to raise enough money for this project because writing it is the only free part of the process. 

   I am investing what I can from my own funds but more money is needed.  The copy editing, proofreading, interior design, cover design, website design and implementation, printing, marketing, and promotional materials to create a quality product are surprisingly expensive.  I would also like to be able to attend at least one larger book convention this year, to promote the book.

 

 What are my goals?

 

- To release the book in the beginning of October/November 2013

- I would like to make the book available in multiple languages so I can include a diverse readership.

- I am very passionate about helping others to create happiness and success in their life.  My goal is to generate a series of books to help guide people in creating positive, healthier and more successful relationships in their lives. 

- If a book series is successful, I would then like to build a seminar series where people can participate in live exercises to enhance their relationship with their significant others.

- Ultimately I would like to be able to distribute my book around the globe and leave a positive imprint on this generation and those to come.

 

What if contributions exceed my goal amount?

 

  Any funds contributed beyond the goal amount will go toward marketing and promoting the book.  If this campaign is tremendously successful funds will go toward translating the book into multiple languages.

 

Are there additional ways I can help?

 

Yes.  It is vital to share information about the campaign with as many people as possible.  Even if someone can't donate, they might know someone who can.

- Share this link on your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and all your social networks.

- Spreading this link gives more people the opportunity to assist and to benefit.

  

Thank you all so much for you support, encouragement and generosity.  It is greatly appreciated.

What if contributions exceed my goal amount? 
 
  Any funds contributed beyond the goal amount will go toward marketing and promoting the book.  If this campaign is tremendously successful funds will go toward translating the book into multiple languages.
 
Are there additional ways I can help? 
 
Yes.  It is vital to share information about the campaign with as many people as possible.  Even if someone can't donate, they might know someone who can.
- Share this link on your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and all your social networks.
- Spreading this link gives more people the opportunity to assist and to benefit.
  
Thank you all so much for you support, encouragement and generosity.  It is greatly appreciated.

story:
Sharing My Story

Hi!  I'm Lynn Sanders, CEO/Founder of Park Avenue Marketing, LLC, and online host at Difference Makers Media.  My passion is telling and sharing inspirational stories that educate, inspire and transform our world.  
I've spent over 25 years promoting heart-centered entrepreneurs and causes through writing, videos and online media.  This story is one I never forgot.   
                                                
The "Dancing With Tex" Story...

Imagine a friendship between a man and a bird.                                                                      A friendship demonstrating the power of belief, faith and perseverance.                        A friendship that helped save the Whooping Cranes from extinction.

“Dancing With Tex – A Special Friendship,” is a vibrantly illustrated picture book that touches the mind and heart.  Children will treasure this story that raises awareness about our endangered cranes, and helps children realize we all can make a positive difference in the world.

*************************************************************************

The Impact 
Our minds get affected by what we see and hear.  We're often subjected to negativity in our news and movies.  Our world needs more inspiration, and this story can be the start for more "difference maker" stories.   
Over 30 years ago, this little-known story amazed audiences on the Johnny Carson show. Through this book, we will:  
  * Raise greater awareness about preserving and protecting our environment               * Motivate youth to recognize how each of us can make a difference                                 * Support the International Crane Foundation, the world's only sanctuary for all fifteen species of cranes.       
                                   

After costs are covered, I will give a portion of royalties back to the International Crane Foundation.  


What We Need & What You Get

To bring this story into publication, I need $10,000 to cover expenses.  The money will pay for a children's picture book illustrator, publishing fees, graphic layout, cover design and formatting, editing, copyright fees, marketing and promotional expenses.   

UNIQUE PERKS                        

 I'm excited to offer you unique perks... 

* Surprise goody bag of gifts -- inspirational music -- for ALL contributors!  

* Autographed copies of my book, "Dancing With Tex:  A Special Friendship" 

* My ebook of inspirational quotes, "Believe In Yourself." 

                            

* A caricature of you or a loved one by our talented caricature artist, Marlene Goodman.  

                                                          

* Multi-colored Japanese origami cranes - Made from 3"x3" recycled patterned paper in a wide array of styles.  Great for decorations.  Cranes are believed to bring good luck and happiness, and symbolize long life, fidelity and peace.

                             

* Artistic crane notecards and envelopes.

* A tour with me at the International Crane Foundation (see below).

                                  

* A RAFFLE FOR ALL CONTRIBUTORS AT THE $75 LEVEL OR ABOVE! 

Your contact information will be put in a basket for a drawing after February 28th. (Travel expenses not included.)  If you donate at the highest level, you'll still be eligible to give this gift to a loved one.  If you can't make the trip for the Fall of 2015, the prize will be passed on. Good luck!

1ST RAFFLE PRIZE -- A Tour At The International Crane Foundation in Baraboo, Wisconsin with author Lynn Sanders (TBD - Fall of 2015).  Includes a Hilton Hotel overnight stay, lunch & breakfast.  

* 2nd RAFFLE PRIZE - Custom Caricature  

* 3rd RAFFLE PRIZE -  Artistic "Dancing With Tex" notecards


My Credentials

For samples of my work, visit:  www.parkavemarketing.com

Watch our latest online shows:    http://bit.ly/1DXHBs2  

 http://bit.ly/1CNYiEM


Risks & Challenges

                                                         

My "Behind The Scenes" Story

It happened during a video shoot in 1995 at the International Crane Foundation. Off-camera, Dr. George Archibald told me about his friendship with Tex, a rare Whooping Crane.  I thought it would make a great children's book.

After years of effort and numerous rejections, the story eventually DID get accepted.  I was thrilled.  But then, the unexpected happened...

The publishing company ran out of money!  I kept going.  I collaborated on a children's musical to bring this story to life with music, choreography and humor. Here's a poster from the show.

                                    

"A Whooper's Tale:  The Incredible Story of Tex" was performed at the former Theatre Building Chicago in 2009. Book writer Jenny Stafford and composer Russ Coutinho did an outstanding job. I wrote the lyrics. We got rave reviews!     

As we seek sponsors, we'll also promote this story to raise environmental awareness.  Our story is intended to empower, motivate and inspire youth that we all can make a difference.  Ultimately, "Dancing With Tex" will provide the foundation for more empowering books in the future.  


Other Ways You Can Help

I'm grateful for your support in spreading the word on your social media sites. 

Please use the Indiegogo share tools. "Like" our Facebook page:  "Difference Makers Media."  Read our blog at:  www.DancingWithTex.wordpress.com.  Send out a tweet on Twitter or post a mention on LinkedIn or Google+.

Be A Sponsor!  We'll include an acknowledgement, half-page or full-page about you or your company if you're interested in collaborating with us.  The publisher will give us worldwide distribution!

                                               


Question:  Can I buy an extra book or a perk by itself?

Answer:  YES!  Please specify in your comments to me which extra perk you'd like to purchase.  Here's a breakdown:

Extra Printed Books:  At the $75 level, you can purchase a first edition, signed printed book for $30/each.  (Shipping included)

Caricature:  Add $80 (Shipping included)

story:
My name is Alexandra Lopes and I'm here to ask for your help in achieving my dream. I always had an active imagination and that lead to my love for reading and writing. 

I started writing when I was around fifteen. I was introduced to the world of fan-fiction and became hooked in a matter of hours. Then it only took me a little more to decide to write my own fan-fictions. I was rather unsure about it, but the support I got from my readers made me more confident in my work. Which lead to my desire to write my own novel. With their unwavering support I let my imagination run free and decided to write my own stories. 

I started with a few short stories that were never published anywhere. They were just an escape when I needed to relax a little. My major focus was still fan-fiction, mainly because I was mostly busy with school and later on with work.

However there was this idea that just wouldn't go away. It was in my mind day and night and I couldn't help myself, I had to put it on paper.

For the last couple of years I've been working on a novel, which I intend to make into a trilogy titled Unclaimed Throne. The first book, the one I'm working on, is named Exile.


It is a fantasy novel, dealing with royal families, politics, betrayal, and most of all the will of those who long for freedom.

It will take us to a world separated from our own since ancient times. A world where demons are more than figments of our nightmares.

Kyrian, our protagonist, always thought that he was just another teenage boy, who's biggest problem was finding a date for prom. However months before his eighteenth birthday dreams of blood, death, and betrayal tormented him. He ignored them, not knowing that they would turn his whole world up-side down.

After the murder of his girlfriend and the failed assassination attempt on his life, he found out the terrifying truth; he was the last of the Royal Bloodline.

With Zane by his side, they try to uncover just why he was being hunted and what was happening in the Demonic world of Laaery.

Their journey will take them all over the world, trying to stay ahead of those hunting them while they searched for the portal that would lead them to Laaery, and, hopefully, to safety.

(The cover isn't set yet, though this is one of the possibilities.)


As stated before I've been working on it for the last couple of years. Writing a book is not all about writing. I had to construct a whole new society, create a new language, and make another world. It's time consuming and exhausting, but very rewarding in the end.

However, as I said previously, writing consumes a lot of time. It requires a lot of work and dedication. Though, no matter how dedicated I am to my novel, I just don't have the time required to finish it. That is why I'm here.

I need you to help me raise 20.600 USD, so that I can take a year off and finish my book.

9.740 USD will be for printing the book.

1.370 USD will be for the shipping costs. Not only will I need to have the finished product shipped to me, but I will also need to ship the book to those who get the perks.

2.055 USD will be there in case something goes wrong with any of the books printed and new ones are needed.

4.695 USD will be for living costs.

2.740 USD will be for taxes, indiegogo cut, and any other costs that may appear.  


There are none. To all of those that will get perks I intent to use self-publishing to get you your books.

The long term goal is to have my book published, but I know that those things take time and may not even happen, so I will use self-publishing to make sure that all of you get your perks. It is the least I can do to thank you for all of your help. This dream of mine would never be possible without your help and I am truly grateful for it.


From my calculations I will take about a year to finish the book, so all of you will get your perks around mid 2015.

I can't give you an exact date. I may finish the book earlier than planned and then you'll have your perks sooner, but I can't be sure. The latest I believe would be August of 2015.

35 USD – You will get a soft cover book.

45 USD – You'll get a soft cover book with a personal dedication and autograph.

70 USD – You'll get a hard cover book.

150 USD – You'll get a hard cover book with a personal dedication and autograph. Along with my Skype contact where you will be able to ask me any questions you have about the book. As well as a preview for the second book in digital format.

650 USD – You'll get everything from the previous perk plus I will model one of the characters after you. They won't be a main character but they will be important to the story.

(For this to work I'll give you my Skype contact so we can go over how the character will be, it's only possible because they meet so many other people while they travel and I haven't decided how all of them are going to be, but as you can imagine the number for this will be quite limited.)

1500 USD – You'll get everything from the 150 USD perk and one of the main characters will be modeled after you.

(For this to work I'll give you my Skype contact so we can go over how the character will be. There are a lot of characters that will appear in the books. These characters will appear through the three books, mostly. There are one or two who will meet an unfortunate end before the second and third book but they are still very important to the story.)


 Well if you are unable to contribute financially, believe me I know that not everyone has the means to do so, you can always spread the word.

Share with your friends, family, or co-workers. In your social network or your blogs. Use the share buttons so that other people may know of the project.

Any help that you can provide is welcome and you'll have my eternal thanks.
