story:
1/29/2018 - DID YOU COME HERE FROM THE #WLMAF HASHTAG, OR A RELATED POST? Go see Franklin and Eve's latest book campaign here.

12/18 - WE DID IT! We met our goal. All three books, plus the two bonus e-books, will be published in 2015. More Than Two is available now; for purchasing information, go to the book page.

FINAL COUNTDOWN 12/15! For every contribution of $15 or more we receive between 12 noon and 11:59 p.m. today, Franklin or Louisa will write a blog post! Franklin explains on the More Than Two blog. Want to make them dance? Back us now!

NEW 12/12! We've added a new perk: For $15, you can receive a print book and e-book of a single Thorntree 2015 title. This perk is for the true fans out there who are here to support one author. ALSO! If we reach our goal, all backer paperbacks will be SIGNED!

NEW 12/8! If we reach our goal, all backers will receive two bonus e-books: Lessons to My Younger Self by Louisa Leontiades (illustrated by Tikva Wolf) and Coming Out Poly by Elisabeth Sheff. Find out more at our update video.

NEW 11/19! Refer your friends and get chance to be a guest character on Kimchi Cuddles! Find out more in our blog post.

 

Sex-Positive, Handcrafted Books.

 

 

Thorntree Press is a new, independent publishing company based in Portland, Oregon. We specialize in non-fiction books on relationships, love and sexuality, with particular focus on non-traditional relationship models. We're also focused on rational, evidence-based approaches to sex and relationships, as well as sharing real-life stories. Our first book, More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory, was published on September 2, 2014, after a successful Indiegogo campaign in the fall of 2013.

We're asking for your support funding the three books we have on the slate for 2015: two memoirs and an anthology, all by three well-known, highly regarded and previously published authors on polyamory.

 

Creator-Friendly.

Thorntree Press supports its authors with personal attention to detail and hands-on dedicated niche marketing, in addition to the high-quality editing and design standards expected from larger publishing houses.

We want to publish great books - without being assholes. That means we make our contracts as creator-friendly as possible. We don't take any rights we don't need to, and we only take those for a few years. Plus, by funding production costs up-front with crowdfunding, we're able to give much higher royalties than the bigger publishers - as well as creating advance buzz for sales. 

 

Who We Are

 

 

We are Franklin Veaux and Eve Rickert, the co-founders of Thorntree Press and the co-authors of More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory, published by Thorntree Press this year. Eve is a professional editor with experience in the book industry, and she owns a science communications firm in Vancouver, BC. Franklin is a writer and designer with more than 20 years' experience in printing and pre-press, and he runs a consulting business in Portland, Oregon. Together we successfully delivered on the Indiegogo campaign for More Than Two.

 

 

The Creators

We're thrilled to be publishing three well-known authors in 2015.

Dr. Elisabeth Sheff

 

 

One of just a handful of global academic experts on polyamory and the foremost international expert on children in polyamorous families, Dr. Sheff is an educational consultant and expert witness serving sexual and gender minorities. Last year she published The Polyamorists Next Door: Inside Multiple-Partner Relationships and Families, which showcased the results of a 15-year study on polyamorous families.

 

Dr. Sheff’s research explains the unique strategies polyamorists use in navigating their complex family lives and describes how they could prove tremendously useful for people in monogamous relationships, as well as other gender and sexual minorities like kinksters and people on the transgender spectrum. She lives in Atlanta with her girlfriend, their children, dog, cats, and the small wild animals the cats bring in.

 

Louisa Leontiades

A freelance writer originally from the UK, Louisa lives in an open relationship with her partners and two children in Sweden. She writes full-time on her blog, Postmodern Woman, and is chairwoman of the National Polyamory Association. She also writes for Huffington Post, Salon, Nerve, Jezebel and the Guardian. She lives a life that makes for a lot of stories.

 

 

 
Franklin Veaux

Franklin is the co-author of the groundbreaking new book More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory, and the author of the Web's top-ranked polyamory site, morethantwo.com. He is also the creator of Onyx: The Game of Sexual Exploration, maintains the sites xeromag.com, symtoys.com and thinkbeyond.us, publishes erotic fiction under the pen name William Vitelli, and is the co-founder of both Thorntree Press and the Vancouver, Canada-based sex toy R&D company Tacit Pleasures.

 

Tikva Wolf

Tikva is the creator of the popular polyamory Web comic Kimchi Cuddles. She's been drawing ever since I could hold a crayon. After undergoing many different artistic incarnations, she realized that what she primarily cares about in art (and life) is connecting to people, creating dialogue and spreading awareness.  She's always taken delight in making people laugh, and in doing so also unveiling hidden perspectives.  Comedy has the ability to transform heavy topics into something that’s easier to digest.  She uses humor as a way of being seen deeply, and as a way of encouraging others to deeply see themselves and each other.

 

 

The Books

Your contribution will support production costs - editing, design, proofreading and printing - for the three amazing books Thorntree Press has in the pipeline for 2015.

Stories from the Polycule: Real Life in Polyamorous Families

 

Stories from the Polycule by Dr. Elisabeth Sheff is an anthology of of work from people living in polyamorous families of all configurations, from solo poly people to live-in networks to elders, with or without children. The anthology will include both writing and visual art, and will range from a few sentences to several thousand words. Submissions are coming from children, tweens and teens growing up in poly families, to adults and elders. They deal with the day-to-day experiences of living polyamorously. (Scroll down to "Get involved" for information on contributing your story!)

 

The Husband Swap: A Memoir (second edition)

 

This is the true story of a couple that fell in love with another couple and tried to make it work as a polyamorous quad. With raw and intimate prose, Louisa Leontiades unflinchingly shares her story, with all the drama, passion, joy and conflict that goes along with it. Many will recognize their own experiences in her story, as she and her husband stumble for the first time to find a path to a sustainable polyamorous future.

This is the second edition of The Husband Swap, re-edited, redesigned and with new material.

 

The Game Changer: A Memoir

Franklin Veaux has written, in More Than Two and on his blog, about the "game-changing relationship": the relationship that changes you, and what you want from life, so much that it upsets what you'd thought were the stable, permanent, comfortable rules of the game. Game-changing relationships can make your life better, but change is hard - and it can be particularly hard for the other people in your life, who didn't necessarily sign on to having you change, and may feel left behind. They are, by definition, disruptive. They can be burdened by shame stemming from monogamous norms, and polyamorous people don't yet have good models for dealing with them.

Over a decade ago, Franklin had a game-changing relationship that changed his life and forever altered his thinking about polyamory (and the writings at morethantwo.com). The Game Changer will share that story, to help anyone who's ever experienced a game-changing relationship understand they are not alone, and there is a path through what may feel like madness.

 

NEW! Lessons to My Younger Self: A Companion Guide to The Husband Swap

Writing a memoir is an eye-opening experience. Looking back on her early mistakes now, with nearly a decade of experience in polyamory behind her, gave Louisa a chance to consider the mistakes she made and the people she hurt--and what she'd do differently if she had it to do over. Now she's turning those lessons into a companion e-book for The Husband Swap. A short, easy-to-read piece with a lesson drawn from each chapter, Lessons to My Younger Self will include illustrations by Tikva Wolf.

We're releasing Lessons to My Younger Self alongside The Husband Swap in 2015, and if we meet our goal, all backers will get an e-copy!

 

 

NEW! Coming Out Poly: A Booklet for Family and Friends

We've been asked numerous times to provide content that a polyamorous person can give to family and friends when they're coming out, to help educate them about polyamory. We think Dr. Sheff is the perfect person to write such a piece, and she's agreed to do so! We're publishing the book in fall 2015, and if we meet our funding goal, all backers will get a copy!

 

 

 

The Rewards

 

The following rewards will ship in time for the holidays: The poly pendants and bracelets; all copies of More Than Two, The Polyamorists Next Door,  and Rewriting the Rules.

All backers will receive an invitation for themselves and two guests to any book launch party they are able to attend (in Gothenburg, Sweden; Portland, Oregon; and Atlanta, Georgia), as well as a secret Kimchi Cuddles comic!  And if we reach our funding 

If your reward involves a choice, such as a book, shirt or piece of jewelry, you'll receive a survey in your email within two days of contributing to select your perk. Be sure to check your spam and promotions folders! That's how you'll get your e-books, too.

All rewards will ship whether or not we meet our goal.

The 2015 Thorntree Lineup

 

All backers at all levels ($15 and up) will get all three books in the Thorntree 2015 lineup as e-books (ePub and Kindle). Paperbacks are available at higher tiers. At $150 and above, you'll also get a digital (PDF) advance review copy! Backers will get The Husband Swap in March, The Game Changer in August, and Stories from the Polycule in September.

 

More Than Two

 

 

We're offering e-books, softcovers, and signed and numbered special-edition hardcovers of Thorntree Press' first book, More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory.
Published in September 2014, More Than Two was our first crowdfunding success. Written by Franklin and Eve, More Than Two is a long-awaited, wide-ranging resource exploring the often-complex world of living polyamorously.

 

Highlighting the nuances, the relationship options, the myths and the expectations, we share not only our hard-won philosophies about polyamory, but also our hurts and embarrassments. We underscore the importance of engaging in polyamory ethically, while gently guiding readers through the thorny issues of jealousy and insecurity.

You'll receive your e-book of More Than Two within two days of your contribution. We'll ship paperbacks and hardcovers weekly during the campaign.

 

Kimchi Cuddles

 

 

Tikva is providing a secret Kimchi comic for Thorntree Press backers! All contributors will receive a copy of this exclusive artwork.

 

In addition, for higher-level backers, Tikva will create custom comics. Want Kimchi Cuddles to address your poly question? She will! And you can actually be in the comic as a special guest character by donating at a high level, being selected in a random draw from among all backers at the end of the campaign, or winning our referral contest.

 

Poly Pride

 

All "poly pride" items will ship in time for holiday giving!

 

We've partnered with Oregon artist Nancy Yoder to produce beautiful poly jewelry for the campaign. Starting at $50, many perks offer the choice of an infinity-heart bracelet, pendant or both!
 

 

 

We're also offering Franklin's original poly dragon T-shirt, as well as our Love More, Be Awesome T-shirt, drawn by More Than Two illustrator Tatiana Gill. T-shirts are available in men's or women's styles, S to XXL, and in your choice of colors.

 

Even more books

 

 

We're pleased to be able to make available signed first edition hardcovers of Dr. Sheff's first book, The Polyamorists Next Door: Inside Multiple-Partner Relationships and Families, as well as four signed copies of Rewriting the Rules: An Integrative Guide to Love, Sex and Relationships by Meg Barker.

 

 

Original artwork

 

Finally, we have an extremely special reward for our most generous backers: At $1,500 and above, you can get one of the four original drawings from the interior art of More Than Two (by artist Tatiana Gill), as well as a custom watercolor sketch from More Than Two cover artist Paul Mendoza.

 

 

 

Bonus e-books!

 

If we meet our funding goal, all backers will also receive a free e-book copy of Lessons to My Younger Self: A Companion Guide to the Husband Swap, written by Louisa Leontiades and illustrated by Tikva Wolf, and Coming Out Poly: A Resource for Family and Friends of Polyamorous People, written by Dr. Elisabeth Sheff.

 

 

 

Get Involved!

 

We want your participation! Please consider submitting to Stories from the Polycule. Read our call for submissions.

Have a book idea? We're accepting proposals for 2016 and 2017! Read the call for proposals on the Thorntree Press website and see if we might be a good fit for you! 

 

Thank you!

 

Still have questions? Email press@thorntreepress.com. Thank you so much for your support!

Click on a perk and order your books and other goodies now!

Franklin explains on the More Than Two blog. Want to make them dance? Back us now!NEW 12/12! We've added a new perk: For $15, you can receive a print book and e-book of a single Thorntree 2015 title. This perk is for the true fans out there who are here to support one author. ALSO! If we reach our goal, all backer paperbacks will be SIGNED!NEW 12/8! If we reach our goal, all backers will receive two bonus e-books: Lessons to My Younger Self by Louisa Leontiades (illustrated by Tikva Wolf) and Coming Out Poly by Elisabeth Sheff. Find out more at our update video.NEW 11/19! Refer your friends and get chance to be a guest character on Kimchi Cuddles! Find out more in our blog post. Sex-Positive, Handcrafted Books.  Thorntree Press is a new, independent publishing company based in Portland, Oregon. We specialize in non-fiction books on relationships, love and sexuality, with particular focus on non-traditional relationship models. We're also focused on rational, evidence-based approaches to sex and relationships, as well as sharing real-life stories. Our first book, More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory, was published on September 2, 2014, after a successful Indiegogo campaign in the fall of 2013.We're asking for your support funding the three books we have on the slate for 2015: two memoirs and an anthology, all by three well-known, highly regarded and previously published authors on polyamory. Creator-Friendly.Thorntree Press supports its authors with personal attention to detail and hands-on dedicated niche marketing, in addition to the high-quality editing and design standards expected from larger publishing houses.We want to publish great books - without being assholes. That means we make our contracts as creator-friendly as possible. We don't take any rights we don't need to, and we only take those for a few years. Plus, by funding production costs up-front with crowdfunding, we're able to give much higher royalties than the bigger publishers - as well as creating advance buzz for sales.  Who We Are  We are Franklin Veaux and Eve Rickert, the co-founders of Thorntree Press and the co-authors of More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory, published by Thorntree Press this year. Eve is a professional editor with experience in the book industry, and she owns a science communications firm in Vancouver, BC. Franklin is a writer and designer with more than 20 years' experience in printing and pre-press, and he runs a consulting business in Portland, Oregon. Together we successfully delivered on the Indiegogo campaign for More Than Two.  The Creators
We're thrilled to be publishing three well-known authors in 2015.

Dr. Elisabeth Sheff
 

 
One of just a handful of global academic experts on polyamory and the foremost international expert on children in polyamorous families, Dr. Sheff is an educational consultant and expert witness serving sexual and gender minorities. Last year she published The Polyamorists Next Door: Inside Multiple-Partner Relationships and Families, which showcased the results of a 15-year study on polyamorous families. 
Dr. Sheff’s research explains the unique strategies polyamorists use in navigating their complex family lives and describes how they could prove tremendously useful for people in monogamous relationships, as well as other gender and sexual minorities like kinksters and people on the transgender spectrum. She lives in Atlanta with her girlfriend, their children, dog, cats, and the small wild animals the cats bring in.
 
Louisa Leontiades


A freelance writer originally from the UK, Louisa lives in an open relationship with her partners and two children in Sweden. She writes full-time on her blog, Postmodern Woman, and is chairwoman of the National Polyamory Association. She also writes for Huffington Post, Salon, Nerve, Jezebel and the Guardian. She lives a life that makes for a lot of stories.
 
 
 
Franklin Veaux

 Franklin is the co-author of the groundbreaking new book More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory, and the author of the Web's top-ranked polyamory site, morethantwo.com. He is also the creator of Onyx: The Game of Sexual Exploration, maintains the sites xeromag.com, symtoys.com and thinkbeyond.us, publishes erotic fiction under the pen name William Vitelli, and is the co-founder of both Thorntree Press and the Vancouver, Canada-based sex toy R&D company Tacit Pleasures.
 

Tikva Wolf
 Tikva is the creator of the popular polyamory Web comic Kimchi Cuddles. She's been drawing ever since I could hold a crayon. After undergoing many different artistic incarnations, she realized that what she primarily cares about in art (and life) is connecting to people, creating dialogue and spreading awareness.  She's always taken delight in making people laugh, and in doing so also unveiling hidden perspectives.  Comedy has the ability to transform heavy topics into something that’s easier to digest.  She uses humor as a way of being seen deeply, and as a way of encouraging others to deeply see themselves and each other.

 
 


The Books
Your contribution will support production costs - editing, design, proofreading and printing - for the three amazing books Thorntree Press has in the pipeline for 2015.

Stories from the Polycule: Real Life in Polyamorous Families
 
Stories from the Polycule by Dr. Elisabeth Sheff is an anthology of of work from people living in polyamorous families of all configurations, from solo poly people to live-in networks to elders, with or without children. The anthology will include both writing and visual art, and will range from a few sentences to several thousand words. Submissions are coming from children, tweens and teens growing up in poly families, to adults and elders. They deal with the day-to-day experiences of living polyamorously. (Scroll down to "Get involved" for information on contributing your story!)

story:
Cheerful Gender Bending Season's ★ Greetings, on behalf of the Transnational Feminist Union in Mexico! 

We are enthused to announce our Feminsit Drive campaign in the founding year of our emerging feminist labor organization, The Transnational Feminist Union, uniting anti-sexist capital to cover some of the utmost crucial costs of deconstruing patriarchy & systemic violence, in 2015. #TransFemDrive!

"The vision of united transnational feminist labor is rooted from our concrete reality & simultaneously imagines possibilities beyond this reality. It is a radical dream of revolutionary political mass movement that in its reformist stage grants women civil rights within the existing imperialist, white supremacist, capitalist, patriarchal system while at tandem working to undermine & overthrow that system. The feminist dream of replacing the culture of domination with a world of participatory economics grounded in communalism & social democracy, a world without discrimination based on race or gender, a world where recognition of mutuality & interdependency can be the dominant ethos, a global ecological vision of how the planet can survive & how everyone on it can have access to peace & well-being.”
~ bell hooks, Feminism is for Everyone: Passionate Politics, Visionary Feminsim

             

Liberally, our mission is to unite & expand feminist work & research in all sectors of the economy, culture & political structures from a transnational, eco-working class approach. Some of the central goals to our work include gender inclusive domestic labor policy remunerations, reaching economic settlements for current unpaid domestic labor to all, fair wages for house work and backpay for our mothers, grandmothers & all our ancestoral unpaid domestic labor. Incorporate women’s & gender studies in all public school curricula, grow & link gender studies & women studies with feminist grassroots relationships. Implement transnational gender justice programs, prioritizing the needs of the most vulnerable in our global community, cultivate autonomous eco-feminism & advocate for the worldwide decriminalization of reproductive justice including our universal right to choose abortion. Contest the mainstream racist & rape culture media, forming feminist think tanks, town hall conferences & online alternative feminist media content. As well as continue to embolden & develop inclusive grassroots awareness campaigns and networks to end DV, incest & child abuse worldwide through preventative, community based solutions that educate for healthy interpersonal relationships across generations and connect the community with feminist resources or services available. Apply, radiate, advance & innovate transnational feminist grassroots research, media, community education, resources, services & libratory praxis.

UNION TRANSNACIONAL FEMINISTA, TRANSNATIONAL FEMINIST UNION, 2015 FOUNDING YEAR AGENDA: Our foundational year agenda is shaping up as follows yet unless specified otherwise this, as all Union publications, is a working draft.
* Establish location of the Los Angeles development local; move to new office local.

* Publish work in process,  #BlackLivesMatter #WeGotYouSis
   "IWSCHNP, The Intersectionality of State Sanctioned Police Brutality & Domestic
    Violence" 

 

* File for nonprofit status & tax exempt status with the states secretary & IRS,
   naturally not for the purpose of becoming corporatist but to simply offer tax
   returns to our donors & qualify for philanthropic grants.

* Democratically Solidify Union Council Mission & Vision, Demands & Agenda 
   (2015-2016):
     Whereas Worldwide:
  - Every year 60 million girls are sexually assaulted at or on their way to school.
  - 1-3 women have been beaten or sexually abused in their lifetime.
  - At least 60 million girls are missing form their populations- mostly in Asia as a
     result of infanticide or sex related abortion.
  - Women and Girls are 80% of 640,000 of the estimated 800,000 trafficked
    across national borders annually with the majority 505,600 being trafficked for
    sexual exploitation.
  - In some parts of the world girls are more likely to be raped than to learn 
    how to read. 
  - Over 60 million girls worldwide are child brides, 31.3 million in S Africa. Violence 
     & abuse characterize married life for most of these girls.
  - Boys who witness their fathers violence are 10 times more likely to engage in 
     spousal abuse in later adulthood.
  - Up to 5% of women report being physically abused while pregnant, 50% of 
     physically abused Indian women reported being abused while pregnant
  - Between 100 & 140 millions girls alive today have been subjected to Female 
     Genital Mutilation. In 6 African countries 80% of women have been subjected
     to this torture. (United Nations Statistics)
A WOMANIST/FEMINIST TRANSNATIONAL MASS MOVEMENT IS VITAL, WE MUST ALL ACT NOW, Men, Women, all Genders, Sexes, ages, ethnicities, religions, identities together TO SHIFT THE VIOLENCE OF imperialist, white-supremacist, capitalist, hetero-normative-patriarchy, moreover, ARCHITECT A SAFE, ANTI-SEXIST, HEALTHY FUTURE FOR ALL OUR CHILDREN, HUMNS & OUR EARTH. CENTERING THE NEEDS OF THE MOST IMPACTED, EMPOWERING EVERYDAY SURVIVORS IN THE INTERSECTIONS OF DISCRIMINATION, VIOLENCE, OPPRESSION & EXPLOITATION, TRANS, QUEER WOC, FEMALE YOUTHOC & GENERALLY WOC. If you support our mission, join our councilship, participate in fortifying its democratic impact by reflecting & editing your insights into a separate living mission & vision declaration we can later consolidate to produce one final council collective mission & vision document (1,000wrds). As aforementioned above, our mission currently & liberally is to untie & expand feminist work & research in all sectors of the economy, culture & political structures, from a transnational eco-working class approach. Some of the central goals to our work include gender inclusive domestic labor policy remunerations, reaching economic settlements for current unpaid domestic labor, fair wages for house work & back pay for our mothers, grandmothers, & all our ancestral unpaid domestic labor. Incorporate women's & gender studies in all public schools, grow & connect gender studies & women's studies with feminist grassroots relationships. Implement transnational gender justice programs, prioritizing the needs of the most vulnerable in our global communities, cultivate autonomous eco-feminsim & advocate for the worldwide decriminalization of reproductive justice, including for our universal right to choose abortion. Contest the racist & rape culture media, forming feminist think tanks, town hall conferences & online alternative feminist media. As well as continue to embolden & develop inclusive awareness campaigns & networks to end domestic violence, incest & child abuse, worldwide through preventative, community based solutions, that educate for healthy interpersonal relationships & connect the community with feminist resources or services available. Apply, advance, & innovate, feminist grassroots research, media, community education, resources, services, & global peace & liberation engineering. UNITE IN UN & GRASSROOTS EFFORTS TO END VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN!
* Help us implement Gender Studies in Public Pre-K to High-School Curricula 
  exemplified in the text bellow, taught in La Paz, Baja California S, Mexico 
  since, 2008. #TransFemDrive
      "Nuestro Norte y Nuestro Sur, puntos extremos en la geografía, el horror de la 
       violencia y la explotación, en la discriminación étnica y de género, pero    
       también extremos que se tocan… en la dignidad, en las demandas de justicia, 
       en la resistencia.” ~ Marisa Belausteguigoitia y Lucia Melgar, Equidad de  
                                                                Genero y Prevencion d Violencia en Secundaria
      "Our North & Our South, points at extreme ends in our geography, the horror of
        the violence & the exploitation, in ethnic discrimination & gender but also 
        extremes that touch... in dignity, in the demands of justice, in resistance."
                                            ~ Marisa Belausteguigoitia y Lucia Melgar, Gender Equity &
                                                                                      Violence prevention in Middle School

                     

* Publish Union Transnacional Feminista, founding & seasonal newsletters.
* Promote & architect Eco-working-class jobs & feminist polluter pays policies.
“To fight climate change we have to fight inequality within our countries & between them. There is a finite carbon budget, there is a right to exit poverty, to address the unequal exchanges that were built between our nations by fossil fuels, super powered by fossil fuels in the early days, in the burning of coal & Esperanza is going to lay out a vision of how must & can heal the wounds of colonialism & turn the world right side up. In our own countries we will not stop this fossil fuel frenzy unless indigenous people, people of color & low income communities have real options & are not being asked to choose between poverty & pollution." 
~ Naomi Klein on, This Changes Everything: Capitalism vs. The Climate

      

* Detoxify, balance & transform our global food system so that it meets 
   optimal nutritional needs for all peoples. Support local farmers & cultivate  
   community based organic nutrition & renewable energy projects including  
   sowing & spreading awareness of Moringa Oleifera, the most nutritiously
   generous legume & delish leafy green vegg know also as, the tree of liberty or   
   life. Edify about the pressing pivotal time we have to reverse & avoid further   
   catastrophic impacts of climate change, both on the faith of our ecology & on   
   the lives of millions already facing greater risks in communities impoverished by   
   toxic market capitalism & modern imperialism. #OccupytheFoodSystem

* Inspire, support & mobilize feminist community political actions, ie protest,  
   marches, forums, town halls, independent & political art events, study circles,
   think tanks, round tables ect.  #WomensDCMarch2015 #YaMeCanse  
   #VivosLosQueremos #BLM

    

* Hold Union founding event
* Edit & publish "Praxis- Feminist Liberation Theory" authored by Tania Xothi Tellez,
   Womanist, Feminist, Afroindigenous, Chicana theorist & founding Union council
   member.
* Book launch tour, Spring 2016. If you would like us to  visit   

   your campus please contact us, the Union. We need
   volunteers, please contact us to volunteer. #TransFemmeDrive 

  

* Start Transnational Feminist Union Website
   - transnational feminist library
   - feminist online resource center
   - translation project already in process with Mexican Feminist, we are aspiring to 
     link up with Dr. bell hooks for this & more projects like these. 

   

* End systemic gross income inequality within sex, gender, race, & class 

   compartmentalizations. Donate to the Womanist & Grassroots Feminist
   Movement Today! Ongoing Feminstraiser & Grant Writing for 2016, 17, 18....
   #TransFemDrive #Intersectionality #RestorativeWomanistEconomics
* Organize Community Feminist Masculinity Study Circles & international,
   transoceanic webinars. It is imperative men learn to embrace and become 
   feminists, to become literate in feminist history by rejecting patriarchal 
   socialization and becoming part of the global grassroots feminist movement. “No
   man who does not actively choose to work to change & challenge patriarchy
   escapes its impact.” ~ bell hooks, the will to change: men masculinity & love

  

* Generate additional fiscal agency, double our development funding, grow our
   anti-racist, eco-feminist council membership & staff without underwriting of
   financial corporate interest.                  

       

Our Feministdrive Campaign, has a foundational monetary goal of $30,000, covering the utmost crucial project development outlays in the emerging feminist labor union’s inception year & will be ongoing through Women's Herstory Month. One potential strategy for reaching our final budget goal is for 30 fabulous femmefolk to donate $300 & for each of these same 30 femfolk to unite 2 matching legacy council member pledges in hopes of surpassing perhaps, the $30,000 foundational budget! Cheerful Gender Bending Season's ★ Greetings, on
behalf of the Transnational Feminist Union in Mexico!  
We are enthused to announce our Feminsit Drive campaign in the founding year of our emerging
     feminist labor organization, The Transnational Feminist Union, uniting anti-sexist capital to cover some of the utmost crucial costs of deconstruing patriarchy & systemic violence, in 2015. #TransFemDrive!"The vision of united transnational feminist labor is
rooted from our concrete reality & simultaneously imagines possibilities
beyond this reality. It is a radical dream of revolutionary political mass
movement that in its reformist stage grants women civil rights within the
existing imperialist, white supremacist, capitalist, patriarchal system while at tandem
working to undermine & overthrow that system. The feminist dream of replacing
the culture of domination with a world of participatory economics grounded in
communalism & social democracy, a world without discrimination based on race
or gender, a world where recognition of mutuality & interdependency can be
the dominant ethos, a global ecological vision of how the planet can survive & how everyone on it can have access to peace & well-being.” ~ bell hooks, Feminism is for Everyone: Passionate Politics, Visionary Feminsim



              Liberally, our mission is to unite & expand feminist work & research in all
sectors of the economy, culture & political structures from a
transnational, eco-working class approach. Some of the central goals to our
work include gender inclusive domestic labor policy remunerations, reaching
economic settlements for current unpaid domestic labor to all, fair wages
for house work and backpay for our mothers, grandmothers & all our ancestoral
unpaid domestic labor. Incorporate women’s & gender studies in all public
school curricula, grow & link gender studies & women studies with feminist
grassroots relationships. Implement transnational gender justice programs, prioritizing
the needs of the most vulnerable in our global community, cultivate autonomous
eco-feminism & advocate for the worldwide decriminalization of reproductive
justice including our universal right to choose abortion. Contest the mainstream racist & rape
culture media, forming feminist think tanks, town hall conferences & online alternative
feminist media content. As well as continue to embolden & develop inclusive
grassroots awareness campaigns and networks to end DV, incest & child abuse
worldwide through preventative, community based solutions that educate for healthy
interpersonal relationships across generations
and connect the community with feminist resources or services available. Apply,
radiate, advance & innovate transnational feminist grassroots research, media,
community education, resources, services & libratory praxis.

development local; move to new office local.

exempt status with the states secretary & IRS,    naturally not for the purpose of
becoming corporatist but to simply offer tax    returns to our donors & qualify for
philanthropic grants.

their way to school.

mostly in Asia as a

505,600 being trafficked for 
    sexual exploitation.

  - Between 100 & 140 millions girls alive today have been

story:
Who We Are

Hi,

I'm Steven Svoboda, founder of Attorneys for the Rights of the Child (ARC), a non-profit organization that has been working hard since early 1997 to secure equal protection for, and broaden judicial and public recognition of, children’s legal and human rights to bodily integrity and self-determination.

Our work has borne very satisfying fruit over the past twelve months. As opposition continues and even expands in certain areas, ARC and our fellow intactivists are making unprecedented inroads in safeguarding genital integrity, achieving goals of which we could only have dreamt in past years.

 

Project Description

Our current project—perhaps one of our most important projects to date—is a paper we hope to use to advocate for legal changes in Germany with some intactivists with whom we are in contact there. The paper is being written for Springer and will update my well-received presentation in Helsinki for the 12th International Symposium on Circumcision. My presentation covered the Cologne Court decision and legal developments in Germany, titled, “Strange Yet Familiar Bedfellows - Effectively Addressing Chronic Issues Encountered when Law and Human Rights Seek to Protect Bodily Integrity,” and was extremely well received at the conference. You can find the abstract and a link to the full version here: http://arclaw.org/announcements/steven-svoboda-present-nocirc-symposium-helsinki-finland-september-30-october-2-2012-a

To this end, we need to have a number of important German legal cases and law review articles professionally translated to English.

 

Project Background

ARC's work in educating policy and lawmakers has paid off greatly in 2012-2013. This past summer, a local court in Germany ruled that circumcision constitutes a criminal assault. This set off an international firestorm of debate.  Before the German Parliament responded, another major event occurred: The American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) released their new circumcision policy statement. Their conclusion—that “the benefits of circumcision outweigh the risks”—contradicts earlier policy statements and goes against the rising tide of medical literature documenting the harms of circumcision, and the consensus of the international medical community.

While this was a major setback, we sat tight and wrote a letter to the AAP's Pediatrics journal, which was not published by Pediatrics but was published elsewhere. The German Pediatrics Association read our statement online and cited us in their report on male circumcision to the German Parliament, perhaps the most incriminating report ever on male circumcision from a doctors organization. We were cited for our exemplary efforts in the United States working to end circumcision.

 

List of ARC's Achievements

  • We helped to end Medicaid funding for routine infant circumcision in steventeen states through hundreds of phone calls, letters, and scholarship.

  • Work at the UN (part of the UN permanent record):

    • We presented a petition to the UN Sub-Commission on August 9, 2001, available here on our website: http://arclaw.org/our-work/presentations/oral-intervention-united-nations-regarding-male-circumcision

    • We presented an oral intervention to a session of the UN Sub-Commission on August 14, 2001, available here on the UN website: http://www.unchr.ch/Huridocda/Huridocda.nsf/(Symbol)/E.CN.4.Sub.2.2002.NGO.1.En

  • We received the 2002 Human Rights Award from the International Symposium on Human Rights and Modern Society.

  • Our work has been recognized by Harvard Law School, the New York Times, the Wall Street Journal, Men’s Health Magazine, and numerous other well-known organizations and publications.

  • ARC has represented plaintiffs in several state and federal lawsuits to protect genital integrity.

  • We have published 27 issues of our Newsletter in the past 11 years, helping to spread news about intactivism and to maintain spirits among activists in this often demanding work. Our newsletter is carried by all three of the top content providers that electronically provide journals to libraries throughout the world! These three are ProQuest, EBSCO and Cengage (formerly Gale). Click here to view our latest issue: http://arclaw.org/newsletter/latest

  • We recently released a list that we have been painstakingly compiling since our founding in 1997 of all known significant legal awards and settlements in circumcision-related lawsuits. Click here to view the list: http://arclaw.org/resources/settlements
  • We recently marked the one-year anniversary of the release of our “Know Your Rights Brochure,” available on our website for potential litigants on how to see legal compensation for the wrong of circumcision. Click here to view the brochure: http://arclaw.org/announcements/circumcision-your-legal-rights
  • We helped organize a special issue on circumcision of the world’s top ethical journal, the UK’s Journal of Medical Ethics. The JME published two of my articles in this issue, one concerning male circumcision, human rights, and customary law, and the other analyzing the AAP’s policy statement and technical report. Click here to view our press release: http://arclaw.org/resources/press-releases/new-arc-article-finds-fault-pediatric-organization%E2%80%99s-support-circumcision-p

    The Jewish Press, the largest weekly newspaper read by Orthodox Jews, favorably mentioned the article by me and pediatrician Robert S. Van Howe. Click here to view the article: http://www.jewishpress.com/news/breaking-news/human-rights-lawyer-challenging-aap-pro-circumcision-stance/2013/03/19/

 

List of ARC's Upcoming Activities

  • We helped organize a special issue of the world’s top ethical journal, the UK’s Journal of Medical Ethics. The JME will be publishing two of my articles in this issue, one concerning male circumcision, human rights, and customary law, and the other analyzing the AAP’s policy statement and technical report. Click here to view the press release: http://arclaw.org/resources/press-releases/new-arc-article-finds-fault-pediatric-organization%E2%80%99s-support-circumcision-p
  • I will be debating the American Academy of Pediatrics' Susan Blank, M.D. in a talk entitled, "Newborn Male Circumcision is Unethical and Should be Illegal,” at the Medical University of South Carolina in October 2013.

  • We have accepted an invitation to attend a two-day conference in Keele, United Kingdom this September, at which we will present a paper entitled, “The Right to Bodily Integrity as a Right to Genital Autonomy in Law and Human Rights,” that seeks to prove that the history of leading United Nations human rights documents supports a right to bodily and genital integrity. 

  • Publication is imminent by Springer, one of the world’s top academic publishers, of the proceedings from the 2010 Berkeley symposium, to be entitled “The Rights of the Child: Ensuring Every Child's Fundamental Right to Body Ownership and Protection from Medical, Cultural, and Religious Infringements.” The book will—for the second successive time—lead off with my article, which analyzed problems applying informed consent to male circumcision and is entitled, “Tortured Bodies, Tortured Doctrines: Informed Consent As a Legal Fiction Inapplicable to Neonatal Male Circumcision.”
  • A special issue of Global Discourse relating to genital autonomy will be publishing our paper entitled, "“That Awful Darkness”—Protecting all from genital cutting and bridging the gaps that perpetuate the practices."  

  • In Search of Fatherhood magazine will feature me on the cover of their first issue in 2013, along with another reprint. I was featured on the cover of three of their four 2012 issues, each of which reprinted a different article of mine.

How You Can Help

We need a number of German court cases and legal papers translated to further strengthen our international efforts in ending male circumcision. The estimated cost is $15,000. Please donate so we can reach this goal and expand our influencing force within the international community. Choose an exciting perk on the right side that matches your donation level.

Steven Svoboda
Executive Director
Attorneys for the Rights of the Child

Our work has been recognized by Harvard Law School, the New York Times, the Wall Street Journal, Men’s Health Magazine, and numerous other well-known organizations and publications.


ARC has represented plaintiffs in several state and federal lawsuits to protect genital integrity.


We have published 27 issues of our Newsletter in the past 11 years, helping to spread news about intactivism and to maintain spirits among activists in this often demanding work. Our newsletter is carried by all three of the top content providers that electronically provide journals to libraries throughout the world! These three are ProQuest, EBSCO and Cengage (formerly Gale). Click here to view our latest issue: http://arclaw.org/newsletter/latest



We recently released a list that we have been painstakingly compiling since our founding in 1997 of all known significant legal awards and settlements in circumcision-related lawsuits. Click here to view the list: http://arclaw.org/resources/settlements


We recently marked the one-year anniversary of the release of our “Know Your Rights Brochure,” available on our website for potential litigants on how to see legal compensation for the wrong of circumcision. Click here to view the brochure: http://arclaw.org/announcements/circumcision-your-legal-rights


We helped organize a special issue on circumcision of the world’s top ethical journal, the UK’s Journal of Medical Ethics. The JME published two of my articles in this issue, one concerning male circumcision, human rights, and customary law, and the other analyzing the AAP’s policy statement and technical report. Click here to view our press release: http://arclaw.org/resources/press-releases/new-arc-article-finds-fault-pediatric-organization%E2%80%99s-support-circumcision-pThe Jewish Press, the largest weekly newspaper read by Orthodox Jews, favorably mentioned the article by me and pediatrician Robert S. Van Howe. Click here to view the article: http://www.jewishpress.com/news/breaking-news/human-rights-lawyer-challenging-aap-pro-circumcision-stance/2013/03/19/


 
List of ARC's Upcoming Activities

We helped organize a special issue of the world’s top ethical journal, the UK’s Journal of Medical Ethics. The JME will be publishing two of my articles in this issue, one concerning male circumcision, human rights, and customary law, and the other analyzing the AAP’s policy statement and technical report. Click here to view the press release: http://arclaw.org/resources/press-releases/new-arc-article-finds-fault-pediatric-organization%E2%80%99s-support-circumcision-p


I will be debating the American Academy of Pediatrics' Susan Blank, M.D. in a talk entitled, "Newborn Male Circumcision is Unethical and Should be Illegal,” at the Medical University of South Carolina in October 2013.



We have accepted an invitation to attend a two-day conference in Keele, United Kingdom this September, at which we will present a paper entitled, “The Right to Bodily Integrity as a Right to Genital Autonomy in Law and Human Rights,” that seeks to prove that the history of leading United Nations human rights documents supports a right to bodily and genital integrity.  



Publication is imminent by Springer, one of the world’s top academic publishers, of the proceedings from the 2010 Berkeley symposium, to be entitled “The Rights of the Child: Ensuring Every Child's Fundamental Right to Body Ownership and Protection from Medical, Cultural, and Religious Infringements.” The book will—for the second successive time—lead off with my article, which analyzed problems applying informed consent to male circumcision and is entitled, “Tortured Bodies, Tortured Doctrines: Informed Consent As a Legal Fiction Inapplicable to Neonatal Male Circumcision.”



A special issue of Global Discourse relating to genital autonomy will be publishing our paper entitled, "“That Awful Darkness”—Protecting all from genital cutting and bridging the gaps that perpetuate the practices."  




In Search of Fatherhood magazine will feature me on the cover of their first issue in 2013, along with another reprint. I was featured on the cover of three of their four 2012 issues, each of which reprinted a different article of mine.


How You Can Help
We need a number of German court cases and legal papers translated to further strengthen our international efforts in ending male circumcision. The estimated cost is $15,000. Please donate so we can reach this goal and expand our influencing force within the international community. Choose an exciting perk on the right side that matches your donation level.

story:
Angel In The Stars

 

En:

Hello, my name is Alexander Leontakis. A while ago I wrote a novel named Angel in the Stars. I heard a lot of good things about it. What I also heard almost every single time when I got a response about my novel is that I’m a new writer. Every publishing house in their own subtle way was telling me that in these times they were not willing to risk a book from a new writer.

That is until Empeiria Publishing agreed to publish it. But this is Greece of 2013, no one has it easy. So I was told I had to share the cost of just the first edition. Should the book sell there will be more editions and the royalties I’m entitled will follow.

The thing is I don’t have the initial capital I’m asked for and that’s where you come in.

It would mean the world to me if I could get my first novel published. All I need is this sum of money to make it happen.

 

Yes this book is in greek.

 

Depending on your contribution you can get these perks!

 

10€         Lunar Post Supervisor.

I know running a station isn’t easy but If you contribute 10€ you will receive a thank you email.

20€         Member of the Counsel of Mars Elders.

Your Grasse I greet you with respect. Your 20€ will get you a thank you email and a sticker of the Leontakis Insignia mailed to you.

 50€       White Agent.

You chose the task of preserving the interstellar balance of power. Just remember the Grays are never to be trusted. For that you’ll get all perks listed above,

plus a A3 size poster commemorative of the first edition of the book with personalized autograph mailed to you.

100€       White Emblem Bearer.

Your job is dangerous but do keep in mind that the fate of the galaxy rests upon your shoulders. For that you’ll get a thank you email. Also you will receive an autographed sticker of the Leontakis Insignia. And a 70x100cm (27.55x39.37in) poster commemorative of the first edition of the book with personalized autograph, mailed to you.

 200€       Irovion. Speaker of the Assembly Of Iar. Supreme Commander of the White armed forces.

Your Lordship, I offer you my humble respects. For your incredibly generous offer you will receive

+ APersonalized Autograph on the insignia sticker, + poster + paperback book, and + You will also receive an mp3 of me thanking you for your contribution.

 

Please expect your perks 3 to 5 weeks after the campaign is over.

 

...

 

Άγγελος Στα Αστέρια 

 

Ελ:

Γεια σας, ονομάζομαι Αλέξανδρος Λεοντάκης. Πριν από λίγο καιρό έγραψα ένα μυθιστόρημα με τίτλο Άγγελος στα Αστέρια. Έχω ακούσει πολλά καλά για το βιβλίο μου. Αυτό όμως που άκουγα σχεδόν κάθε φορά όταν λάμβανα απαντήσεις από εκδοτικούς είναι ότι είμαι πρωτοεμφανιζόμενος. Όλοι με τον τρόπο τους μου έλεγαν ότι δεν ήταν διατεθειμένοι σε τέτοιους καιρούς να εκδώσουν ένα βιβλίο από έναν άγνωστο συγγραφέα.

Αυτό μέχρι που έλαβα θετική απάντηση από την Εμπειρία Εκδοτική. Όμως μην γελιόμαστε είμαστε στην Ελλάδα του ’13, κανείς δεν έχει τον δρόμο του στρωμένο με ροδοπέταλα. Έτσι για να ελαχιστοποιήσουν το ρίσκο, μου είπαν ότι χρειάζεται να συμβάλω στο κόστος της πρώτης έκδοσης. Ως «αποζημίωση» θα λάβω έναν αριθμό αντιτύπων. Αν το βιβλίο πουλήσει και υπάρξουν περεταίρω εκδόσεις θα λάβω τα ποσοστά που μου αναλογούν.

Το θέμα είναι ότι δεν έχω το αρχικό κεφάλαιο που μου ζητείται να συνεισφέρω και εδώ εισέρχεστε εσείς.

Θα σας ήμουν αιώνια ευγνώμων, αν με βοηθούσατε να εκδώσω το πρώτο μου μυθιστόρημα. Το μόνο που χρειάζομαι είναι αυτό το ποσό για να το πραγματοποιήσω.

 

Όντως αυτό το βιβλίο είναι στα ελληνικά.

 

Ανάλογα με την συνεισφορά σας μπορείτε να λάβετε τα εξής δώρα.

 

10€         Επικεφαλής/ις της Σεληνιακής Βάσης.

Αναγνωρίζω πως η διεύθυνση ενός τέτοιου σταθμού δεν είναι εύκολη υπόθεση γι’ αυτό με 10€ θα λάβεις ένα ευχαριστήριο email.

20€         Μέλος της Δημογεροντίας του Συμβουλίου του Άρη.

Εντιμότατε/η σας χαιρετίζω με σεβασμό. Με 20€ θα λάβετε ένα ευχαριστήριο email και με το ταχυδρομείο, ένα αυτοκόλλητο με τα ακρωνύμια του Αλέξανδρου Λεοντάκη.

50€         Παράγοντας.

Επέλεξες το καθήκον της διατήρησης της διαστρικής ισορροπίας δυνάμεων. Μόνο θυμήσου ότι δεν μπορείς ποτέ να εμπιστεύεσαι τους Γκρίζους.

Γι’ αυτό θα λάβεις όλα τα δώρα που αναφέρονται προηγουμένως συν μία αφίσα σε μέγεθος Α3, αναμνηστική της πρώτης έκδοσης του βιβλίου με αφιέρωση σε όνομα της επιλογής σου.

100€       Φέρων/σα το Λευκό Έμβλημα.

Το καθήκον σου είναι δύσκολο αλλά να θυμάσαι πως η μοίρα του γαλαξία ακουμπά στους ώμους σου.

Γι’ αυτό θα λάβεις ένα ευχαριστήριο email. Ένα αυτοκόλλητο με τα Ακρωνύμια και την υπογραφή του συγγραφέα. Και μία αφίσα μεγέθους 70x100cm, αναμνηστική της πρώτης έκδοσης του βιβλίου με αφιέρωση σε όνομα της επιλογής σου.

200€       Ιρόβιος/α. Πρωτοκάθεδρος/η της Συνέλευσης του Έαρ. Αρχιστράτηγος των Στρατιών των Λευκών Δυνάμεων του πλανήτη.

Υψηλότατε/τάτη, σας υποβάλω ταπεινά τα σέβη μου. Για την απίστευτα γενναιόδωρη προσφορά σας θα λάβετε.

+ Αυτοκόλλητο των ακρωνυμίων του Αλέξανδρου Λεοντάκη + 70χ100cm αφίσα + το βιβλίο, όλα με εξατομικευμένη αφιέρωση. + ένα mp3 που θα σας ευχαριστώ προσωπικά για την συνεισφορά σας.

 

Παρακαλώ όπως αναμείνατε τα δώρα σας 3 με 5 εβδομάδες μετά την περάτωση της καμπάνιας.

story:
The biggest mistake most people make when they look for a job is they try to do it on their own. The average person looks for a job once every few years so they are not experts.  Looking for a job without support is like trying to ski or play golf without lessons.  Furthermore, with changes in technology and markets, the job search process is constantly changing.  What worked best five years ago doesn’t apply today. Thus the first step any person looking for a job should take is - join a job search support group.  The group can help with all the other steps such as finding opportunities, writing a resume, interviewing skills, and researching employers and company culture.

 

Most job search experts will tell you that few people find jobs by searching through listings on job sites, and that the best way to get a job is through networking.  Joining a job support group is networking on steroids.  LinkedIn tells its members that people with a few hundred direct contacts can have several million contacts two levels removed.  Working with contacts who are in the same situation affords high quality contacts that can be shared by the group.  As part of a group you can pass along and benefit from leads that may not be right for you, but may be ideal for another member.

 

Fortunately, the best groups are free or minimal cost to job hunters, which is especially important when income is limited between jobs.  While most people using job search support groups are unemployed at the time they join, job search support groups can be useful for people looking to change jobs while still employed.

 

Ironically, the best support groups are all volunteer organizations that follow the pay it forward philosophy.  Simply stated, pay it forward says that when you are in a time of need you get support from someone who asks that when your situation improves you pay your debt forward to another person in need, rather than back to the person who helped you.  Support groups continue to be effective when helping people dealing with common problems such as, grief, addiction, and severe trauma.

 

The table of contents below lists the key points that are covered in the book.

 

 

Power Job Search

Table of Contents

 

 

                                    Part I

Chapter One                Introduction

                                    Overview, Why this Book, Economic Cycle + Paradigm Shift,

                                    Global Hi-Tech Economy, Change is Accelerating, Its not

                                    your Fault, Every Job is Temporary, How to Use this Book

 

Chapter Two               Working with a Group

                                  Common Problems Common Solutions, Own Your Job Search,

                                  Mutual Support, Cumulative Knowledge of the Group,

                                  Higher       Success Rate, Keep It Current

 

Chapter Three             Pay it Forward

                                    How it Works, Why it Works for Job Seekers,

 

Chapter Four               Group Meetings

                                  Meeting Format, Community Based, Where to hold meetings

                                  Group Size, Volunteer Leadership, Inviting Outsiders and

                                  Excluding Others,

 

                                    Part II

Chapter Five               Creating a Plan

                                 Household Budget, Establish a Routine, Exploit the

                                 Opportunity, Personal Assessment, Mange Expectations,

                                 Realistic Time Schedule,

 

Chapter Six                 Using the Internet

                                 Information is as Good as Its Source, People Still are Number

                                 One, Job Super Sites, Job Search Engines, Blogs, Research,

                                 Skills Assessment, Electronic Communication with Employers

 

Chapter Seven             Networking and Social Networks

                                 Linkedin Power User, Facebook and Others, Your Internet

                                 Presence, The Job as Currency

 

Chapter Eight              Resumes

                                 Objective of a Resume, Not a Silver Bullet, Key Words, Its

                                 Many Forms, Make the Medium the Message

 

Chapter Nine               50 Plus Job Seekers

                                  Age Discrimination it’s the Rule, The Exceptions, Skills

                                  Transfer, Retraining Pros and Cons.

 

Chapter Ten                Avoid the Pitfalls

                                    Resume Services, Job Coaches, Premium Job Services,

                                   Work at Home Scams and the Exceptions

 

Chapter Eleven           Paths To and From a Full Time Job

                                  Temp Agencies, Consulting, Volunteer Work, Internships,

 

 

Chapter Twelve           Entrepreneurship

                                Personal Traits, Opportunities, Raising Capital Crowd Funding,

                                building a team, franchises

 

Why Fund This Campaign

Job seekers need all the help they can get to find work as quickly as possible.  Publishing a book the traditional way is a long and difficult process.  There are many books available on job hunting, but none of them have a primary focus on job hunting as a group effort. Ironically, this is the most important factor in finding a good job quickly.

 

Besides the support of pledges on Indiegogo I hope this campaign can help spread the word that in the age of electronic media and enhanced communication there is a need for a return to basic face-to-face communication.  This is mostly an untold story that I want to tell.

 

Support groups with as few as 12-20 members are the most effective.  Almost anyone could be the founder of a local support group.  Another goal of this project is to share information on establishing, structuring and running local networking groups with individuals, nonprofits, local government, and state government organizations established to support anyone in career transition.

Job seekers need all the help they can get to find work as quickly as possible.  Publishing a book the traditional way is a long and difficult process.  There are many books available on job hunting, but none of them have a primary focus on job hunting as a group effort. Ironically, this is the most important factor in finding a good job quickly.
 
Besides the support of pledges on Indiegogo I hope this campaign can help spread the word that in the age of electronic media and enhanced communication there is a need for a return to basic face-to-face communication.  This is mostly an untold story that I want to tell.
 
Support groups with as few as 12-20 members are the most effective.  Almost anyone could be the founder of a local support group.  Another goal of this project is to share information on establishing, structuring and running local networking groups with individuals, nonprofits, local government, and state government organizations established to support anyone in career transition.

story:
Life in the Green Lane,"  

-in Pursuit of the American Dream

Based on a True Story

 And this is my story...


Life in the Green Lane is more than just a book written to entertain you. This is a true story about one of the largest open source research projects in post-modern times, that was responsible for spurring off the second coming of green technology revolution in the field of fuel economy. Led by a small group of people with a vision, they would take on the responsibility of legitimizing a movement into industry segment within the automotive and green tech sector.

This story is an account of a series of events which triggered a subculture of inventors, inventors, patriots, green enthusiast, marketeers, mechanics, business men, entrepreneurs, to take action setting out to do what was called “the impossible.” What was the impossible? To get fifty percent or more in fuel economy out of the current automobile with the help of a controversial technology; the Hydro Assist Fuel Cell (or HAFC for short).

The cast of characters from diverse backgrounds, come together to enhance the technologies capabilities as they each add their own ideas to the mix, allowing the HAFC to deliver far beyond the original expectations. The HAFC would soon become legend in specialized social circles; thus capturing the imagination of a few local race car hobbyist and car enthusiast.  They would later not just prove the technology could work; they would push the boundaries of HAFC to new frontiers.

These individuals would later transform what was just a science project into a company that would become a leader in emissions reduction technology, by instituting new practices and methods on how to commercialize such technology.

So what would come of the device that was designed to wean us off the need of fossil fuel petrofuels? What would happen to the group of people whom came together in seeking energy and financial independence?

As any new technology considered a market disruption, the HAFC would come under scrutiny of people mediocre minds, in which would lose either money, power, and control from the HAFC’s success. Life in the Green Lane discloses the devious recipe that is used by an adversarial authority in order to crush innovation that was intended to uplift humanity. And that is only half of the story. 


Act two: includes a series of events in which another technology would begin to take hold; the Smart Emissions Reducer. Well do you remember those local race car hobbyist, and car enthusiast? Well they bounce back from a catastrophic media hit to usher in another technology that would deliver on two areas of technical competency; harmful vehicle emissions and fuel efficiency.

Outfitted with a business model designed to offer risk free discovery for specific consumer audiences, and armed with inventory, knowledge, and a vision, these individuals would aim their sights on seeing their vision of a Smart Emissions Reducer under the hood of every vehicle, which utilized and internal combustion engine, in the world. They aligned their product with public policy initiatives, creating their own wave of luck.

Tragically, they would be met with a similar skepticism, from powers at be who did not believe in the technology or by the Company’s driving force. The Company and its leadership would once again prove that these types of technologies were viable and worthy, while holding onto to their dream in seeing the Smart Emissions Reducer commercialized in the automotive industry.


So if you have read this book this far and are thinking or feeling “conspiracy,” let me assure you of one thing…this is not a conspiracy. This story is a time line of events and actions which brought into our lives information that made us realize something so significant; everything in our lives has been designed by individuals whom discovered there was a real need to invent, to create, to innovate in order to elevate our social being.

The Company, Extreme Energy Solutions, and its founders, investors, and leadership would soon realize that the free enterprise was as free as we are lead to believe; that there is a steep price paid for success; especially when your product or service is a game changing market disruption; a threat to the very existence of the status quo. So do they “make it? Well must read Life in the Green Lane to find out.

Purpose of This Story...

This purpose of sharing this story is more than just to entertain you. It is to provide you with a glimmer of hope that the American Dream is still alive and well; that against all odds, an individual with an idea, who is willing to accept total responsibility for the success of that idea, the actions which will bring forth one’s vision into a reality. However success comes with a price, some which one cannot put a dollar value on.  

I hope to inspire you to take action to either investigate into the realm of what you have been told all your life was impossible; or for you to begin to open you mind in researching more into other technological advances once deemed a scam, or fraud, or dubbed “it didn’t work,” and consider the source in which made such claims. You may be quite surprised by what you find.

Take a Drive in the Green Lane with the Author, Samuel K. Burlum...

Life in the Green Lane is not for the weak at heart. This is a story, one that I have lived, which had its fair share of long days and even longer nights, tears shed, and friendships lost. It is a real experience that just less than ten years of my life was dedicated to.

Life in the Green Lane would not exist if I quit in the middle of the race. Many times I contemplated the “what if,” and every time I had only one choice, to put step on the accelerator and continue on the path that it seems was part fate and part choice. I provide to you my thoughts and feelings as I had to contemplate each major decision to continue the journey.

I will walk you through the high stakes, high risk-high reward winner takes all journey in seeking what every entrepreneur seeks, their fair shake at a piece of the American Dream, while blazing a path in one of the most controversial industries still in its very infancy, the green technology sector. I will provide you valuable lessons learned of one entrepreneur’s journey, I will also provide you some insight to the side of the news big media fails to deliver; about the block by block fight in preserving our community and Main Street USA.

I encourage you to read this book in its entirety, knowing at the end you will have to make a choice just as I once did. If you choose to accept this story only for the entertainment value, then great. However I invite you to embrace and encourage others around you whom still have the guts to pursuit their dreams.

Life in the Green Lane has many undertones. A true to life David and Goliath story, I will be sharing with you thoughts and practices which bring into focus issues and solutions in the areas of environmental and economic public policy, technology, American Free Enterprise, and other issues that impact on our community.

How Your Contribution will be put to Work: 

Your contribution will be utilized to help pre-sell copies of Life in the Green Lane, and assist with the initial editing cost, initial publishing cost, and to help absorb some of the cost of the design/layout of the cover, artwork, and photos. 

Part of each sale's proceeds will be donated to a few good causes. We will donate $1 from every sale of each book; to help disabled/homeless Veterans. Part of the books profits will also be donated to Extreme Energy Solutions legal fund in protecting its dream, discussed within the content of the book. 

About the Author, Samuel K. Burlum...

Mr. Burlum is CEO/President of Extreme Energy Solutions, Inc., is a founding member, elected to his post by the Company’s shareholders in 2011. He is a member of the Leadership Council for the National Small Business Association.  He is an Accredited Investigative Reporter  who author’s the column, The Green Lane. Burlum  was recognized by the World Green Energy Symposium, Passaic Valley FOP Lodge #181  and by People of Distinction Humanitarian Foundation.

Mr. Burlum, a career entrepreneur, founded his first business in 1992. He has assisted non-profits such Spirit of the Arts Foundation (501c3); and served as a committee member of the Green Fleet Task Force for Sustainable Jersey. He has lent his time to schools of thought student programs focused on STEM education.

Burlum lends his expertise to emerging  tech and start-ups businesses and companies, assisting them in a number of professional areas including enhancement of their business model, advertising and marketing , institution of systems, business development, and executive/management services. He leverages his relationships  to increase opportunities and market share. 

Mr. Burlum graduated from Berkeley College with an Associate’s Degree, and is a recognized public speaker; has provided commentary in the areas of environmental & economic policy, and on innovation. Mr. Burlum has also been featured on radio and TV programs including Today in America, hosted & narrated by NFL Football Legend Terry Bradshaw, aired on the Discovery Channel. 

Find more about Samuel K. Burlum at www.SamBurlum.com
