***POUR NOUS INDIQUER VOS CHOIX DE TUQUES: laissez-nous un commentaire sur notre page indiegogo ou hiemsknitwear@gmail.com ou notre page Facebook en message privé***

***TO JOIN US FOR THE CHOICE OF YOUR TOQUES: leave us a comment on our indiegogo page or hiemsknitwear@gmail.com or our Facebook page in private message***

 

  • Isabella, étudiante en comptabilité, passionnée de ski, aimant la mode  ~ student in accounting, passionate skier and fashion lover 
  • Pierre-Hugues, analyste en prix de revient et passionné du monde des affaires ~ cost accounting analyst, passionate about the business world

 

Notre idée est venue d'un désir de se lancer en affaires et d'un manque d'offre de produits pensés d'abord pour les filles et 100% fabriqués au Canada. Notre style est simple, nos tuques sont confortables et d'une qualité supérieure à ce qui se trouve sur le marché actuellement, étant fait d'un tissus 50% acrylique, 50% coton. Nos produits sont fabriqués et conçus dans une usine québécoise dans la région de Joliette.

~ Our idea came from a lack of products made mostly for girls and manufactured in our country. Our toques are made to be simple, comfortable and with a higher quality than what is on the market since our fabric is 50% acrylic and 50% cotton. Our products are conceived in a shop near Joliette, Quebec, Canada.

Tricot 100% canadien fait à l'usine dans la région de Joliette ~ 100% canadian knit made in a shop near Joliette

Nous lançons cette première campagne dans le but de trouver des fonds pour créer notre site web qui servira de carte de visite pour lancer nos produits sur le marché. Nous croyons qu’en 2014 un bon site web est la clé pour la réussite.

~ Our goal for this campaign is to have funds to launch our web site, knowing that in 2014, a great web site is the key for success. 

 

Notre concept pour cette campagne est d'offrir, à partir de 25$, une tuque à votre goût, vous offrant 2 modèles (plié ou long) et 5 couleurs (gris, beige, bourgogne, menthe et bleu). C'est votre choix, selon vos goûts. C'est ce que nous visons avec cette campagne: pouvoir offrir un produit à l'image de ceux qui porteront nos tuques. Il y a aussi un modèle unique gris et noir comme autre option. Nos modèles peuvent aussi très bien plaire à la gent masculine.

~ We wanted to have simple products that can be flexible to your taste. We have 2 models (folded or unfolded) and 5 colors (grey, beige, burgundy, mint and blue). During our campaign, your contribution will be rewarded by receiving our products and by giving you the choice of your favorite model and your favorite color. There is aslo a unique model grey and black as another option. All our toques can also fit men tastes.

Modèle plié et long / 5 couleurs ~ Folded and unfolded models / 5 colors

Modèle unique gris/noir ~ Unique model grey/black

 

Nous espérons que vous aimez la simplicité de nos produits et que notre projet vous a intéressé. Nous vous remercions du fond du cœur pour votre contribution et travaillons fort pour vous donner un produit qu’on espère vous aimerez porter.

~ We hope you like the simplicity of our products and that our project interested you. We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for your contribution and we will keep on working hard to offer you great products that, we hope, you will like to wear.

Visitez nous aussi sur Facebook et instagram (#hiems & @hiems_knitwear) pour plus d'informations. Laissez-nous vos commentaires ou idées et n'hésitez pas à partager notre projet s'il vous a inspiré!

~ Visit our Facebook page and instagram (#hiems & @hiems_knitwear) for more information. Let us know your comments and ideas et don't hesitate to share our project if it inspired you!

 

 

DÉTAILS SUR LES CONTRIBUTONS ~ DETAILS ON CONTRIBUTIONS

 

***POUR NOUS INDIQUER VOS CHOIX DE TUQUES: laissez-nous un commentaire sur notre page indiegogo ou hiemsknitwear@gmail.com ou notre page Facebook en message privé***

***TO JOIN US FOR THE CHOICE OF YOUR TOQUES: leave us a comment on our indiegogo page or hiemsknitwear@gmail.com or our Facebook page in private message***

Contribution de 5.00$ ~ 5.00$ contribution

Un 5.00$ montre votre intérêt pour nos produits et nous vous remercions du fond du cœur! Si désiré, votre nom sera affiché sur notre page Facebook dans la section des contributeurs.

~ A 5.00$ shows your interest in our products and we thank you from the bottom of our hearts. If desired, your name will show on our Facebook page in the contributors section.

Contribution de 25.00$ ~ 25.00$ contribution

Recevez 1 tuque selon le modèle et la couleur désiré. SVP nous indiquer le choix du modèle (plié ou long) et le choix de la couleur (bourgogne, menthe, bleu, gris, beige) OU si vous désirez le modèle unique gris/noir. Si désiré, nous inscrirons votre nom / pays sur notre futur site web comme contributeur.

~ Receive 1 toque, model and color of your choice. Please tell us the model you chose (folded or unfolded) and the color (burgundy, mint, blue, grey, beige) OR if you chose the unique model grey/black. If desired, we will indicate your name / country on our futur web site on contributor page.

Contribution de 45.00$ ~ 45.00$ contribution

(Rabais de 5.00$ par rapport à la contribution de 25.00$ ~ 5.00$ discount compared to the 25.00$ contribution)

Recevez 2 tuques selon le modèle et la couleur désiré. SVP nous indiquer le choix du modèle (plié ou long) et le choix de la couleur (bourgogne, menthe, bleu, gris, beige) pour chacune des 2 tuques OU si vous désirez le modèle unique gris/noir. Si désiré, nous publierons votre photo / nom / pays sur notre futur site web comme contributeur. SVP nous envoyer votre photo prise avec la tuque en message privé sur Facebook ;).

~ Receive 2 toques, model and color of your choice. Please tell us the model you chose (folded or unfolded) and the color (burgundy, mint, blue, grey, beige) for each of your 2 toques OR if you chose the unique model grey/black. If desired, we will publish your picture / name / country on our futur web site on contributor page. Please send us your picture with your toque in a private message on our Facebook page ;).

Contribution de 63.00$ ~ 63.00$ contribution

(Rabais de 12.00$ par rapport à la contribution de 25.00$ ~ 12.00$ discount compared to the 25.00$ contribution)

Recevez 3 tuques selon le modèle et la couleur désiré. SVP nous indiquer le choix du modèle (plié ou long) et le choix de la couleur (bourgogne, menthe, bleu, gris, beige) pour chacune des 3 tuques OU si vous désirez le modèle unique gris/noir. Si désiré, nous publierons votre photo / nom / pays sur notre futur site web comme contributeur. SVP nous envoyer votre photo prise avec la tuque en message privé sur Facebook ;).

~ Receive 3 toques, model and color of your choice. Please tell us the model you chose (folded or unfolded) and the color (burgundy, mint, blue, grey, beige) for each of your 3 toques OR if you chose the unique model grey/black. If desired, we will publish your picture / name / country on our futur web site on contributor page. Please send us your picture with your toque in a private message on our Facebook page ;).

Contribution de 100.00$ ~ 100.00$ contribution

(Rabais de 25.00$ par rapport à la contribution de 25.00$ ~ 25.00$ discount compared to the 25.00$ contribution)

Recevez 5 tuques selon le modèle et la couleur désiré. SVP nous indiquer le choix du modèle (plié ou long) et le choix de la couleur (bourgogne, menthe, bleu, gris, beige) pour chacune des 5 tuques OU si vous désirez le modèle unique gris/noir. Si désiré, nous publierons votre photo grand format / nom / pays sur notre futur site web comme contributeur. SVP nous envoyer votre photo prise avec la tuque en message privé sur Facebook ;).

~ Receive 5 toques, model and color of your choice. Please tell us the model you chose (folded or unfolded) and the color (burgundy, mint, blue, grey, beige) for each 5 toques OR if you chose the unique model grey/black. If desired, we will publish your large size picture / name / country on our futur web site on contributor page. Please send us your picture with your toque in a private message on our Facebook page ;).

 

LIVRAISON AU CANADA ~ SHIPPING INSIDE CANADA

La livraison est incluse pour les envois à l’intérieur du Canada. Pour des raisons d’économie, si vous commandez plus d’une tuque à la fois, il est possible que vous receviez vos paquets séparément. Vu la quantité de commande inconnue pour le moment, sachez que nous ne pouvons garantir un moment précis de livraison pour le moment. Cependant, le délai maximum est la fin de la campagne. Nous vous tiendrons informés. Merci de votre compréhension.

~ Shipping is included for parcels sent inside Canada. For economic reasons, you may receive your parcel in separate shipments if you order more than 1 toque at a time. Since the order quantities are unknown for the moment, we can’t guaranty a precise delivery date. The maximum delay for your shipment to be sent will be the end of this actual campaign. We will keep you informed. Thank you for your comprehension.

 

LIVRAISON À L’INTERNATIONAL ~ INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING

La livraison à l’international n’est pas incluse à 100%. Nous calculerons le prix de la livraison à l’intérieur du Canada et vous chargerons la différence qui s’applique pour livrer dans votre pays. Sachez que nous tenterons de réduire les frais au maximum. Vu la quantité de commande inconnue pour le moment, sachez que nous ne pouvons garantir un moment précis de livraison. Cependant, le délai maximum est la fin de la campagne. Nous vous tiendrons informés. Merci de votre compréhension.

~ International shipping is not 100% included. We will take the price of shipping inside Canada and charge you the difference to send to your country. Be sure we will try to reduce shipping price at the maximum. Since the order quantities are unknown for the moment, we can’t guaranty a precise delivery date. The maximum delay for your shipment to be sent will be the end of this actual campaign. We will keep you informed. Thank you for your comprehension.

story:
This little picture book is a joint venture

 with a publisher. This seems to mean that I pay for all the publishing costs, and if I hope to sell any books, I have discovered, I have to pay for all advertising too, or no-one will ever know about the book.

So, PLEASE, anyone hitting on this campaign, contribute £1 or $1 or as little

as you wish.  I have nearly enough now for a newspaper advertisement.

Bad Angus and Mr Foxy would be well pleased

I lived happily in the house in the little story for 35 years, but I got broke and had to move out.

The snapshots in this picture book are, for me, a fond memory of my former home, my little grandchildren and the many creatures who visited my garden. There is Bad Angus, Miranda my own little cat, Mr Foxy, a robin and some gliding swans. It is situated in central Edinburgh, Scotland, very near to the Queens Park and Holyrood Palace the official home of The Queen in Scotland.

Little children would like this happy story where Bad Angus turns out to be

Brave Angus.

You can see it on Amazon books.".Bad Angus by Laura Bennett".. look inside there too.

Also see the three reviews on Amazon.

Only 9 people have bought the book so far because people do not know it

exists.  This is why I am requesting donations from you, please, for publicity

to let people know about it.



Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
WHAT IF YOU COULD MAKE A HUGE DIFFERENCE IN CHILDREN'S LIVES?

  Hi, my name is Vic. I am 72 and full of the energy and desire to make a huge difference in the lives of children and adults. I have reinvented myself as a milkman, baker, appliance repair and sales, refished antique furniture,  bought and sold treasures I found at garage sales on Ebay, and now I am a published author. All in spite of being raised in a disfunctional family. I am always looking for a better way to help those I meet with what i have learned along my path in life. I get things done.

  For to many years I suffered needlessly from the debilitating fear of expressing my True Self in front of people. I was raised when saying like, “Kids were to be seen and not heard,”  and "Sticks and Stones will break your bones, but ‘WORDS’ can never hurt you," among many other negative debilitating beliefs. Feelings and questions were not allowed to be expressed. At a young age, before I became aware of having a choice about what I wanted to feel, ‘words’ and 'beliefs' were thrown into the mind of my defenseless being, eroding the very core of my TRUE SELF.

  In an attempt to rid myself of this fear, I began to notice children and adults with the same issue, the inability to expressing themselves with power and confidence. This lack of power in expressing one's true self came from somewhere and I was committed to finding out its cause.

  So  I created the Magicardstory™ "Little Joe and the Joker" a Magic Card Story told by you and a deck of playing cards. Even though you have someone cut the cards 5 different times, the cards match the story as it unfolds, creating a ... Magical Illusion ... of the cards APPPEARING .............. AS YOU SPEAK!


  Then I created the Magicardstory™ called: “The Wizard of Wishes,” a Magic Card Story told by you and a deck of playing cards. Even though you have someone cut the cards 5 different times, the cards match the story as it unfolds, creating a ... Magical Illusion ... of the cards APPPEARING .............. AS YOU SPEAK!

 

 I began to notice the reactions of the kids that learned the secret to this Magic Card Story as they preformed it in front of people. It was then and I knew I was on to something. That sparkle in the eyes of kids that preformed the trick ignighted something I missed in my childhood = Recognition, acknowledgement, attention. It also improves memory, concentration and raises self confidence and self worth.

  Getting this book in the hands of kids around the world has the potential of preventing the suffering I went through for many years, the suffering of not being true to myself, looking for the recognition I did not receive, thinking I did not fit in. All because of something that was said to them from a person who was not being responsible for their words having power.                                    
 

                              

   After finishing that book I received a delightful gift on my 60th birthday that would have a profound effect on my life. I received a visit from a friend who asked me what I wanted to do on my birthday. I responded with, “I want to write another book.” Little did I know the power in those words at that time. I fought the excuses, yet I drove to a lake, found a shady spot and settled in with my notebook and my favorite pen.


                This is where the focus of my campaign 'began' to show up.

  It was then that Izy, my muse, abruptly came into my life. He was an audacious Idea whose time had come and he would not be denied. As I sat attempting to find a title for this book, he popped into my head appearing as a little light bulb saying, “Vic, I have a gift for you. If you will listen and write down what I have to say, I will grant you your birthday wish.” Well, I did write down what he had to say and it became the book, “Victims of the Voice.” When I returned home he appeared again, along with a few of his friends, telling me I had to learn from a few lesson in life, before I could present this book to the public. Years passed.

                                                                       
  This story was to become the answer to finding the cause of the fear and as Izy coached me through those lessons I got rid of the fear of expressing my True Self and began to experience the power of my own true voice, eliminating the victim I had become.  Once the fear was gone I began to realize what Izy had given me. It was the missing link, the one thing I could not discover on my own. It came with a great responsibility and I was ready to take it on.

    Then what showed up was Indiegogo. A friend mentioned I might find what I was looking for here. A place to ask for support in getting this book in the hands of those who suffer the powerless feeling of life dragging them along, having no power, no voice, no say about how their life turned out.  So, I began to comprise this request, asking for your support for those suffering from becoming “Victims of the Voice.”  

                                                     The Secret.

  The power to overcome this voice that caused the victimization is located in plain sight, when used in multiplies and it is unlimited. It has the power to disappear and to manifest, is acquired by recognition and appropriation. The best part of this gift we are all give at birth is that it is Free. Once recognized and put to use it changes lives and rids the person of suffering from the fear of true self-expression, among many other fears and negative experiences.  With some practice it gives you control over your own life, also giving you a say in the matter of your future experiences. As your self worth and self confidence increases you begin to experience your ability to choose for yourself, therefore altering your view of life.  

 This voice, the one that says, “what voice” is the cause of many, many issues people deal with in their daily lives. Once recognized it can be tamed and eventually it becomes quiet allowing you to generate self-confidence, laughter, joy, self worth and power over your own life.     

                                My mission statement is as follows.

  I intend to make this book available at a reduced cost, and if needed it will be given away for free. I am not in a position to carry those costs, so this is where I am asking you to join me in demystifying this injustice, therefore exposing the truth and increasing awareness by revealing the cause of the fear, the damage it causes, and the cure.  

   I will intend to give talks to promote the book, speaking of its value to demystify, not fix to issues, now that my fear is gone. I also intend to be on the radio in the future, sharing the secret I discovered when Izy came to visit me and helped me write this book. 

 
  My next project it to create a ‘CD’ of “The Victims of the Voice,” intending to offer it at a discounted cost also, to those in need. This project will begin in June-July. After thatI am going to pitch Izy, the Idea  {The premise} to be turned into a movie.

  I would appreciate, those of you that view this page, any noise you make. Any links to contacts that would assist this campaign in becoming bigger than even I can imagine. Unnecessary suffering is running rampant throughout the world and all it takes is enough people to say, "Enough!" We have been conned into believing we are Victims of the Voice! We are not!!!!!!

  *** Take a moment to view the Perks, give it some thought. Please choose to help me make the difference I know can be made.


   For those who have been dragged along and experienced being at the mercy of this fear of expressing your True Self, or any other fear. Believe me, there is no feeling like having a say in the matter of how your life turns out in the future, apposed to dealing with the same old issues over and over again.

story:
The project is now funded, completed, and live for sale to the public!

A book of stories for, by, and about fathers of children that experience disability. (And the women who love them.)

Get your free three-story preview with this link!

Visit the full project website at www.dadsofdisability.com

  • The book's title is Dads of Disability: Stories for, by, and about Fathers of Children that Experience Disability
  • Stories are written by me, other fathers, mothers, and others. The book includes some poetry and micro-stories. The focus is on specific situations, storytelling, and lessons seen through the eyes of or written for or through the filter of a father or male caregiver.
  • The book will help fathers feel less alone, spur conversations with peers, significant others, and families.
  • The least expensive perk is a $9 DRM-free PDF file of the book when it is released.
  • Although the book is "for" Dads it is also for the Moms and women that love those Dads.
  • Funds needed for production costs, writer stipends, awareness and marketing (mailings, podcast and blog sponsorships, PR, possible conference and travel expenses, etc.)
  • I am actively looking for essay and poem contributors! Read on...

The first concern should be about the child. And to best focus on the individual with a disability, fathers need to learn a lot. There are a lot of feelings to understand and process after diagnosis as well as throughout life's milestones.

Wouldn’t it be nice if dads had a source where they could read father-specific stories to learn that their feelings and experiences are shared with other fathers? That they are not alone?

What this book is about: This book is about specific situations and experiences told in such a way that new fathers, experienced fathers, and those that love and support them can learn.  Or maybe even provide family discussion topics. The book will contain micro-stories, essays from ~500 to ~2500 words, and a few poems from the poetry contest judged by poet and author Marly Youmans

Keep and eye on the main project page to learn more about how the topics are shaping up.

What this book isn't about:  This book is not a full-length, first-person inspirational narrative about a particular individual or family or a specific disability. There are a lot of great books like that already out there! It is not a practical handbook about services and systems. It isn’t a gripe session about the way the world should be. It isn’t a reference book.

Is this book for women too? Yes. This book is for men, but it is also for women who would like to read about male perspectives and gain additional insights into understanding and communicating with the dads and male caregivers in their lives.

The content usually delivered by support systems for families like ours rarely addresses fathers in very much detail--or at all. One only need look at most blogs and books to see the majority of support content is targeted at moms and females. This book attempts to address that shortcoming.

What will the funds raised be used for? The funding will be used to locate and pay stipends to essay and poem contributors, to complete the editing and production of the book and ebooks including design, getting files ready, and the expenses incurred in self publishing.

The financial target for this project is conservative -- it will not cover the full costs of creating and marketing this whole project. My hope is that you’ll share this project far and wide and we can exceed the conservative target.


Story submissions are still open.You can learn about the themes and desired approach and the submission guidelines here. While I seek all fathers (and their supporters) stories, I urge fathers of color, older dads, military dads, dads who have disabilities themselves--basically a wide range of fathers whose child of any age experiences a disability--to submit an essay or idea.

Hi.  I'm Gary. Darned pleased to meet you.  In different phases of my life I have been variously known as a son, musician, a special needs camp counselor, a computer dude, a tech writer, a product and marketing manager, and an entrepreneur.  But my most important and rewarding and enduring role is as a Dad.

You can learn more about me on my marketing site at www.garydietz.com and of course at the www.dadsofdisability.com web site. I'm a hardworking optimist. My goal in this project is to help other dads, and if I am lucky, not end up in the hole -- or maybe even with a few extra bucks -- after the project is complete.

Casey Silvestri is a recently graduated high school student, and soon to be college student in an animation program.  Casey graduated the same high school as I did exactly 30 years after me. I happen to think she is going to be famous.  You should buy the perk of her artwork from her video and get in on the ground floor!

I wrote the script and and recorded the voiceovers. Casey created the animation.  We worked together to edit and critique and it was very much a collaboration.  She was very fun to work with.

Please note:  This project is a book and a website.  This is not a movie or animation project. At this point, the animation is only for the marketing of this project.

Those that think that this book will minimize individuals with disabilities, people-first language critics who may object to the title, those who question the project's "dad focus", those who were troubled by the intro video subjects and approach, and other naysayers please read main project’s website's FAQ and submission guidelines FAQ. Or maybe submit an essay yourself. This book won't be perfect, but it will attempt to empower all constituencies even though it is focused on dads.

story:
vertigo is an upcoming novel written by Cristian Mihai. A story about the way tragedies can either make us stronger or weaker, it deals with one man's struggle to find it in himself to move on after his life shatters to pieces. 

It will be made available in both e-book and paperback formats.

In order for this to happen, I need about $1,500. We managed to raise $514 in a previous campaign, and now I'm trying to raise the difference.

What We Need & What You Get

The total amount I'm trying to raise is $1,500, but the truth is the actual amount is closer to $1,300 because of PayPal and Indiegogo fees.

Around $4-500 will go towards editing the final manuscript.  And, yes, even if you self-publish, you still need your book to be professionally edited. This is not the Internet, this is something you’re asking money for, so you have to offer people a finished product that's as flawless as possible.

There's also the cost of perks to consider: ordering paperback copies and shipping them. 

The remaining funds will go towards marketing and promoting, which means paying for ads on relevant websites such as Goodreads, hosting giveaways and contests. I don’t think there’s really a need to go crazy when it comes to spending on marketing and promoting a self-published novel.

That’s pretty much why I need the money, what I need it for, and how I want to proceed.

In return for your contributions you'll receive e-books, mentions in the book, signed paperbacks, and prints of the cover artwork. And the oh-so-good feeling of having helped me out.

Without your help I wouldn't be able to release this book, simply because I can't afford to pay for everything that needs to be done. But with your contributions, I can reach the goal and make sure the best possible version of the novel gets released.

Simply put, I get to do what I love and try to make a living out of it. 

And what I love is to be my own kind of superhero and change your worlds, word by word. I might even inspire you to join the team. But for now, it's up to you to help me get there.

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course, if you just can’t contribute, you can still help out by making some noise about this campaign. Share, tweet, e-mail, or tell your friends in real life about it!

The more people get to read about this campaign, the more likely it is for it to reach its goal!

story:
Desperate times...desperate measures are called for.

Angelia Sparrow is the author of twelve novels and over seventy-five short stories. She has been nominated for the Lambda Literary Award, the Gaylactic Spectrum Award and the Darrell Award. She's known for writing science-fiction, fantasy and horror, usually with a same-sex romance component and sometimes with BDSM.


   


And in 2012, she lost her job.

Right now, she's not quite making ends meet as an inventory clerk, a writer and a publisher. She sells her life for eight dollars and fifty cents an hour, spends the free time editing other people's work and has little time of her own to write.

So, this is an experiment. Time and again, Angelia has proven herself capable of writing a novel in the space of one month. Now, we're putting it to the real test. If this campaign meets its initial goal, Angelia will write a novel. This is defined as a book of no less than fifty thousand words.

All written in a month.


This campaign is to create that month by taking away the worries of bills and the erratic work schedule.


Details

The book will be published through Inkstained Succubus Productions, Angelia's small press. The campaign ends May 1. Angelia's Month of Writing Dangerously begins June 1. At this time, the projected convention is Hypericon, in Nashville TN. The book will be given precedence in the publishing queue and should be out September 1, 2014.

It will be available in ebook, paperback, and hardback formats. These will be available through Amazon, Barns and Noble, All Romance Ebooks, Lightening Source/Ingrams and other outlets. Audiobooks are one of our stretch goals

All contributors will be invited to the Supporters Only Blog to follow the writing progress and receive acknowledgment in the book. Those who donate at the $5 level get an ebook copy. Higher donations bring paperbacks, audiobooks, personal appearances, and even a chance to see this writer of kink put her money where her mouth is.

The book will be decided by the contributors via poll. It could be WWII furries. It could be Civil War zombies. It could p.i. DJ Admire against the fae. 

 The t-shirt reads "Angelia Sparrow, Official contributor"


Initial Goal: $4400

Angelia Life Support: $2300

  • Mortgage: 1100
  • Car Payment: 500
  • Utilities, including phone and net, 400
  • Food: 300

Laptop: $350 

This sounds frivolous, but a good laptop helps immensely. I have sciatica and arthritis and the computer chair can get uncomfortable. With a laptop, I can move to a comfy chair and keep writing.

Publishing: $850

This is for one novel.

  • Cover art: $200.
  • Line Edits: 250.
  • Content Edits: 250.
  • Formatting: 150

Convention: $500

  • Hotel: $250
  • Food: 75
  • Book stock and publicity: 75
  • Gasoline:100

The rest is for various miscellaneous expenses and fees.


STRETCH GOALS!

We have nifty stretch goals, please consider helping fund them beyond the original amount.


  • $5500: The Audio Book Deal. This ensures all material will be put out as audio books as well as paper and electronic.


  • $8000: Two Months of Writing Dangerously. One short story, one novel and two conventions or signings

  • $10000: The Convention Improvement. This will add four more conventions or signings to Angelia's schedule

  • $12000: Three Months of Writing Dangerously: One novel and two short stories, six conventions or signings

  • $16000: Four Months of Writing Dangerously: Two novels, two short stories, six conventions or signings

  • $20,000: Five Months of Writing Dangerously: Two novels, three short stories, six conventions or signings

  • $24,000: Six Months of Writing Dangerously: Two novels and four short stories, six conventions or signings  

  • $30,000: Seven Months of Writing Dangerously: Two novels, five short stories, eleven conventions or signings

  • $36,000: Nine Months of Writing Dangerously: Three novels, six short stories, eleven conventions or signings

  • $45,000: A Year of Writing Dangerously: Four novels, Eight short stories, twelve conventions or signings

story:
Me presento!

Me llamo Sara Godoy y descubrí mi pasión por la poesía casi por accidente a los 11 años aproximadamente. Estudié educación infantil y trabaje unos 11 años como educadora en escuelas infantiles. Pero mi interés por los cuentos comenzó realmente cuando empecé a trabajar en una librería y haciendo talleres de cuenta cuentos. Entonces descubrí el efecto mágico que tienen sobre los niños y niñas que los escuchan. Aunque lo que realmente me interesó es el efecto que tienen sobre los adultos... Así comencé a crear talleres de cuento-terapia y a guiar a las personas que acudían, a resolver conflictos del pasado, incluso de la infancia, transformando  esas experiencias en cuentos y regalándose el final más maravilloso y completo que pudieran imaginar.

¡Así me enamoré de los cuentos y sus efectos mágicos!

Este es el primero de mis cuentos que va a ser publicado y, no por casualidad, sino porque es el más especial de todos ellos, es el único que me ha enseñado que todo es cuestión de actitud, que no basta con querer, hay que CREER  y que no pasa nada si una necesita un poquito de ayuda, al contrario ,compartir con otros lo que se hace con amor es el mejor regalo que se puede hacer una a sí misma.

 

 

No es solo un cuento...

 También es un proyecto solidario dirigido a la investigación del cáncer. Donaré una parte de los beneficios obtenidos a la  FUNDACIÓN JOSEP CARRERAS CONTRA LA LEUCEMIA.

Su gran labor, esfuerzo y superación me inspiró y animó a querer formar parte se su labor. Y puesto que este cuento nace de una experiencia cercana y contada en primera persona, supe que tenía que formar parte de esta aventura.

La Fundación Josep Carreras colaborará junto con la editorial Babidi-bu y conmigo misma en la difusión y la venta de este maravilloso proyecto en el que os invito a colaborar.

 

   ¿Qué me motivó a escribir esta historia?

           Escribo cuentos metafóricos desde hace años, con el fin de ayudar a conocernos mejor y a respetar cada experiencia de vida como una lección de oro.

Hace un par de años conocí un caso cercano de cáncer infantil y necesité escribir este cuento al igual que necesité hacer algo al respecto, poner mi granito de arena y compartir esta historia con el mundo .

           La suerte no existe, ni buena ni mala, somos responsables de como nos tomamos las experiencias y de lo que somos capaces de aprender de ellas. Esa es la filosofía de nuestra protagonista. De ese modo Niké decide aferrarse  a la lección que le brinda la vida y crecer, madurar y compartir lo que ella ha aprendido.

                                             

         Es una historia escrita en verso, inspiradora para grandes y pequeños que anima a cambiar la perspectiva de las dificultades del camino desde el amor y la actitud positiva que a veces olvidamos que tenemos.

         Tanto los problemas que nos derriban como los pequeños inconvenientes del día a día dependen siempre de como nos los queramos tomar. Con el ejemplo de Niké ayudaremos a todos los lectores y oyentes a controlar las emociones y sacar siempre el mejor partido de cualquier situación.

            Os animo a colaborar para que se haga realidad este gran proyecto y podamos hacer que cada lector u oyente despierte (si es que no lo ha hecho ya) a esa Niké que aguarda en su interior.

 

Un pequeño avance de Niké, la guerrera valiente.

Una niña que juega tranquilamente en casa, empieza a encontrarse mal. Sus padres la llevan al medico y pronto ingresa en un hospital. Aunque ella esta cansada, todo parece transcurrir con normalidad, hasta que de pronto ... un humo blanco la rodea y una voz que parecía conocerla bien y la esperaba con impaciencia, le explica la verdadera razón por la que esta niña se encuentra allí.

Todos tienen sus esperanzas puestas en ella, y necesitan de su valor y coraje para que su mundo no termine para siempre. Eso si.... tendrá que superar las pruebas pertinentes, algunas muy duras, para ser coronada finalmente como La Guerrera de Honor. Superará el dolor con sonrisas y luchará contra el miedo con helados y caricias.

Incluso tendrá que sacrificar su larga melena... pero ella, digna de ser La Guerrera de Honor, aceptará cada reto sin dar un paso a tras, mirando de frente al miedo y aprendiendo de cada una de las pruebas que su destino le tiene preparadas. 

 

¿De dónde viene el nombre de nuestra protagonista, Niké?

 Elegí este nombre de guerra para nuestra protagonista porque es el de la Diosa Griega de el valor y la victoria. Una pequeña mujer alada y requerida por todos los Dioses del Olimpo para vencer en sus batallas.

Me resultó verdaderamente inspirador que un ser mágico, pequeño y valiente fuera quien diera nombre a una niña que lucha con la mejor actitud y sin plantearse la derrota.

 

¿Por qué colaborar en esta campaña?

Para hacer grande lo pequeño, para hacer importante lo insignificante, porque una idea o una ilusión pueda ser la diferencia entre una vida o millones de ellas, y también, porque es un cuento precioso, alegre y divertido que sabe dar a cada Ser lo que necesite sin que se lo tenga que pedir.

Porque me ayudaréis a mi, una escritora algo asustada, a que me lance al fin al abismo y deje los miedos en casa. Porque podré compartir con el mundo lo que mas me gusta hacer y podré rescatar a mi propia Niké de la infancia, donde hace demasiado tiempo la dejé olvidada...

 

 

¿POR QUÉ 2.300 EUROS Y NO MAS NI MENOS?

* 2000 euros es la cantidad que he de pagar por los 210 ejemplares que me obliga a comprar la editorial y los gastos por la corrección obligatoria del texto.

* 200 euros son los gastos de los posters y los separadores para ayudar a la publicidad del cuento

* 100 euros es el porcentaje que se lleva la pagina por ayudarme con este proyecto y hacerlo llegar a hasta vosotros.

Si sobra dinero de los 2300 euros los donaría a la Fundación Josep Carreras.

 

 

Y A CAMBIO DE TU COLABORACIÓN:

  * Colaboración de 15 euros:  Podréis disfrutar de este cuento mucho antes de que salga a la venta recibiéndolo en casa y ver vuestro nombre en los agradecimientos.

  *Colaboración de 25 euros:  A parte de lo anterior recibiréis el cuento firmado.

   *Colaboración de 50 euros:  Recibiréis todo lo ofrecido anteriormente y varios pasa paginas de Niké, la guerrera valiente.

   * Colaboración de 100 euros:  Con esta colaboración recibiréis todo lo ofrecido anteriormente y dos posters firmados de el cuento.

Y por supuesto sabréis que una parte de vuestra colaboración servirá para que los maravillosos científicos de la Fundación Josep Carreras continúen investigando para curar la leucemia.

Todos seremos IMPARABLES CONTRA LA LEUCEMIA

 

GRACIAS A TODOS Y TODAS POR HACER QUE EL SUEÑO DE TANTOS SE HAGA REALIDAD

          P.D.: Si no puedes colaborar económicamente, no te preocupes, puedes compartir esta campaña y estarás colaborando para que otros la vean.

¡¡¡HAZ ECO!!!

 

                                                                                     Sara Godoy

 También es un proyecto solidario dirigido a la investigación del cáncer. Donaré una parte de los beneficios obtenidos a la  FUNDACIÓN JOSEP CARRERAS CONTRA LA LEUCEMIA.
Su gran labor, esfuerzo y superación me inspiró y animó a querer formar parte se su labor. Y puesto que este cuento nace de una experiencia cercana y contada en primera persona, supe que tenía que formar parte de esta aventura.
La Fundación Josep Carreras colaborará junto con la editorial Babidi-bu y conmigo misma en la difusión y la venta de este maravilloso proyecto en el que os invito a colaborar.
 

   ¿Qué me motivó a escribir esta historia?
           Escribo cuentos metafóricos desde hace años, con el fin de ayudar a conocernos mejor y a respetar cada experiencia de vida como una lección de oro.
Hace un par de años conocí un caso cercano de cáncer infantil y necesité escribir este cuento al igual que necesité hacer algo al respecto, poner mi granito de arena y compartir esta historia con el mundo .
           La suerte no existe, ni buena ni mala, somos responsables de como nos tomamos las experiencias y de lo que somos capaces de aprender de ellas. Esa es la filosofía de nuestra protagonista. De ese modo Niké decide aferrarse  a la lección que le brinda la vida y crecer, madurar y compartir lo que ella ha aprendido.
                                             
         Es una historia escrita en verso, inspiradora para grandes y pequeños que anima a cambiar la perspectiva de las dificultades del camino desde el amor y la actitud positiva que a veces olvidamos que tenemos.
         Tanto los problemas que nos derriban como los pequeños inconvenientes del día a día dependen siempre de como nos los queramos tomar. Con el ejemplo de Niké ayudaremos a todos los lectores y oyentes a controlar las emociones y sacar siempre el mejor partido de cualquier situación.
            Os animo a colaborar para que se haga realidad este gran proyecto y podamos hacer que cada lector u oyente despierte (si es que no lo ha hecho ya) a esa Niké que aguarda en su interior.
 
Un pequeño avance de Niké, la guerrera valiente.
Una niña que juega tranquilamente en casa, empieza a encontrarse mal. Sus padres la llevan al medico y pronto ingresa en un hospital. Aunque ella esta cansada, todo parece transcurrir con normalidad, hasta que de pronto ... un humo blanco la rodea y una voz que parecía conocerla bien y la esperaba con impaciencia, le explica la verdadera razón por la que esta niña se encuentra allí.
Todos tienen sus esperanzas puestas en ella, y necesitan de su valor y coraje para que su mundo no termine para siempre. Eso si.... tendrá que superar las pruebas pertinentes, algunas muy duras, para ser coronada finalmente como La Guerrera de Honor. Superará el dolor con sonrisas y luchará contra el miedo con helados y caricias.
Incluso tendrá que sacrificar su larga melena... pero ella, digna de ser La Guerrera de Honor, aceptará cada reto sin dar un paso a tras, mirando de frente al miedo y aprendiendo de cada una de las pruebas que su destino le tiene preparadas. 
 
¿De dónde viene el nombre de nuestra protagonista, Niké?
 Elegí este nombre de guerra para nuestra protagonista porque es el de la Diosa Griega de el valor y la victoria. Una pequeña mujer alada y requerida por todos los Dioses del Olimpo para vencer en sus batallas.
Me resultó verdaderamente inspirador que un ser mágico, pequeño y valiente fuera quien diera nombre a una niña que lucha con la mejor actitud y sin plantearse la derrota.

 
¿Por qué colaborar en esta campaña?
Para hacer grande lo pequeño, para hacer importante lo insignificante, porque una idea o una ilusión pueda ser la diferencia entre una vida o millones de ellas, y también, porque es un cuento precioso, alegre y divertido que sabe dar a cada Ser lo que necesite sin que se lo tenga que pedir.
Porque me ayudaréis a mi, una escritora algo asustada, a que me lance al fin al abismo y deje los miedos en casa. Porque podré compartir con el mundo lo que mas me gusta hacer y podré rescatar a mi propia Niké de la infancia, donde hace demasiado tiempo la dejé olvidada...

 
 
¿POR QUÉ 2.300 EUROS Y NO MAS NI MENOS?
* 2000 euros es la cantidad que he de pagar por los 210 ejemplares que me obliga a comprar la editorial y los gastos por la corrección obligatoria del texto.
* 200 euros son los gastos de los posters y los separadores para ayudar a la publicidad del cuento
* 100 euros es el porcentaje que se lleva la pagina por ayudarme con este proyecto y hacerlo llegar a hasta vosotros.
Si sobra dinero de los 2300 euros los donaría a la Fundación Josep Carreras.
 
 
Y A CAMBIO DE TU COLABORACIÓN:
  * Colaboración de 15 euros:  Podréis disfrutar de este cuento mucho antes de que salga a la venta recibiéndolo en casa y ver vuestro nombre en los agradecimientos.
  *Colaboración de 25 euros:  A parte de lo anterior recibiréis el cuento firmado.
   *Colaboración de 50 euros:  Recibiréis todo lo ofrecido anteriormente y varios pasa paginas de Niké, la guerrera valiente.
   * Colaboración de 100 euros:  Con esta colaboración recibiréis todo lo ofrecido anteriormente y dos posters firmados de el cuento.
Y por supuesto sabréis que una parte de vuestra colaboración servirá para que los maravillosos científicos de la Fundación Josep Carreras continúen investigando para curar la leucemia.
Todos seremos IMPARABLES CONTRA LA LEUCEMIA

 
GRACIAS A TODOS Y TODAS POR HACER QUE EL SUEÑO DE TANTOS SE HAGA REALIDAD
          P.D.: Si no puedes colaborar económicamente, no te preocupes, puedes compartir esta campaña y estarás colaborando para que otros la vean.
¡¡¡HAZ ECO!!!
                                                                                      Sara Godoy

story:
"For me, Mizna is the heart and soul of the Arab arts community . . ." — writer Layla Azmi Goushey


"These are stories that need to be heard" — audience member at Mizna's Twin Cities Film Festival


Who We Are

We are Mizna! A forum for Arab American film, literature, and art. With you as our partner, we have been able to provide a space for artists, writers, filmmakers, and other creatives doing cutting edge work for over 15 years. The work we present fills a critical need in our cultural landscape—a space for Arab artists to tell their own stories, to write back against a cultural and political climate that seeks to define and vilify Arabs and Muslims.



About This Project

Mizna’s work has been gaining national attention, and we’ve recently received funding from the Knight Foundation's Knight Arts Challenge for our upcoming project Arab America at Home. 

This project will bring incredible authors, films, and arts events into unexpected places in St. Paul with:


  • a world-class photography exhibition from renowned artist Osama Esid, Still / Life / Syria, a portraiture project from the Syrian refugee camp in Adana, Turkey, presented with the conviction that, in time, there will still be life for Syria.

  • POETRY PICNIC & OUTDOOR FILM SCREENING     on August 19 in Mears Park. We'll celebrate the release of the summer issue of Mizna and watch May in the Summer by Cherien Dabis under the stars.


  • READINGS     from incredible Arab American authors including Pulitzer-nominated novelist Laila Lalami. Laila was nominated for the Pulitzer for her gorgeous novel The Moor's Crossing, and we were lucky enough to have published her work in our literary journal, Mizna.

  • Mizna's Twin Cities Arab Film Festival, November 5–8. The festival will be held at the St. Anthony Main Theatre and will close at the beautiful Walker Art Center. 


  • And (if you can believe it) much more!


What We Need & What You Get

This funding from Knight is a Challenge Grant, and we were tasked with raising a matching $40,000 in order to receive the Knight dollars. We have already secured $25,000 from generous individuals and foundations, but WE MUST RAISE AN ADDITIONAL $15,000 BY JULY 15! We are working to raise half of that through this IndieGoGo campaign's goal of $7500, and half through a simultaneous check-writing campaign.

To thank you for your generous donation, we have a number of thank you gifts to choose from at different levels, including Arab Street art stencil posters, a portrait sitting with renowned Osama Esid, and cooking alongside incredible chef of Saffron Restaurant, Sameh Wadi. Read through all the perks on the right!


Risks & Challenges

This is a Challenge Grant from the Knight Foundation, which means Mizna has the opportunity and the challenge of raising $15,000 by July 15 ($7500 through this IndieGoGo campaign). If we do not reach this goal together Mizna will have to cancel our upcoming St. Paul events, and no one wants that to happen!

Also keep in mind when supporting Mizna that your contribution is a tax-deductible. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out to your friends! Can you get 10 people in your circle to support Mizna? Use e-mail, Facebook, Twitter, and other means to get your community engaged and excited! We have a month to reach this goal, and we can't (and don't want to) do it without you!


Thank you for being a part of our vision.

story:
Please help fund our book about the links between science and the Holy Qur'an

Bismillahirahmanirahim
Summary
The Qu'ran, many believe, is the greatest book in existence.
There has been for centuries investigations into the links between science and religion, especially now with modern discoveries in quantum physics which has almost linked the two fields. 
Originally inspired by the writings of Sheikh Hisham Kabbani, this is the first book for young people on the subject with exciting illustrations and straightforward commentary encouraging children to think for themselves and to contemplate the creation around them. To have the fascination that mystics and scientists have had since the beginning of civilisation, which drives on new fields of discovery, both inner and outer, personally and globally.


What is the funding for?
I believe the best way to make it freely available and to have control over the editing is to self-publish. It will then be available through Amazon and other on-line marketplaces as well as distributed by Xlibris throughout the USA and UK. This costs £609. Each book is produced when ordered which means there is no initial large layout of funds.
I also need to purchase the images (there are over 400) which will cost £307. So the total amount needed is about £920.
Layout and book content
  • The book will be in the the style of a Doring Kindersley non-fiction book, A4 format with many illustrations
  • Each chapter is preceded by an 'ancient' page of Quran with original calligraphy by Hana Horack in early Kulfic style
  • 13 chapters on a variety of subjects including Pairs in Creation, the Universe, Plantary Orbits, plate tectonics, meeting of the Oceans, Quantum physics and more
  • A small section on homework notes, giving ideas for further research and study at home   
A bit more about the book....
Dr. Amira val Baker, an astrophysicist, currently working on ground breaking particle research, has assisted with the latest scientific thought and we plan to include a page specifically about black holes, her specialism. 
Lateefa Spiker, a wonderful artist, has also produced a beautiful illustration for the contents page. 
The book has been also requested to be translated into Arabic and Spanish.
We hope the book, InshAllah will strengthen the link between the Quran and science for young Muslims so that they feel that their studies in school are not separate from their religion. For non-Muslims, to understand more about the Islamic faith and to interest them in the teachings found in the Holy Qur'an.
50% of profits of the book will be donated to Hajja Naziha's fund for orphans.

Progress so far...

The content of the book is already completed and have already begun the process of final editing with Xlibris publishing.
Here is a sample chapter about iron:


 


Please help fund the project.

If you can't afford much, even £5 will help or if you can't afford to donate then please pass it on to others who may be able to help. 

May Allah bless you for your generosity.

story:
The 80 Book Holiday Sale

Here's the thing...

We really want to offer OUTWORLD, the print edition, as a Print-On-Demand book on Amazon.  

However, our very limited capital is currently tied up in the remaining 80 copies of OUTWORLD from last Spring's Earth Day order (we did sell quite a few around Earth Day and during the Norman Arts Council Writers Conference last spring, but these are what are left). 

We need to sell these 80 copies, or at least most of them, to clear our credit line and make a new order with BookBaby which will include our new smaller number of print copies and a Print-On-Demand option (you have to order a minimum amount of print copies with a POD order).  Once Print-On-Demand is in place, any one can order a print copy, any time from anywhere, regardless of how many we have in stock.   

The Holiday Season seems the perfect time for those of you who have read and enjoyed OUTWORLD to share it with you family and friends, and in so doing, to help us reach our goal.

In case you are new to our loyal family of readers, OUTWORLD is a tale set in a climate altered world of the future.  As we have said since day one, "In the future...climate change is no longer a theory."  In our future, the survivors of the human race are divided between those who live with the land and those who live in the shelter of an artificial dome...and one hunts the other!

With that said, you should know that OUTWORLD is not your typical dystopian read.  It is populated with alternatives and twists not typically found in similar novels. 

For more information visit our website at www.outworldthebook.com or our Facebook Page, OUTWORLD by N. Harold Donley (https://www.facebook.com/Outworld-by-N-Harold-D...)

What you get...

A copy (or copies, if you are really generous) of OUTWORLD by N. Harold Donley to keep or give as a holiday gift to the sci-fi lover in your family or among your friends.

If you know someone concerned with Climate Change or the social evolution of humankind, this is the book for them.

We'll even autograph it, for you or someone else, if you wish!

What we get...

The opportunity to remove the last obstacle to OUTWORLD becoming a Print-On-Demand book on Amazon.  It is already offered as both an e-book, which it began as in 2011, and a print edition, which came out in 2012.

The Impact

Print-On-Demand is the way we wanted to go originally, along with an e-book, but it was just not an option in 2011.  We know our readers, for whatever reason, prefer a real, honest-to-God, book.  Our print edition vs. e-book sales are  4-to-1 (wish it were the other way around but that's the truth).

So the impact is this...once again you help a free lance author with his cautionary tale of climate change...and in doing so you free up our resources so we can get into Print-On-Demand for those who want a print copy in the future.

Other Ways You Can Help

The "Share" button is the most important tool in this campaign.  In addition to your purchase of a copy of OUTWORLD, the next best and most important way you can help is ... share, share, share. You know hundreds of people we do not and you can put this campaign and OUTWORLD before those good folks.

Finally, and I always want to speak to this, many of you have been so very kind as ask, repeatedly, about a sequel to OUTWORLD.  The sequel is in the works, working title: OUTWORLD: Omega, along with the outline of a prequel.  

My hope is that obtaining Print-On-Demand of OUTWORLD will free up more time for actual writing and work on the sequel.

story:
Bright Green is one of the UK's leading left-wing blogs, publishing news and comment on green politics and social movements since January 2010.

Next year presents exciting elections for Green Parties across the UK, and we need your help to publish quality independent coverage of these campaigns, as well as to continue to provide a platform for discussion of the broader future of green and progressive politics in the UK and Europe.

We are aiming to raise £2000 over the next month to cover our costs including travel, publicity, printing, and our website, and would appreciate any contribution to help us meet these costs. And whether or not you can contribute, it would be fantastic if you could help us spread the word!


After 2015 brought the Green Surge and the best-ever Westminster result for the Greens, 2016 presents a number of key opportunities for Green Parties across the UK, with several critical elections all taking place on 5th May:

  • In London, the Greens hope to add to their two seats on the London Assembly and run a strong campaign in the Mayoral election, mobilising support and highlighting the Green Party’s radical vision for London
  • The Scottish Greens look set to increase their representation in Holyrood from two MSPs to eight or more, representing every region of Scotland, and working to hold the SNP to account
  • The Welsh Greens seek to make a breakthrough in the Senedd, gaining their first one or two Assembly Members
  • The Green Party of Northern Ireland are in a good position to add to their one Assembly Member, in a region where Green politics is valuable in bringing together divided communities
  • In Bristol, Liverpool and Sheffield, Greens are set to make gains in local elections and headway in mayoral elections, increasing the possibility of Green MPs in those cities in 2020


Bright Green hopes to play our part in this vital year for Greens across the UK, publishing high-quality, original, independent coverage of these elections in the six months leading up to 5th May, including breaking news from the campaigns and interviews with Green candidates across the UK.

Beyond the elections, we also seek to provide a platform to discuss the broader future of the green politics and social movements throughout the UK and Europe, and bring together some of the best green thinking under one roof to expand people’s vision of what is possible in politics. We will continue publishing articles on topics ranging from the need for electoral reform to the current refugee crisis, from why Scottish Young Greens threw a tea party for the Queen to what Young Greens can do to help the student movement.


But we need your help to do this.

As we grow and expand our coverage in this crucial moment for the Greens, there are various costs we will have to meet:

  1. Travel costs—to help our correspondents attend and cover various events and local campaigns (£600 will pay for 15 round-trip train tickets at £40 each), as well as organising a strategy weekend to bring together members of the team to plan our long-term strategy (up to £600 to bring together our editors and correspondents from across the UK)
  2. Publicity costs—to bring our articles to more people than ever before (£300 will bring 30 of our best articles over the next year to tens of thousands more people through sponsored posts on social media)
  3. Printing costs—to provide exclusive Bright Green newssheets at Green Party conferences (£300 will allow us to print hundreds of copies for each conference—both Green Party of England and Wales and Scottish Green Party)
  4. And finally, the costs of keeping the website up and running (coming out to around £150)

In order to meet these costs we will face over the next year, we are running this crowdfunder, aiming to raise £2000 in one month.

However much you can donate, your contribution would be greatly appreciated, and will help us provide more and better Green journalism. Even if you can't contribute anything, it would be fantastic if you could spread the word over social media and in your local activist group or Green Party branch.


Thank you very much,

Violeta Vajda, Ric Lander and William Pinkney-Baird

The Bright Green Co-Editors

Bright Green hopes to play our part in this vital year for Greens across the UK, publishing high-quality, original, independent
coverage of these elections in the six months leading up to 5th May,
including breaking news from the campaigns and interviews with Green candidates
across the UK.
Beyond the elections, we also seek to
provide a platform to discuss the broader future of the green politics and
social movements throughout the UK and Europe, and bring together some of the
best green thinking under one roof to expand people’s vision of what is
possible in politics. We will continue publishing articles on topics ranging from the need for electoral reform to the current refugee crisis, from why Scottish Young Greens threw a tea party for the Queen to what Young Greens can do to help the student movement.
But we need your help to do this.
As we grow and expand our coverage in this
crucial moment for the Greens, there are various costs we will have to meet:


Travel costs—to help our correspondents
attend and cover various events and local campaigns (£600 will pay for 15 round-trip train tickets at £40 each), as
well as organising a strategy weekend to bring together members of the team to
plan our long-term strategy (up to £600
to bring together our editors and correspondents from across the UK)


Publicity costs—to bring our articles to more people than ever before (£300 will bring 30 of our best articles
over the next year to tens of thousands more people through sponsored posts on
social media)


Printing costs—to provide exclusive Bright
Green newssheets at Green Party conferences (£300
will allow us to print hundreds of copies for each conference—both Green Party
of England and Wales and Scottish Green Party)


And finally, the costs of
keeping the website up and running (coming out to around £150)


In order to meet these costs we will face
over the next year, we are running this crowdfunder, aiming to raise £2000 in one
month.
However much you can donate, your contribution would be greatly appreciated, and will help us provide more and better Green journalism. Even if you can't contribute anything, it would be fantastic if you could spread the word over social media and in your local activist group or Green Party branch.
Thank you very much,
Violeta
Vajda, Ric Lander and William Pinkney-Baird
The Bright Green Co-Editors

story:
Short Summary

The vision is love. The place is J-Bay.

  • I'm 17 years old, and spent all of 2013 in Jeffrey's Bay, South Africa with Aleph Surf.
  • For the year of 2013, we spent a few months in training, and the rest of the year working with the kids who live in Jbay. Teaching them how to surf, helping with education, and learning practical life skills; all starting at the base of simply creating relationships. These kids are REAL. They are more than their stereotype, and they each have special visions and passions, dreams and aspirations.
  • My personal passion is making sure they know that the dreams they have are possible! They are not chained to their location or stereotype. Also teaching them how to use and steward what they have been given. That they can live off of the resources around them, not needing to resort to unreliable jobs or  dangerous situations in order to put food on the table.
  • The goal is to return to Jbay, and reconnect with these beautiful souls.
  • For the year of 2014, I will be doing a gap year program called SurfMasters. This, along with all those precious kids, it is going to be a radical year.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The financial goal to raise is $7,500 or more. This includes the cost of living, food and flight. $7,500 will cover most of the basics, but to cover everything completely will be around $9,500.
  • If we do not reach the full $7,500, every penny given will still go towards this project. So even if we raise only $500, it will still be used for the same exact reason.
  • Every dollar helps!! Thank you!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Prayers and thoughts! As much as financial support is hugely needed, emotional and spiritual support is just the same. Every prayer is appreciated. Thank you!
  • You can also share this! The more the merrier. :)

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
Congratulations to everyone - the campaign hit its target in under six hours! No more contributions needed !!! :)

Anthony France has been told today that he must find this money before August 28th to pay back some of with the costs of prosecuting him as the only journalist to be convicted of aiding and abetting a public official. Judge Timothy Pontious QC, who to be fair has repeatedly stressed what we all know, namely that Anthony is a man of integrity, had hoped that News UK would pay. Indeed Anthony's QC Adrian Keeling told the court he had hoped the company would as well, as this would send out "a strong message that they were doing the right thing" but News UK has point-blank refused.
I am hoping that as friends and supporters of Anthony, and other journalists still facing trials, we will band together and send a "strong message" that we deplore this lack of support and respect for Anthony.
Aside from the fact that I'm not sure that he has the money to pay, coverage of what we will doing will show Anthony that he is not alone and that as he tried to re-build his life he always has friends he can call on.

story:
The Lorelei Signal and Sorcerous Signals

Both The Lorelei Signal and Sorcerous Signals have been published online as free to read fantasy magazines for over 5 years. The magazine pays a token payment to the authors and artists who contribute, but the cost of maintaining the magazine is getting too high to keep coming out of the publisher's pocket.

We do ask for donations on the website, but those have been dwindling - so in order to keep both magazines going for another year, we are asking for your support to KickStart next year's publication of The Lorelei Signal, Sorcerous Signals as well as Mystic Signals (our print compilation).

With your help, I will be able to continue publishing The Lorelei Signal and Sorcerous Signals - plus if we pass our posted goal by at least $500 I will be raising the payments to authors from $5.00 to $10.00.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are unable to contribute - please take a moment to visit The Lorelei Signal at www.loreleisignal.com and Sorcerous Signals www.sorceroussignals.com and enjoy the stories presented.

story:
The Mission

My name is Tania L Ramos, recovery room nurse turned part-time author and entrepreneur.  I have written two books and one manual.  My second book was self-published and has won two awards to date.  The manual is titled Surviving the Writing Apocalypse: Content Help for New Authors.  The website I am fundraising for is based off the manual.

     I have found over years of reading self-published books that many are substandard and published haphazardly.  This has given the self-publishing community of authors a bad name.  The purpose of writing the manual was to give authors, with little resources or finances, a comprehensive glimpse into some of the critical areas of writing where many mistakes are made. Areas such as foresight, author intrusion, period based themes, branding, and use of dialogue tags for example, are listed in the book.

     After writing the manual, my friend and I agreed there was so much more to contribute.  As a new self-published author it was time consuming to research many sites, compile the information, figure it all out, and put it into action.  With the manual in place, we decided it would be a great resource to add an accompanying website loaded with all the information a new author would need in one easy to navigate website.

    The website will include a page detailing the book, events, and social media revolving around it.  The site will also have a resource page with links to web designers, cover artists, editors, publicists, video media editors, beta-readers, and more.  The biggest feature, and the one we feel deeply about, is a page titled, "Writing Apocalypse Survivors." This page will feature submitted books which raise and exceed the bar for self-published material. A page where these wonderful books can be displayed, and where readers seeking to find top notch indie books can locate them.

What We Need & What You Get

The funds we need are both for the manual and the website.  This is a list of what we need:

  • Publicity for the manual and website
  • Purchase of a domain and server site
  • Purchase of booking application
  • Ability to put the book out in physical print (we have already started work in ereader formats)
  • Commercial time with ads on Facebook, YouTube, and Google ads
  • Bookstubs to advertise
  • A webinar campaign to increase clients

The Perks (based on contribution):

  • One free, signed book stub with download to many ereader apps
  • Free 30 min consultation, or consultation you can gift to a freind
  • A beautiful website dedicated to improving indie books
  • Your publishing related business listed for one month as a contributor on our home page, then listed free for the rest of the year on our resources page with link
  • A beautiful website and business you had a hand in putting together. And we love you for it!

The Impact

    The website will not only target readers, but small publishing related businesses, as well as authors.  There are a few websites out there that boast that they display great indie books, but no one website we have come across offers more resources.  This is what we will offer on the site:

  • 30 minute & 1 hour phone consultations for authors needing one-on-one help
  • 3 chapter or 30 page review. This is where an author can submit their first three chapters or thirty pages (whichever is shorter), for content review at a price much cheaper than traditional editing
  • A page dedicated to books that have exceeded a minimum standard
  • A page with resources such as downloads of form sheets
  • A page with outside resources such as editing, cover design, and more
  • A manual available for purchase at a reasonable price

Other Ways You Can Help

    We realize times are hard all around the world, and we appreciate any financial help you can offer.  However, if you can not help financially there are many other ways to contribute:

  • spread the word about our campaign by linking it into your social media
  • become a beta-reader
  • and most importantly, tell your friends about Surviving the Writing Apocalypse

We thank you for taking the time to read our campaign.  It is our mission to bring quality indie books together in one place for readers to find.

story:
Update (April 2017): Order your copy of Lost Guides - Singapore on my website here! 

Hello! I’m Anna and I’m the author, photographer and explorer behind this book Lost Guides – Singapore. A few years ago I turned up to this city and didn’t have a clue where to go, and spent way too much time in the wrong places! I’ve since been digging up local and authentic spots, finding great food, and discovering creative neighbourhoods. I’m now using this book to share with you all that is awesome about Singapore, and to help you have an amazing time here!

What’s in the guide?

This book highlights 120 of the most special spots in Singapore where I love to spend my time. Recommendations include cool coffee shops, authentic Asian art galleries, fabulous food (both local and contemporary), speakeasy bars and boutique hotels. Designed to be practical and useful, this book is organised into 10 neighbourhoods, with bespoke maps and original photography to give you all the information that you need.

    I’ve also been speaking to some of the most inspirational local creatives, who have given me in-depth interviews, and some of Singapore's most promising writers have contributed beautiful pieces of literature about this little island.

    Details

    • A5, full colour 182 page soft cover book
    • Original photography
    • Hand-drawn maps of the neighbourhoods and illustrations
    • Offset-printed and perfect bound

    Contents

    ​

      Preview pages from the book 

      View in high res here.

      What stage am I at?

      You'll be happy to know that all the groundwork has been done! All the spots that have made it into the book have been decided and I've organised all the photography as well as conducted interviews and collected written contributions. 

      I'm now working with some amazingly talented designers that specialise in creating lovely independent books. The aim is to create a beautiful book for you, something that you'd happily display in your home or give as a gift.

      Timeline

      18th Jan - Launch the crowdfunding campaign

      13th Feb - End of crowdfunding campaign

      Feb – March – Finalise text, design and layout

      March - Send to the printers

      End of March - Pick up your books at the launch event! Books & rewards are shipped

      What will the money be used for?

      I'm looking to raise a minimum of $5000 USD. This will be going straight into printing costs as well as getting the rewards out to you. The biggest barrier to getting a book published is the printing costs with most printing companies requiring high minimum orders. Additional funds will also go towards the book design and layout. I've specifically tracked down and chosen the most talented book designers to work with me on this project so I can give you the best possible final product!

      About Lost Guides

      I founded my travel website thelostguides.com in 2014 as I was frustrated with the lack of useful and trustworthy information about the places I wanted to visit. I now use this space to share unique and inspiring travel experiences for Asia with the aim of making your travel planning that little bit easier!

      In November 2015 I launched my first book Lost Guides – Bali (through crowdfunding), which has since gone on to sell thousands of copies in its first year. Lost Guides - Bali is stocked in some awesome places like Books Actually in Singapore, Stanfords in London, and Periplus in Indonesia. It even made its way to Nordstrom in USA for a pop-up.

      Reviews of Lost Guides - Bali

      My readers are AMAZING and often share their beautiful photos with me on their instagram during their travels.

      People who like Lost Guides

      Some stockists and press for Lost Guides.

      The Rewards

      Shipping

      *except the 'Pile 'em high - bulk buy' option, international shipping is $29 as it's a heavy parcel! Singapore shipping is still free. 

      See a larger image of t-shirts here

      See larger images of the prints here

      See larger images of the prints and t-shirts 

      See larger images of prints and t-shirts 

      Risks & Challenges

      Having run a successful crowdfunding campaign for Lost Guides - Bali, I know what is entailed when it comes to production, printing and shipping. I have a good relationship with my designers and printers who will help me create a wonderful product for you. 

      When it comes to postage, sometimes parcels can go awol, but I'll do the best I can to help if things go wrong. Also all orders will come with tracked shipping. 

      Other Ways You Can Help

      • If you're a stockist, distributor or bookstore owner who's interested in stocking Lost Guides - Singapore (and Bali), get in touch at anna@thelostguides.com.  
      • Please share this page on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Email! I'm hoping to get the word out to people like yourself, who love to travel and find unique and authentic experiences along the way.

      Thank you! Anna xx
